3998 uint Context::getPrimitiveCount() const{
3999  return primitives.size();
4000 }
4001 
4002 std::vector<uint> Context::getAllUUIDs() const{
4003  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
4004  UUIDs.resize(primitives.size());
4005  size_t i=0;
4006  for( auto primitive : primitives){
4007  UUIDs.at(i) = primitive.first;
4008  i++;
4009  }
4010  return UUIDs;
4011 }
4012 
4013 void Context::addTimeseriesData(const char* label, float value, const Date &date, const Time &time ){
4014 
4015  //floating point value corresponding to date and time
4016  double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
4017  date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
4018 
4019  //Check if data label already exists
4020  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4021  timeseries_data[label].push_back( value );
4022  timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value );
4023  return;
4024  }else{ //exists
4025 
4026  uint N = getTimeseriesLength(label);
4027 
4028  auto it_data = timeseries_data[label].begin();
4029  auto it_datevalue = timeseries_datevalue[label].begin();
4030 
4031  if( N==1 ){
4032 
4033  if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){
4034  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
4035  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
4036  return;
4037  }else{
4038  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+1, value);
4039  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+1, date_value);
4040  return;
4041  }
4042 
4043  }else{
4044 
4045  if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){ //check if data should be inserted at beginning of timeseries
4046  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
4047  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
4048  return;
4049  }else if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].back() ){ //check if data should be inserted at end of timeseries
4050  timeseries_data[label].push_back( value);
4051  timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value);
4052  return;
4053  }
4054 
4055  //data should be inserted somewhere in the middle of timeseries
4056  for( uint t=0; t<N-1; t++ ){
4057  if( date_value==timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) ){
4058  std::cout << "WARNING (addTimeseriesData): Skipping duplicate timeseries date/time." << std::endl;
4059  continue;
4060  }
4061  if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) && date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t+1) ){
4062  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+t+1, value);
4063  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+t+1, date_value);
4064  return;
4065  }
4066  }
4067 
4068  }
4069 
4070  }
4071 
4072  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTimeseriesData): Failed to insert timeseries data for unknown reason.") );
4073 
4074 }
4075 
4076 void Context::setCurrentTimeseriesPoint(const char* label, uint index ){
4077  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4078  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setCurrentTimeseriesPoint): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist."));
4079  }
4080  setDate( queryTimeseriesDate( label, index ) );
4081  setTime( queryTimeseriesTime( label, index ) );
4082 }
4083 
4084 float Context::queryTimeseriesData(const char* label, const Date &date, const Time &time ) const{
4085  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4086  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setCurrentTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist."));
4087  }
4088 
4089  double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
4090  date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
4091 
4092  double tmin = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).front();
4093  double tmax = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).back();
4094 
4095  if( date_value<tmin ){
4096  std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the earliest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
4097  return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
4098  }else if( date_value>tmax ){
4099  std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the latest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
4100  return timeseries_data.at(label).back();
4101  }
4102 
4103  if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).empty() ){
4104  std::cout << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): timeseries " << label << " does not contain any data." << std::endl;
4105  return 0;
4106  }else if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).size() == 1 ){
4107  return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
4108  }else{
4109  int i;
4110  bool success=false;
4111  for( i=0; i<timeseries_data.at(label).size()-1; i++ ){
4112  if( date_value>=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i) && date_value<=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1) ){
4113  success = true;
4114  break;
4115  }
4116  }
4117 
4118  if(!success){
4119  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (queryTimeseriesData): Failed to query timeseries data for unknown reason.") );
4120  }
4121 
4122  double xminus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i);
4123  double xplus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i+1);
4124 
4125  double tminus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i);
4126  double tplus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1);
4127 
4128  return float(xminus + (xplus-xminus)*(date_value-tminus)/(tplus-tminus));
4129 
4130  }
4131 
4132 }
4133 
4134 float Context::queryTimeseriesData( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4135 
4136  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4137  std::cout << "WARNING (getTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
4138  }
4139 
4140  return timeseries_data.at(label).at(index);
4141 
4142 }
4143 
4144 Time Context::queryTimeseriesTime( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4145 
4146  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4147  std::cout << "WARNING (getTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
4148  }
4149 
4150  double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
4151 
4152  int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
4153  assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
4154 
4155  int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
4156  assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
4157 
4158  int hour = floor((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.);
4159  int minute = floor( ((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.-double(hour))*60. );
4160  int second = (int)lround( ( ( ( dateval - floor(dateval) )*24. - double(hour))*60. - double(minute) )*60.);
4161 
4162  if( second==60 ){
4163  second = 0;
4164  minute ++;
4165  }
4166 
4167  if( minute==60 ){
4168  minute = 0;
4169  hour ++;
4170  }
4171 
4172  assert( second>=0 && second<60 );
4173  assert( minute>=0 && minute<60 );
4174  assert( hour>=0 && hour<24 );
4175 
4176  return make_Time(hour,minute,second);
4177 
4178 }
4179 
4180 Date Context::queryTimeseriesDate( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4181 
4182  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4183  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (queryTimeseriesDate): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist.") );
4184  }
4185 
4186  double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
4187 
4188  int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
4189  assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
4190 
4191  int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
4192  assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
4193 
4194  Date date = Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
4195 
4196  return Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
4197 
4198 }
4199 
4200 uint Context::getTimeseriesLength( const char* label ) const{
4201 
4202  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4203  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTimeseriesDate): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist.") );
4204  }else{
4205  return timeseries_data.at(label).size();
4206  }
4207 
4208 }
4209 
4210 void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
4211 
4212  xbounds.x = 1e8;
4213  xbounds.y = -1e8;
4214  ybounds.x = 1e8;
4215  ybounds.y = -1e8;
4216  zbounds.x = 1e8;
4217  zbounds.y = -1e8;
4218 
4219  for( auto primitive : primitives){
4220 
4221  std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer_private(primitive.first)->getVertices();
4222 
4223  for( auto & vert : verts){
4224  if( vert.x<xbounds.x ){
4225  xbounds.x = vert.x;
4226  }else if( vert.x>xbounds.y ){
4227  xbounds.y = vert.x;
4228  }
4229  if( vert.y<ybounds.x ){
4230  ybounds.x = vert.y;
4231  }else if( vert.y>ybounds.y ){
4232  ybounds.y = vert.y;
4233  }
4234  if( vert.z<zbounds.x ){
4235  zbounds.x = vert.z;
4236  }else if( vert.z>zbounds.y ){
4237  zbounds.y = vert.z;
4238  }
4239  }
4240 
4241  }
4242 
4243 }
4244 
4245 void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
4246 
4247  xbounds.x = 1e8;
4248  xbounds.y = -1e8;
4249  ybounds.x = 1e8;
4250  ybounds.y = -1e8;
4251  zbounds.x = 1e8;
4252  zbounds.y = -1e8;
4253 
4254  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4255 
4256  std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID )->getVertices();
4257 
4258  for( auto & vert : verts){
4259  if( vert.x<xbounds.x ){
4260  xbounds.x = vert.x;
4261  }else if( vert.x>xbounds.y ){
4262  xbounds.y = vert.x;
4263  }
4264  if( vert.y<ybounds.x ){
4265  ybounds.x = vert.y;
4266  }else if( vert.y>ybounds.y ){
4267  ybounds.y = vert.y;
4268  }
4269  if( vert.z<zbounds.x ){
4270  zbounds.x = vert.z;
4271  }else if( vert.z>zbounds.y ){
4272  zbounds.y = vert.z;
4273  }
4274  }
4275 
4276  }
4277 
4278 }
4279 
4280 void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
4281 
4282  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4283  getDomainBoundingBox( xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4284 
4285  center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
4286  center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
4287  center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
4288 
4289  radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( powf(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + powf(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + powf((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
4290 
4291 
4292 }
4293 
4294 void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
4295 
4296  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4297  getDomainBoundingBox( UUIDs, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4298 
4299  center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
4300  center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
4301  center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
4302 
4303  radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( powf(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + powf(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + powf((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
4304 
4305 
4306 }
4307 
4308 void Context::cropDomainX(const vec2 &xbounds ){
4309 
4310  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4311 
4312  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4313 
4314  for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
4315 
4316  vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
4317 
4318  for(auto & vertex : vertices){
4319  if( vertex.x<xbounds.x || vertex.x>xbounds.y ){
4320  uint parent_object_ID = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getParentObjectID();
4321  if(parent_object_ID == 0) {
4322  deletePrimitive(p);
4323  break;
4324  }
4325  deleteObject(parent_object_ID);
4326  break;
4327  }
4328  }
4329 
4330  }
4331 
4332  if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
4333  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainX): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4334  }
4335 
4336 }
4337 
4338 void Context::cropDomainY(const vec2 &ybounds ){
4339 
4340  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4341 
4342  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4343 
4344  for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
4345 
4346  vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
4347 
4348  for(auto & vertex : vertices){
4349  if( vertex.y<ybounds.x || vertex.y>ybounds.y ){
4350  uint parent_object_ID = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getParentObjectID();
4351  if(parent_object_ID == 0) {
4352  deletePrimitive(p);
4353  break;
4354  }
4355  deleteObject(parent_object_ID);
4356  break;
4357  }
4358  }
4359 
4360  }
4361 
4362  if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
4363  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainY): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4364  }
4365 
4366 }
4367 
4368 void Context::cropDomainZ(const vec2 &zbounds ){
4369 
4370  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4371 
4372  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4373 
4374  for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
4375 
4376  vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
4377 
4378  for(auto & vertex : vertices){
4379  if( vertex.z<zbounds.x || vertex.z>zbounds.y ){
4380  uint parent_object_ID = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getParentObjectID();
4381  if(parent_object_ID == 0) {
4382  deletePrimitive(p);
4383  break;
4384  }
4385  deleteObject(parent_object_ID);
4386  break;
4387  }
4388  }
4389 
4390  }
4391 
4392  if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
4393  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainZ): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4394  }
4395 
4396 }
4397 
4398 void Context::cropDomain(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const vec2 &xbounds, const vec2 &ybounds, const vec2 &zbounds ){
4399 
4400  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4401 
4402  size_t delete_count = 0;
4403  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4404 
4405  vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getVertices();
4406 
4407  for(auto & vertex : vertices){
4408  if( vertex.x<xbounds.x || vertex.x>xbounds.y || vertex.y<ybounds.x || vertex.y>ybounds.y || vertex.z<zbounds.x || vertex.z>zbounds.y ){
4409  uint parent_object_ID = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getParentObjectID();
4410  if(parent_object_ID == 0) {
4411  deletePrimitive(UUID);
4412  delete_count++;
4413  break;
4414  }
4415  deleteObject(parent_object_ID);
4416  delete_count ++;
4417  break;
4418  }
4419  }
4420 
4421  }
4422 
4423  if( delete_count==UUIDs.size() ){
4424  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomain): No specified primitives were entirely inside cropped area, and thus all specified primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4425  }
4426 
4427 }
4428 
4429 void Context::cropDomain(const vec2 &xbounds, const vec2 &ybounds, const vec2 &zbounds ){
4430  cropDomain( getAllUUIDs(), xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4431 }
4432 
4433 uint CompoundObject::getObjectID() const{
4434  return OID;
4435 }
4436 
4437 helios::ObjectType CompoundObject::getObjectType() const{
4438  return type;
4439 }

4442  return UUIDs.size();
4443 }
4444 
4445 
4446 std::vector<uint> CompoundObject::getPrimitiveUUIDs() const{
4447 
4448  return UUIDs;
4449 
4450 }
4451 
4452 bool CompoundObject::doesObjectContainPrimitive(uint UUID ){
4453 
4454  return find(UUIDs.begin(),UUIDs.end(),UUID)!=UUIDs.end();
4455 
4456 }
4457 
4458 helios::vec3 CompoundObject::getObjectCenter() const{
4459 
4460  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4461 
4462  std::vector<uint> U = getPrimitiveUUIDs();
4463 
4464  context->getDomainBoundingBox( U, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4465 
4466  vec3 origin;
4467 
4468  origin.x = 0.5f*(xbounds.x+xbounds.y);
4469  origin.y = 0.5f*(ybounds.x+ybounds.y);
4470  origin.z = 0.5f*(zbounds.x+zbounds.y);
4471 
4472  return origin;
4473 }
4474 
4475 float CompoundObject::getArea() const{
4476 
4477  float area = 0.f;
4478 
4479  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4480 
4481  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4482  area += context->getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
4483  }
4484 
4485  }
4486 
4487  return area;
4488 
4489 }
4490 
4491 void CompoundObject::setColor( const helios::RGBcolor& a_color ){
4492  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4493 
4494  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4495  context->setPrimitiveColor( UUID, a_color );
4496  }
4497 
4498  }
4499 
4500  color = make_RGBAcolor(a_color, 1.f);
4501 
4502 }
4503

4505  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4506 
4507  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4508  context->setPrimitiveColor( UUID, a_color );
4509  }
4510 
4511  }
4512 
4513  color = a_color;
4514 
4515 }

4518  return make_RGBcolor( color.r, color.g, color.b );
4519 }

4522  return make_RGBcolor( color.r, color.g, color.b );
4523 }

4549 bool CompoundObject::hasTexture() const{

4551  return false;
4552  }else{
4553  return true;
4554  }

4560 
4561 void CompoundObject::translate( const helios::vec3& shift ){
4562 
4563  float T[16], T_prim[16];
4564  makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
4565 
4566  matmult(T,transform,transform);
4567 
4568  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4569 
4570  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4571 
4572  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
4573  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
4574  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
4575  }
4576 
4577  }
4578 
4579 }
4580 
4581 void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const char* axis ){
4582 
4583  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
4584  float Rz[16], Rz_prim[16];
4585  makeRotationMatrix(-rot,"z",Rz);
4586  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
4587 
4588  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4589  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4590  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rz_prim);
4591  matmult(Rz,Rz_prim,Rz_prim);
4592  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rz_prim);
4593  }
4594  }
4595  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
4596  float Ry[16], Ry_prim[16];
4597  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
4598  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
4599  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4600  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4601  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Ry_prim);
4602  matmult(Ry,Ry_prim,Ry_prim);
4603  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Ry_prim);
4604  }
4605  }
4606  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
4607  float Rx[16], Rx_prim[16];
4608  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
4609  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
4610  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4611  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4612  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rx_prim);
4613  matmult(Rx,Rx_prim,Rx_prim);
4614  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rx_prim);
4615  }
4616  }
4617  }else{
4618  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (CompoundObject::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z.") );
4619  }
4620 
4621 }
4622 
4623 void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& axis ){
4624 
4625  float R[16], R_prim[16];
4626  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
4627  matmult(R,transform,transform);
4628 
4629  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4630 
4631  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4632 
4633  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
4634  matmult(R,R_prim,R_prim);
4635  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
4636 
4637  }
4638 
4639  }
4640 
4641 }
4642 
4643 void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const helios::vec3& axis ){
4644 
4645  float R[16], R_prim[16];
4646  makeRotationMatrix(rot,origin,axis,R);
4647  matmult(R,transform,transform);
4648 
4649  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4650 
4651  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4652 
4653  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
4654  matmult(R,R_prim,R_prim);
4655  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
4656 
4657  }
4658 
4659  }
4660 
4661 }
4662 
4663 void CompoundObject::getTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ) const{
4664  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
4665  T[i]=transform[i];
4666  }
4667 }
4668 
4669 void CompoundObject::setTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ){
4670 
4671  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
4672  transform[i] = T[i];
4673  }
4674 
4675 }

4679 }
4680 
4681 void CompoundObject::deleteChildPrimitive( uint UUID ){
4682  auto it = find( UUIDs.begin(), UUIDs.end(), UUID );
4683  if( it!=UUIDs.end() ){
4684  std::iter_swap(it,UUIDs.end()-1);
4685  UUIDs.pop_back();
4686  primitivesarecomplete=false;
4687  }
4688 }
4689 
4690 void CompoundObject::deleteChildPrimitive( const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs ){
4691  for( uint UUID : a_UUIDs ){
4692  deleteChildPrimitive(UUID);
4693  }
4694 }
4695

4697  return primitivesarecomplete;
4698 }

4765 
4766 void CompoundObject::setObjectData( const char* label, HeliosDataType a_type, uint size, void* data ){
4767 
4768  object_data_types[label] = a_type;
4769 
4770  if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
4771 
4772  int* data_ptr = (int*)data;
4773 
4774  std::vector<int> vec;
4775  vec.resize(size);
4776  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4777  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4778  }
4779  object_data_int[label] = vec;
4780 
4781  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
4782 
4783  uint* data_ptr = (uint*)data;
4784 
4785  std::vector<uint> vec;
4786  vec.resize(size);
4787  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4788  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4789  }
4790  object_data_uint[label] = vec;
4791 
4792  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
4793 
4794  auto* data_ptr = (float*)data;
4795 
4796  std::vector<float> vec;
4797  vec.resize(size);
4798  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4799  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4800  }
4801  object_data_float[label] = vec;
4802 
4803  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
4804 
4805  auto* data_ptr = (double*)data;
4806 
4807  std::vector<double> vec;
4808  vec.resize(size);
4809  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4810  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4811  }
4812  object_data_double[label] = vec;
4813 
4814  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
4815 
4816  auto* data_ptr = (vec2*)data;
4817 
4818  std::vector<vec2> vec;
4819  vec.resize(size);
4820  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4821  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4822  }
4823  object_data_vec2[label] = vec;
4824 
4825  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
4826 
4827  auto* data_ptr = (vec3*)data;
4828 
4829  std::vector<vec3> vec;
4830  vec.resize(size);
4831  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4832  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4833  }
4834  object_data_vec3[label] = vec;
4835 
4836  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
4837 
4838  auto* data_ptr = (vec4*)data;
4839 
4840  std::vector<vec4> vec;
4841  vec.resize(size);
4842  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4843  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4844  }
4845  object_data_vec4[label] = vec;
4846 
4847  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
4848 
4849  auto* data_ptr = (int2*)data;
4850 
4851  std::vector<int2> vec;
4852  vec.resize(size);
4853  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4854  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4855  }
4856  object_data_int2[label] = vec;
4857 
4858  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
4859 
4860  auto* data_ptr = (int3*)data;
4861 
4862  std::vector<int3> vec;
4863  vec.resize(size);
4864  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4865  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4866  }
4867  object_data_int3[label] = vec;
4868 
4869  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
4870 
4871  auto* data_ptr = (int4*)data;
4872 
4873  std::vector<int4> vec;
4874  vec.resize(size);
4875  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4876  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4877  }
4878  object_data_int4[label] = vec;
4879 
4880  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
4881 
4882  auto* data_ptr = (std::string*)data;
4883 
4884  std::vector<std::string> vec;
4885  vec.resize(size);
4886  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4887  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4888  }
4889  object_data_string[label] = vec;
4890 
4891  }
4892 
4893 }
4894 
4895 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, int& data ) const{
4896 
4897  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4898  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4899  }
4900 
4901  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
4902  std::vector<int> d = object_data_int.at(label);
4903  data = d.at(0);
4904  }else{
4905  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type int."));
4906  }
4907 
4908 }
4909 
4910 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, std::vector<int>& data ) const{
4911 
4912  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4913  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4914  }
4915 
4916  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
4917  std::vector<int> d = object_data_int.at(label);
4918  data = d;
4919  }else{
4920  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type int."));
4921  }
4922 
4923 }
4924 
4925 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, uint& data ) const{
4926 
4927  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4928  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4929  }
4930 
4931  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
4932  std::vector<uint> d = object_data_uint.at(label);
4933  data = d.front();
4934  }else{
4935  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type uint."));
4936  }
4937 
4938 }
4939 
4940 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, std::vector<uint>& data ) const{
4941 
4942  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4943  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4944  }
4945 
4946  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
4947  std::vector<uint> d = object_data_uint.at(label);
4948  data = d;
4949  }else{
4950  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type uint."));
4951  }
4952 
4953 }

4958  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4959  }
4960 
4961  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
4962  std::vector<float> d = object_data_float.at(label);
4963  data = d.front();
4964  }else{
4965  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type float, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type float."));
4966  }

4970 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, std::vector<float>& data ) const{
4971 
4972  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4973  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4974  }
4975 
4976  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
4977  std::vector<float> d = object_data_float.at(label);
4978  data = d;
4979  }else{
4980  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type float, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type float."));
4981  }

4984 
4985 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, double& data ) const{
4986 
4987  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4988  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4989  }
4990 
4991  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
4992  std::vector<double> d = object_data_double.at(label);
4993  data = d.front();
4994  }else{
4995  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type double, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type double."));
4996  }
4997 
4998 }
4999 
5000 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, std::vector<double>& data ) const{
5001 
5002  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
5003  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
5004  }
5005 
5006  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
5007  std::vector<double> d = object_data_double.at(label);
5008  data = d;
5009  }else{
5010  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type double, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type double."));
5011  }
5012 
5013 }

5225 HeliosDataType CompoundObject::getObjectDataType( const char* label ) const{
5226 
5227  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
5228  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
5229  }
5230 
5231  return object_data_types.at(label);
5232 
5233 }
5234 
5235 uint CompoundObject::getObjectDataSize( const char* label ) const{
5236 
5237  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
5238  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
5239  }
5240 
5241  HeliosDataType qtype = object_data_types.at(label);
5242 
5243  if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
5244  return object_data_int.at(label).size();
5245  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
5246  return object_data_uint.at(label).size();
5247  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
5248  return object_data_float.at(label).size();
5249  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
5250  return object_data_double.at(label).size();
5251  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
5252  return object_data_vec2.at(label).size();
5253  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
5254  return object_data_vec3.at(label).size();
5255  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
5256  return object_data_vec4.at(label).size();
5257  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
5258  return object_data_int2.at(label).size();
5259  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
5260  return object_data_int3.at(label).size();
5261  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
5262  return object_data_int4.at(label).size();
5263  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
5264  return object_data_string.at(label).size();
5265  }else{
5266  assert( false );
5267  }
5268 
5269  return 0;
5270 
5271 }
5272 
5273 void CompoundObject::clearObjectData( const char* label ){
5274 
5275  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
5276  return;
5277  }
5278 
5279  HeliosDataType qtype = object_data_types.at(label);
5280 
5281  if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
5282  object_data_int.erase(label);
5283  object_data_types.erase(label);
5284  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
5285  object_data_uint.erase(label);
5286  object_data_types.erase(label);
5287  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
5288  object_data_float.erase(label);
5289  object_data_types.erase(label);
5290  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
5291  object_data_double.erase(label);
5292  object_data_types.erase(label);
5293  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
5294  object_data_vec2.erase(label);
5295  object_data_types.erase(label);
5296  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
5297  object_data_vec3.erase(label);
5298  object_data_types.erase(label);
5299  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
5300  object_data_vec4.erase(label);
5301  object_data_types.erase(label);
5302  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
5303  object_data_int2.erase(label);
5304  object_data_types.erase(label);
5305  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
5306  object_data_int3.erase(label);
5307  object_data_types.erase(label);
5308  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
5309  object_data_int4.erase(label);
5310  object_data_types.erase(label);
5311  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
5312  object_data_string.erase(label);
5313  object_data_types.erase(label);
5314  }else{
5315  assert(false);
5316  }
5317 
5318 }
5319 
5320 bool CompoundObject::doesObjectDataExist( const char* label ) const{
5321 
5322  if( object_data_types.find(label) == object_data_types.end() ){
5323  return false;
5324  }else{
5325  return true;
5326  }
5327 
5328 }
5329 
5330 bool Context::areObjectPrimitivesComplete( uint objID ) const{
5331  return getObjectPointer(objID)->arePrimitivesComplete();
5332 }
5333 
5334 std::vector<std::string> CompoundObject::listObjectData() const{
5335 
5336  std::vector<std::string> labels(object_data_types.size());
5337 
5338  size_t i=0;
5339  for(const auto & object_data_type : object_data_types){
5340  labels.at(i) = object_data_type.first;
5341  i++;
5342  }
5343 
5344  return labels;
5345 
5346 }
5347 
5348 CompoundObject* Context::getObjectPointer( uint ObjID ) const{
5349  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
5350  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
5351  }
5352  return objects.at(ObjID);
5353 }
5354 
5355 uint Context::getObjectCount() const{
5356  return objects.size();
5357 }
5358 
5359 bool Context::doesObjectExist( const uint ObjID ) const{
5360  return objects.find(ObjID) != objects.end();
5361 }
5362 
5363 std::vector<uint> Context::getAllObjectIDs() const{
5364  std::vector<uint> objIDs;
5365  objIDs.resize(objects.size());
5366  size_t i=0;
5367  for(auto object : objects){
5368  objIDs.at(i) = object.first;
5369  i++;
5370  }
5371  return objIDs;
5372 }
5373 
5374 void Context::deleteObject(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ){
5375  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
5376  deleteObject( ObjID );
5377  }
5378 }
5379 
5380 void Context::deleteObject(uint ObjID ){
5381 
5382  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
5383  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (deleteObject): Object ID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " not found in the context."));
5384  }
5385 
5386  CompoundObject* obj = objects.at(ObjID);
5387 
5388  std::vector<uint> UUIDs = obj->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5389  deletePrimitive(UUIDs);
5390 
5391  delete obj;
5392  objects.erase(ObjID);
5393 
5394  markGeometryDirty();
5395 
5396 }
5397 
5398 std::vector<uint> Context::copyObject(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ){
5399 
5400  std::vector<uint> ObjIDs_copy(ObjIDs.size());
5401  size_t i=0;
5402  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
5403  ObjIDs_copy.at(i) = copyObject( ObjID );
5404  i++;
5405  }
5406 
5407  return ObjIDs_copy;
5408 
5409 }
5410 
5411 uint Context::copyObject(uint ObjID ){
5412 
5413  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
5414  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (copyObject): Object ID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " not found in the context."));
5415  }
5416 
5417  ObjectType type = objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType();
5418 
5419  std::vector<uint> UUIDs = getObjectPointer(ObjID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5420 
5421  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_copy = copyPrimitive( UUIDs );
5422  for( uint p : UUIDs_copy){
5423  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID( currentObjectID );
5424  }
5425 
5426  std::string texturefile = objects.at(ObjID)->getTextureFile();
5427 
5428  if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
5429 
5430  Tile* o = getTileObjectPointer( ObjID );
5431 
5432  int2 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5433 
5434  auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5435 
5436  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
5437 
5438  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
5439 
5440  Sphere* o = getSphereObjectPointer( ObjID );
5441 
5442  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5443 
5444  auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5445 
5446  objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
5447 
5448  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ){
5449 
5450  Tube* o = getTubeObjectPointer( ObjID );
5451 
5452  std::vector<vec3> nodes = o->getNodes();
5453  std::vector<float> radius = o->getNodeRadii();
5454  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors = o->getNodeColors();
5455  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5456 
5457  auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, nodes, radius, colors, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5458 
5459  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
5460 
5461  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_BOX ){
5462 
5463  Box* o = getBoxObjectPointer( ObjID );
5464 
5465  vec3 size = o->getSize();
5466  int3 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5467 
5468  auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5469 
5470  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
5471 
5472  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_DISK ){
5473 
5474  Disk* o = getDiskObjectPointer( ObjID );
5475 
5476  vec2 size = o->getSize();
5477  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5478 
5479  auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5480 
5481  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
5482 
5483  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH ){
5484 
5485  Polymesh* o = getPolymeshObjectPointer( ObjID );
5486 
5487  auto* polymesh_new = (new Polymesh(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5488 
5489  objects[currentObjectID] = polymesh_new;
5490 
5491  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_CONE ){
5492 
5493  Cone* o = getConeObjectPointer( ObjID );
5494 
5495  std::vector<vec3> nodes = o->getNodes();
5496  std::vector<float> radius = o->getNodeRadii();
5497  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5498 
5499  auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, nodes.at(0), nodes.at(1), radius.at(0), radius.at(1),
5500  subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5501 
5502  objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
5503 
5504  }
5505 
5506  float T[16];
5507  getObjectPointer( ObjID )->getTransformationMatrix( T );
5508 
5509  getObjectPointer( currentObjectID )->setTransformationMatrix( T );
5510 
5511 
5512  markGeometryDirty();
5513  currentObjectID++;
5514  return currentObjectID-1;
5515 }
5516 
5517 std::vector<uint> Context::filterObjectsByData( const std::vector<uint> &IDs, const char* object_data, float threshold, const char* comparator) const{
5518 
5519  std::vector<uint> output_object_IDs;
5520  output_object_IDs.resize(IDs.size());
5521  uint passed_count=0;
5522 
5523  for(uint i=0;i<IDs.size();i++)
5524  {
5525 
5526  if( doesObjectDataExist(IDs.at(i), object_data) ){
5527 
5528  HeliosDataType type = getObjectDataType(IDs.at(i), object_data);
5529  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
5530  uint R;
5531  getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
5532  if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
5533  if( R<threshold ){
5534  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5535  passed_count++;
5536  }
5537  }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
5538  if( R>threshold ){
5539  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5540  passed_count++;
5541  }
5542  }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
5543  if( R==threshold ){
5544  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5545  passed_count++;
5546  }
5547  }
5548 
5549  }else if(type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT){
5550  float R;
5551  getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
5552 
5553  if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
5554  if( R<threshold ){
5555  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5556  passed_count++;
5557  }
5558  }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
5559  if( R>threshold ){
5560  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5561  passed_count++;
5562  }
5563  }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
5564  if( R==threshold ){
5565  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5566  passed_count++;
5567  }
5568  }
5569 
5570  }else if(type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT){
5571  int R;
5572  getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
5573 
5574  if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
5575  if( R<threshold ){
5576  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5577  passed_count++;
5578  }
5579  }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
5580  if( R>threshold ){
5581  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5582  passed_count++;
5583  }
5584  }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
5585  if( R==threshold ){
5586  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5587  passed_count++;
5588  }
5589  }
5590  }else{
5591  std::cout << "WARNING: Object data not of type UINT, INT, or FLOAT. Filtering for other types not yet supported." << std::endl;
5592  }
5593 
5594 
5595  }
5596  }
5597 
5598  output_object_IDs.resize(passed_count);
5599 
5600  return output_object_IDs;
5601 
5602 }
5603 
5604 void Context::translateObject(uint ObjID, const vec3& shift ){
5605  getObjectPointer(ObjID)->translate(shift);
5606 }
5607 
5608 void Context::translateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, const vec3& shift ){
5609  for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
5610  getObjectPointer(ID)->translate(shift);
5611  }
5612 }
5613 
5614 void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const char* axis ){
5615  getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,axis);
5616 }
5617 
5618 void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const char* axis ){
5619  for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
5620  getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,axis);
5621  }
5622 }

5624 void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const vec3& axis ){
5625  getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,axis);
5626 }
5627 
5628 void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const vec3& axis ){
5629  for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
5630  getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,axis);
5631  }
5632 }

5634 void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const vec3& origin, const vec3& axis ){
5635  getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,origin,axis);
5636 }
5637 
5638 void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const vec3& origin, const vec3& axis ){
5639  for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
5640  getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,origin,axis);
5641  }
5642 }
5643 
5644 std::vector<uint> Context::getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs( const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ) const{
5645 
5646  std::vector<uint> output_UUIDs;
5647 
5648  for(uint i=0;i<ObjIDs.size();i++)
5649  {
5650  CompoundObject* pointer = getObjectPointer(ObjIDs.at(i));
5651  std::vector<uint> current_UUIDs = pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5652  output_UUIDs.insert( output_UUIDs.end(), current_UUIDs.begin(), current_UUIDs.end() );
5653  }
5654  return output_UUIDs;
5655 }
5656 
5657 std::vector<uint> Context::getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs( uint ObjID ) const{
5658 
5659  std::vector<uint> IDs{ObjID};
5660  std::vector<uint> output_UUIDs = getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(IDs);
5661  return output_UUIDs;
5662 }
5663 
5664 helios::ObjectType Context::getObjectType( uint ObjID ) const{
5665  return getObjectPointer(ObjID)->getObjectType();
5666 }
5667 
5668 float Context::getTileObjectAreaRatio(const uint &ObjectID) const{
5669 
5670  if( getObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
5671  {
5672  std::cerr << "WARNING (getTileObjectAreaRatio): ObjectID " << ObjectID<< " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5673  return 0.0;
5674 
5675  }else{
5676 
5677  if(!(getObjectPointer(ObjectID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
5678  std::cerr << "WARNING (getTileObjectAreaRatio): ObjectID " << ObjectID << " is missing primitives. Area ratio calculated is area of non-missing subpatches divided by the area of an individual subpatch." << std::endl;
5679  }
5680 
5681  int2 subdiv = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getSubdivisionCount();
5682  if(subdiv.x == int(1) && subdiv.y == int(1) )
5683  {
5684  return 1.0;
5685  }else{
5686  float area = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getArea();
5687  vec2 size = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getSize();
5688 
5689  float subpatch_area = (size.x/float(subdiv.x))*(size.y/float(subdiv.y));
5690  return area/subpatch_area;
5691  }
5692 
5693  }
5694 }
5695 
5696 std::vector<float> Context::getTileObjectAreaRatio(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs) const {
5697 
5698  std::vector<float> AreaRatios(ObjectIDs.size());
5699  for( uint i=0; i<ObjectIDs.size(); i++ ){
5700  AreaRatios.at(i) = getTileObjectAreaRatio(ObjectIDs.at(i));
5701  }
5702 
5703  return AreaRatios;
5704 }
5705 
5706 void Context::setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs, int2 new_subdiv)
5707 {
5708 
5709  //check that all objects are Tile Objects, and get vector of texture files
5710  std::vector<uint> tile_ObjectIDs;
5711  std::vector<uint> textured_tile_ObjectIDs;
5712 
5713 
5714  std::vector<std::string> tex;
5715  // for(uint i=1;i<ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5716  for(uint OBJID : ObjectIDs)
5717  {
5718 
5719  //check if the object ID is a tile object and if it is add it the tile_ObjectIDs vector
5720  if( getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
5721  {
5722  std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5723  }else if(!(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
5724  std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is missing primitives. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5725  }else{
5726  //test if the tile is textured and push into two different vectors
5727  Patch* p = getPatchPointer_private(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0));
5728  if( !p->hasTexture() ){ //no texture
5729  tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
5730  }else{ //texture
5731  textured_tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
5732  tex.push_back(p->getTextureFile() );
5733  }
5734  }
5735  }
5736 
5737  //Here just call setSubdivisionCount directly for the non-textured tile objects
5738  for(unsigned int tile_ObjectID : tile_ObjectIDs){
5739 
5740  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(tile_ObjectID);
5741  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5742 
5743  vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5744  vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
5745  vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
5746  SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
5747  RGBcolor color = current_object_pointer->getColorRGB();
5748 
5749  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_new = addTile(center, size, rotation, new_subdiv, color );
5750 
5751  for( uint UUID : UUIDs_new ) {
5752  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(tile_ObjectID);
5753  }
5754 
5755  current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(UUIDs_new);
5756  current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
5757  deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
5758  }
5759 
5760  // get a vector of unique texture files that are represented in the input tile objects
5761  sort(tex.begin(), tex.end());
5762  std::vector<std::string>::iterator it;
5763  it = std::unique(tex.begin(),tex.end());
5764  tex.resize( std::distance(tex.begin(),it) );
5765 
5766  //create object templates for all the unique texture files
5767  std::vector<uint> object_templates;
5768  std::vector<std::vector<uint>> template_primitives;
5769  for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
5770  {
5771  //create a template object for the current texture
5772  uint object_template = addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, new_subdiv, tex.at(j).c_str());
5773  object_templates.push_back(object_template);
5774  std::vector<uint> object_primitives = getTileObjectPointer(object_template)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5775  template_primitives.push_back(object_primitives);
5776  }
5777 
5778  //keep loop over objects on the outside, otherwise need to update textured_tile_ObjectIDs vector all the time
5779  //for each textured tile object
5780  for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5781  {
5782  //get info from current object
5783  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5784  std::string current_texture_file = current_object_pointer->getTextureFile();
5785 
5786  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5787 
5788  vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5789  vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
5790  vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
5791  SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
5792 
5793  //for unique textures
5794  for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
5795  {
5796  //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
5797  if(current_texture_file == tex.at(j))
5798  {
5799  //delete the original object primitives
5800  deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
5801 
5802  //copy the template primitives and create a new tile with them
5803  std::vector<uint> new_primitives = copyPrimitive(template_primitives.at(j));
5804 
5805  // change the objectID for the new primitives
5806  setPrimitiveParentObjectID(new_primitives, textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5807  current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(new_primitives);
5808  current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
5809 
5810  float IM[16];
5811  makeIdentityMatrix(IM);
5812  current_object_pointer->setTransformationMatrix(IM);
5813 
5814  current_object_pointer->scale(make_vec3(size.x, size.y, 1));
5815 
5816  //transform based on original object data
5817  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
5818  current_object_pointer->rotate(-rotation.elevation , "x");
5819  }
5820  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
5821  current_object_pointer->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
5822  }
5823  current_object_pointer->translate(center);
5824 
5825  }
5826  }
5827  }
5828 
5829 
5830  //delete the template (objects and primitives)
5831  deleteObject(object_templates);
5832 
5833 }
5834 
5835 void Context::setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs, float area_ratio)
5836 {
5837 
5838  //check that all objects are Tile Objects, and get vector of texture files
5839  std::vector<uint> tile_ObjectIDs;
5840  std::vector<uint> textured_tile_ObjectIDs;
5841 
5842  std::vector<std::string> tex;
5843  // for(uint i=1;i<ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5844  for(uint OBJID : ObjectIDs)
5845  {
5846  //check if the object ID is a tile object and if it is add it the tile_ObjectIDs vector
5847  if( getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
5848  {
5849  std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5850  }else if(!(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
5851  std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is missing primitives. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5852  }else{
5853  //test if the tile is textured and push into two different vectors
5854  Patch* p = getPatchPointer_private(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0));
5855  if( !p->hasTexture() ){ //no texture
5856  tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
5857  }else{ //texture
5858  textured_tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
5859  tex.push_back(p->getTextureFile() );
5860  }
5861  }
5862  }
5863 
5864  //Here just call setSubdivisionCount directly for the non-textured tile objects
5865  for(uint i=0;i<tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5866  {
5867  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5868  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5869 
5870  vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5871  vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
5872  vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
5873  SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
5874  RGBcolor color = current_object_pointer->getColorRGB();
5875 
5876  float tile_area = current_object_pointer->getArea();
5877 
5878  // subpatch dimensions needed to keep the correct ratio and have the solid fraction area = the input area
5879  float subpatch_dimension = sqrtf( tile_area / area_ratio);
5880  float subpatch_per_x = size.x / subpatch_dimension;
5881  float subpatch_per_y = size.y / subpatch_dimension;
5882 
5883  float option_1_AR = (tile_area / (size.x / ceil(subpatch_per_x) * size.y / floor(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
5884  float option_2_AR = (tile_area / (size.x / floor(subpatch_per_x) * size.y / ceil(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
5885 
5886  int2 new_subdiv;
5887  if((int)area_ratio == 1){
5888  new_subdiv = make_int2(1, 1);
5889  }else if(option_1_AR >= option_2_AR){
5890  new_subdiv = make_int2(ceil(subpatch_per_x), floor(subpatch_per_y));
5891  }else{
5892  new_subdiv = make_int2(floor(subpatch_per_x), ceil(subpatch_per_y));
5893  }
5894 
5895 
5896  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_new = addTile(center, size, rotation, new_subdiv, color );
5897 
5898  for( uint UUID : UUIDs_new ) {
5899  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5900  }
5901 
5902  current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(UUIDs_new);
5903  current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
5904  deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
5905  }
5906 
5907  // get a vector of unique texture files that are represented in the input tile objects
5908  sort(tex.begin(), tex.end());
5909  std::vector<std::string>::iterator it;
5910  it = std::unique(tex.begin(),tex.end());
5911  tex.resize( std::distance(tex.begin(),it) );
5912 
5913  //create object templates for all the unique texture files
5914  // the assumption here is that all tile objects with the same texture have the same aspect ratio
5915  //if this is not true then the copying method won't work well because a new template will need to be created for each texture/aspect ratio combination
5916 
5917  std::vector<uint> object_templates;
5918  std::vector<std::vector<uint>> template_primitives;
5919  for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
5920  {
5921  //here we just want to get one tile object with the matching texture
5922  uint ii;
5923  for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5924  {
5925  //get info from current object
5926  Tile* current_object_pointer_b = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5927  std::string current_texture_file_b = current_object_pointer_b->getTextureFile();
5928  //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
5929  if(current_texture_file_b == tex.at(j))
5930  {
5931  ii=i;
5932  break;
5933  }
5934  }
5935 
5936  //get info from current object
5937  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(ii));
5938  vec2 tile_size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5939  float tile_area = current_object_pointer->getArea();
5940 
5941  // subpatch dimensions needed to keep the correct ratio and have the solid fraction area = the input area
5942  float subpatch_dimension = sqrtf( tile_area / area_ratio);
5943  float subpatch_per_x = tile_size.x / subpatch_dimension;
5944  float subpatch_per_y = tile_size.y / subpatch_dimension;
5945 
5946  float option_1_AR = (tile_area / (tile_size.x / ceil(subpatch_per_x) * tile_size.y / floor(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
5947  float option_2_AR = (tile_area / (tile_size.x / floor(subpatch_per_x) * tile_size.y / ceil(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
5948 
5949  int2 new_subdiv;
5950  if((int)area_ratio == 1){
5951  new_subdiv = make_int2(1, 1);
5952  }else if(option_1_AR >= option_2_AR){
5953  new_subdiv = make_int2(ceil(subpatch_per_x), floor(subpatch_per_y));
5954  }else{
5955  new_subdiv = make_int2(floor(subpatch_per_x), ceil(subpatch_per_y));
5956  }
5957 
5958  //create a template object for the current texture
5959  uint object_template = addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, new_subdiv, tex.at(j).c_str());
5960  object_templates.push_back(object_template);
5961  std::vector<uint> object_primitives = getTileObjectPointer(object_template)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5962  template_primitives.push_back(object_primitives);
5963  }
5964 
5965  //keep loop over objects on the outside, otherwise need to update textured_tile_ObjectIDs vector all the time
5966  //for each textured tile object
5967  for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5968  {
5969  //get info from current object
5970  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5971  // std::string current_texture_file = getPrimitivePointer_private(current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0))->getTextureFile();
5972  std::string current_texture_file = current_object_pointer->getTextureFile();
5973  // std::cout << "current_texture_file for ObjID " << textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i) << " = " << current_texture_file << std::endl;
5974  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5975 
5976  vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5977  vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
5978  vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
5979  SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
5980 
5981  //for unique textures
5982  for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
5983  {
5984  //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
5985  if(current_texture_file == tex.at(j))
5986  {
5987  //delete the original object primitives
5988  deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
5989 
5990  //copy the template primitives and create a new tile with them
5991  std::vector<uint> new_primitives = copyPrimitive(template_primitives.at(j));
5992 
5993  // change the objectID for the new primitives
5994  setPrimitiveParentObjectID(new_primitives, textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5995 
5996  int2 new_subdiv = getTileObjectPointer(object_templates.at(j))->getSubdivisionCount();
5997  current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(new_primitives);
5998  current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
5999 
6000  float IM[16];
6001  makeIdentityMatrix(IM);
6002  current_object_pointer->setTransformationMatrix(IM);
6003 
6004  current_object_pointer->scale(make_vec3(size.x, size.y, 1));
6005 
6006  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
6007  current_object_pointer->rotate(-rotation.elevation , "x");
6008  }
6009  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
6010  current_object_pointer->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
6011  }
6012  current_object_pointer->translate(center);
6013 
6014  }
6015  }
6016  }
6017 
6018  //delete the template (objects and primitives)
6019  deleteObject(object_templates);
6020 
6021 }
6022 
6023 Tile::Tile(uint a_OID, const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs, const int2 &a_subdiv, const char *a_texturefile, helios::Context *a_context) {
6024 
6025  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
6026 
6027  OID = a_OID;
6028  type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_TILE;
6029  UUIDs = a_UUIDs;
6030  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6031  texturefile = a_texturefile;
6032  context = a_context;
6033 
6034 }
6035 
6036 Tile* Context::getTileObjectPointer(uint ObjID ) const{
6037  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
6038  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
6039  }
6040  return dynamic_cast<Tile*>(objects.at(ObjID));
6041 }
6042 
6043 helios::vec2 Tile::getSize() const{
6044  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
6045  float l = (vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
6046  float w = (vertices.at(3)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
6047  return make_vec2(l,w);
6048 }
6049 
6050 vec3 Tile::getCenter() const{
6051 
6052  vec3 center;
6053  vec3 Y;
6054  Y.x = 0.f;
6055  Y.y = 0.f;
6056  Y.z = 0.f;
6057 
6058  center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
6059  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
6060  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
6061 
6062  return center;
6063 
6064 }
6065 
6066 
6067 helios::int2 Tile::getSubdivisionCount() const{
6068  return subdiv;
6069 }
6070 
6071 void Tile::setSubdivisionCount( const helios::int2 &a_subdiv ){
6072  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6073 }
6074 
6075 
6076 std::vector<helios::vec3> Tile::getVertices() const{
6077 
6078  std::vector<helios::vec3> vertices;
6079  vertices.resize(4);
6080 
6081  //subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
6082  //Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
6083  //Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
6084  //Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6085  //Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6086 
6087 
6088  vec3 Y[4];
6089  Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
6090  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
6091  Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6092  Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6093 
6094  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
6095  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
6096  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
6097  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
6098  }
6099 
6100  // vertices.at(0) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.front() ).at(0);
6101  // vertices.at(1) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x-1 ) ).at(1);
6102  // vertices.at(2) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-1 ) ).at(2);
6103  // vertices.at(3) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-subdiv.x ) ).at(3);
6104 
6105  return vertices;
6106 
6107 }
6108 
6109 vec3 Tile::getNormal() const{
6110 
6111  return context->getPrimitiveNormal( UUIDs.front() );
6112 
6113 }
6114 
6115 std::vector<helios::vec2> Tile::getTextureUV() const{
6116 
6117  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv{ make_vec2(0,0), make_vec2(1,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_vec2(0,1) };
6118 
6119  return uv;
6120 
6121 }
6122 
6123 void Tile::scale(const vec3 &S ){
6124 
6125  float T[16], T_prim[16];
6126  makeScaleMatrix( S, T);
6127  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6128 
6129  for( uint UUID : UUIDs) {
6130 
6131  if (context->doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
6132 
6133  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T_prim);
6134  matmult(T, T_prim, T_prim);
6135  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T_prim);
6136 
6137  }
6138 
6139  }
6140 
6141 }
6142

6148  type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE;
6149  UUIDs = a_UUIDs;
6150  subdiv = a_subdiv;

6162 
6163 float Sphere::getRadius() const{
6164 
6165  vec3 n0(0,0,0), n1(1,0,0);
6166  vec3 n0_T, n1_T;
6167 
6168  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6169  vecmult(transform,n1,n1_T);
6170 
6171  return (n1_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6172 
6173 }
6174 
6175 vec3 Sphere::getCenter() const{
6176 
6177  vec3 center;
6178  vec3 Y;
6179  Y.x = 0.f;
6180  Y.y = 0.f;
6181  Y.z = 0.f;
6182 
6183  center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
6184  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
6185  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
6186 
6187  return center;
6188 
6189 }

6199 void Sphere::scale( float S ){
6200 
6201  float T[16], T_prim[16];
6202  makeScaleMatrix( make_vec3(S,S,S), T);
6203  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6204 
6205  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6206 
6207  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
6208 
6209  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6210  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
6211  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6212 
6213  }
6214 
6215  }
6216 
6217 }

6224  type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE;

6226  nodes = a_nodes;
6227  radius = a_radius;
6228  colors = a_colors;

6242 std::vector<helios::vec3> Tube::getNodes() const{
6243 
6244  std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
6245  nodes_T.resize( nodes.size() );
6246 
6247  for( uint i=0; i<nodes.size(); i++ ){
6248  nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
6249  nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
6250  nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
6251  }
6252 
6253  return nodes_T;
6254 
6255 }
6256 
6257 std::vector<float> Tube::getNodeRadii() const{
6258  std::vector<float> radius_T;
6259  radius_T.resize(radius.size());
6260  for( int i=0; i<radius.size(); i++ ){
6261 
6262  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radius.at(i),0,0);
6263  vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
6264 
6265  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6266  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6267 
6268  radius_T.at(i) = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6269 
6270  }
6271  return radius_T;
6272 }

6295 
6296  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6297  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
6298  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6299 
6300  }
6301 
6302  }

6326 
6327 vec3 Box::getSize() const{
6328 
6329  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(1,0,0), ny(0,1,0), nz(0,0,1);
6330 
6331  vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T, nz_T;
6332 
6333  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6334  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6335  vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
6336  vecmult(transform,nz,nz_T);
6337 
6338  float x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6339  float y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6340  float z = (nz_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6341 
6342  return make_vec3( x, y, z );
6343 
6344 }
6345 
6346 vec3 Box::getCenter() const{
6347 
6348  vec3 center;
6349  vec3 Y;
6350  Y.x = 0.f;
6351  Y.y = 0.f;
6352  Y.z = 0.f;
6353 
6354  center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
6355  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
6356  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
6357 
6358  return center;
6359 
6360 }

6379

6411 vec2 Disk::getSize() const{
6412 
6413  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(1,0,0), ny(0,1,0);
6414  vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T;
6415 
6416  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6417  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6418  vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
6419 
6420  float x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6421  float y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6422 
6423  return make_vec2(x,y);
6424 
6425 }

6436  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
6437  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];

6491 Cone::Cone(uint a_OID, const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs, const vec3 &a_node0, const vec3 &a_node1, float a_radius0,
6492  float a_radius1, uint a_subdiv, const char *a_texturefile, helios::Context *a_context) {
6493 
6494  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
6495 
6496  OID = a_OID;
6497  type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_CONE;
6498  UUIDs = a_UUIDs;
6499  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6500  texturefile = a_texturefile;
6501  context = a_context;
6502  nodes = {a_node0, a_node1};
6503  radii = {a_radius0, a_radius1};
6504

6509  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getConeObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
6510  }
6511  return dynamic_cast<Cone*>(objects.at(ObjID));

6513 
6514 std::vector<helios::vec3> Cone::getNodes() const{
6515 
6516  std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
6517 
6518  nodes_T.resize( 2 );
6519 
6520  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){
6521  nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
6522  nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
6523  nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
6524  }
6525 
6526  return nodes_T;
6527 }
6528 
6529 helios::vec3 Cone::getNode( int number ) const{
6530 
6531  if( number<0 || number>1 ){
6532  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Cone::getNode): node number must be 0 or 1."));
6533  }
6534 
6535  vec3 node_T;
6536 
6537  node_T.x = transform[0] * nodes.at(number).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(number).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(number).z + transform[3];
6538  node_T.y = transform[4] * nodes.at(number).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(number).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(number).z + transform[7];
6539  node_T.z = transform[8] * nodes.at(number).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(number).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(number).z + transform[11];
6540 
6541  return node_T;
6542 }
6543 
6544 std::vector<float> Cone::getNodeRadii() const{
6545  std::vector<float> radii_T;
6546  radii_T.resize(2);
6547  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){
6548 
6549  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radii.at(i),0,0);
6550  vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
6551 
6552  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6553  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6554 
6555  radii_T.at(i) = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6556 
6557  }
6558  return radii_T;
6559 }
6560 
6561 float Cone::getNodeRadius( int number ) const{
6562  if( number<0 || number>1 ){
6563  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Cone::getNodeRadius): node number must be 0 or 1."));
6564  }
6565 
6566  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radii.at(number),0,0);
6567  vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
6568 
6569  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6570  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6571 
6572  return (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6573 }
6574 
6575 uint Cone::getSubdivisionCount() const{
6576  return subdiv;
6577 }
6578 
6579 void Cone::setSubdivisionCount( uint a_subdiv ){
6580  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6581 }
6582 
6583 helios::vec3 Cone::getAxisUnitVector() const{
6584 
6585  std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
6586  nodes_T.resize( 2 );
6587 
6588  for( uint i=0; i<2; i++ ){
6589  nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
6590  nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
6591  nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
6592  }
6593 
6594  helios::vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
6595  float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
6596  axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
6597 
6598  return axis_unit_vector;
6599 }
6600 
6601 float Cone::getLength() const{
6602 
6603  std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
6604  nodes_T.resize( 2);
6605 
6606  for( uint i=0; i<2; i++ ){
6607  nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
6608  nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
6609  nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
6610  }
6611 
6612  float length = powf(powf(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, 2) + powf(nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, 2) + powf(nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z, 2), 0.5);
6613  return length;
6614 }
6615 
6616 void Cone::scaleLength( float S ){
6617 
6618  //get the nodes and radii of the nodes with transformation matrix applied
6619  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodes();
6620  std::vector<float> radii_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodeRadii();
6621 
6622  // calculate the transformed axis unit vector of the cone
6623  vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
6624  float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
6625  axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
6626 
6627  //translate node 0 back to origin
6628  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(-1.0*nodes_T.at(0));
6629 
6630  //rotate the cone to align with z axis
6631  helios::vec3 z_axis = make_vec3(0,0,1);
6632  //get the axis about which to rotate
6633  vec3 ra = cross( z_axis, axis_unit_vector);
6634  //get the angle to rotate
6635  float dot = axis_unit_vector.x*z_axis.x + axis_unit_vector.y*z_axis.y + axis_unit_vector.z*z_axis.z;
6636  float angle = acos_safe(dot);
6637 
6638  //only rotate if the cone is not alread aligned with the z axis (i.e., angle is not zero. If zero, the axis of rotation is 0,0,0 and we end up with problems)
6639  if(angle != float(0.0)){
6640  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( -1*angle, ra );
6641  }
6642 
6643  // scale the cone in the z (length) dimension
6644  float T[16], T_prim[16];
6645  makeScaleMatrix( make_vec3(1,1,S), T);
6646  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6647  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6648  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
6649  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6650  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
6651  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6652  }
6653  }
6654 
6655  //rotate back
6656  if(angle != 0.0){
6657  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( angle, ra );
6658  }
6659 
6660  // //translate back
6661  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(nodes_T.at(0));
6662 
6663 }
6664 
6665 void Cone::scaleGirth( float S ){
6666 
6667  //get the nodes and radii of the nodes with transformation matrix applied
6668  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodes();
6669  std::vector<float> radii_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodeRadii();
6670 
6671  // calculate the transformed axis unit vector of the cone
6672  vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
6673  float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
6674  axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
6675 
6676  //translate node 0 back to origin
6677  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(-1.0*nodes_T.at(0));
6678 
6679  //rotate the cone to align with z axis
6680  helios::vec3 z_axis = make_vec3(0,0,1);
6681  //get the axis about which to rotate
6682  vec3 ra = cross( z_axis, axis_unit_vector);
6683  //get the angle to rotate
6684  float dot = axis_unit_vector.x*z_axis.x + axis_unit_vector.y*z_axis.y + axis_unit_vector.z*z_axis.z;
6685  float angle = acos_safe(dot);
6686  //only rotate if the cone is not alread aligned with the z axis (i.e., angle is not zero. If zero, the axis of rotation is 0,0,0 and we end up with problems)
6687  if(angle != float(0.0)){
6688  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( -1*angle, ra );
6689  }
6690 
6691  // scale the cone in the z (length) dimension
6692  float T[16], T_prim[16];
6693  makeScaleMatrix( make_vec3(S,S,1), T);
6694  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6695  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6696  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
6697  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6698  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
6699  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6700  }
6701  }
6702 
6703  //rotate back
6704  if(angle != 0.0){
6705  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( angle, ra );
6706  }
6707 
6708  // //translate back
6709  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(nodes_T.at(0));
6710 
6711 }
6712 
6713 uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius ){
6714 
6715  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
6716 
6717  return addSphereObject(Ndivs,center,radius,color);
6718 
6719 }
6720 
6721 uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const RGBcolor &color ){
6722 
6723  if( radius<=0.f ){
6724  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addSphereObject): Radius of sphere must be positive."));
6725  }
6726 
6727  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6728 
6729  float theta;
6730  float dtheta=float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
6731  float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
6732 
6733  //bottom cap
6734  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6735 
6736  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
6737  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6738  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6739 
6740  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
6741 
6742  }
6743 
6744  //top cap
6745  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6746 
6747  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
6748  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6749  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6750 
6751  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
6752 
6753  }
6754 
6755  //middle
6756  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6757  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
6758 
6759  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6760  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6761  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6762  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6763 
6764  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
6765  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
6766 
6767  }
6768  }
6769 
6770  auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, "", this));
6771 
6772  float T[16], transform[16];
6773  sphere_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6774 
6775  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(radius,radius,radius),T);
6776  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6777 
6778  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
6779  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6780 
6781  sphere_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6782 
6783  sphere_new->setColor( color );
6784 
6785  for( uint p : UUID){
6786  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6787  }
6788 
6789  objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
6790  currentObjectID++;
6791  return currentObjectID-1;
6792 
6793 
6794 }
6795 
6796 uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const char* texturefile ){
6797 
6798  if( radius<=0.f ){
6799  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addSphereObject): Radius of sphere must be positive."));
6800  }
6801 
6802  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6803 
6804  float theta;
6805  float dtheta=float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
6806  float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
6807 
6808  //bottom cap
6809  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6810 
6811  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
6812  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6813  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6814 
6815  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
6816  n0.normalize();
6817  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
6818  n1.normalize();
6819  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
6820  n2.normalize();
6821 
6822  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sinf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cosf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6823  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6824  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6825 
6826  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
6827  uv2.x = 1;
6828  }
6829 
6830  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
6831 
6832  }
6833 
6834  //top cap
6835  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6836 
6837  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
6838  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6839  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6840 
6841  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
6842  n0.normalize();
6843  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
6844  n1.normalize();
6845  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
6846  n2.normalize();
6847 
6848  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sin((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cos((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6849  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6850  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6851 
6852  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
6853  uv2.x = 1;
6854  }
6855 
6856  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
6857 
6858  }
