6859 
6860  //middle
6861  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6862  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
6863 
6864  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6865  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6866  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6867  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6868 
6869  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
6870  n0.normalize();
6871  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
6872  n1.normalize();
6873  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
6874  n2.normalize();
6875  vec3 n3 = v3-center;
6876  n3.normalize();
6877 
6878  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n0.x, -n0.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6879  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6880  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6881  vec2 uv3 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n3.x, -n3.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n3.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6882 
6883  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
6884  uv2.x = 1;
6885  uv3.x = 1;
6886  }
6887 
6888  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
6889  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,texturefile,uv0,uv2,uv3) );
6890 
6891  }
6892  }
6893 
6894  auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
6895 
6896  float T[16], transform[16];
6897  sphere_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6898 
6899  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(radius,radius,radius),T);
6900  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6901 
6902  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
6903  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6904 
6905  sphere_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6906 
6907  for( uint p : UUID){
6908  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6909  }
6910 
6911  objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
6912  currentObjectID++;
6913  return currentObjectID-1;
6914 
6915 
6916 }
6917 
6918 uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv) {
6919 
6920  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
6921 
6922  return addTileObject(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
6923 }
6924 
6925 uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
6926 
6927  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
6928  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Size of tile must be greater than 0."));
6929  }
6930  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 ){
6931  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Number of tile subdivisions must be greater than 0."));
6932  }
6933 
6934  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6935 
6936  vec2 subsize;
6937  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
6938  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
6939 
6940  vec3 subcenter;
6941 
6942  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
6943  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
6944 
6945  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0.f);
6946 
6947  UUID.push_back( addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color ) );
6948 
6949  if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
6950  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
6951  }
6952  if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
6953  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
6954  }
6955  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->translate( center );
6956 
6957  }
6958  }
6959 
6960  auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, "", this));
6961 
6962  float T[16], S[16], R[16];
6963 
6964  float transform[16];
6965  tile_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6966 
6967  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),S);
6968  matmult(S,transform,transform);
6969 
6970  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.elevation,"x",R);
6971  matmult(R,transform,transform);
6972  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.azimuth,"z",R);
6973  matmult(R,transform,transform);
6974 
6975  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
6976  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6977 
6978  tile_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6979 
6980  tile_new->setColor( color );
6981 
6982  for( uint p : UUID){
6983  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6984  }
6985 
6986  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
6987  currentObjectID++;
6988  return currentObjectID-1;
6989 
6990 }
6991 
6992 uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
6993 
6994  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
6995  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Size of tile must be greater than 0."));
6996  }
6997  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 ){
6998  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Number of tile subdivisions must be greater than 0."));
6999  }
7000 
7001  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7002 
7003  vec2 subsize;
7004  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
7005  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
7006 
7007  vec3 subcenter;
7008 
7009  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
7010  uv.resize(4);
7011  vec2 uv_sub;
7012  uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
7013  uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
7014 
7015  addTexture( texturefile );
7016  const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha;
7017  int2 sz;
7018  if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
7019  alpha = textures.at(texturefile).getTransparencyData();
7020  sz = textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
7021  }
7022 
7023  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
7024  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
7025 
7026  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0.f);
7027 
7028  uv.at(0) = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
7029  uv.at(1) = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
7030  uv.at(2) = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
7031  uv.at(3) = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
7032 
7033  float solid_fraction;
7034  if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
7035  int A = 0;
7036  int At = 0;
7037 
7038  int2 uv_min( floor(uv.at(0).x*(float(sz.x)-1.f)), floor(uv.at(0).y*(float(sz.y)-1.f)) );
7039  int2 uv_max( floor(uv.at(2).x*(float(sz.x)-1.f)), floor(uv.at(2).y*(float(sz.y)-1.f)) );
7040 
7041  assert( uv_min.x>=0 && uv_min.y>=0 && uv_max.x<sz.x && uv_max.y<sz.y );
7042 
7043  for( int jj=uv_min.y; jj<uv_max.y; jj++ ){
7044  for( int ii=uv_min.x; ii<uv_max.x; ii++ ){
7045  At += 1;
7046  if( alpha->at(jj).at(ii) ){
7047  A += 1;
7048  }
7049  }
7050  }
7051  if( At==0 ){
7052  solid_fraction = 0;
7053  }else{
7054  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
7055  }
7056  }else{
7057  solid_fraction = 1.f;
7058  }
7059 
7060  auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texturefile, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
7061 
7062  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
7063 
7064  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
7065  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
7066 
7067  patch_new->translate( subcenter );
7068 
7069  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
7070  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
7071  }
7072  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
7073  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
7074  }
7075 
7076  patch_new->translate( center );
7077 
7078  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
7079  markGeometryDirty();
7080  currentUUID++;
7081  UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
7082 
7083 
7084  }
7085  }
7086 
7087  auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, texturefile, this));
7088 
7089  float T[16], S[16], R[16];
7090 
7091  float transform[16];
7092  tile_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7093 
7094  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),S);
7095  matmult(S,transform,transform);
7096 
7097  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.elevation,"x",R);
7098  matmult(R,transform,transform);
7099  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.azimuth,"z",R);
7100  matmult(R,transform,transform);
7101 
7102  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7103  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7104 
7105  tile_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7106 
7107  for( uint p : UUID){
7108  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7109  }
7110 
7111  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
7112  currentObjectID++;
7113  return currentObjectID-1;
7114 
7115 }
7116 
7117 uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius ){
7118 
7119  uint node_count = nodes.size();
7120 
7121  std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
7122  color.resize(node_count);
7123 
7124  for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
7125  color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
7126  }
7127 
7128  return addTubeObject(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
7129 
7130 }
7131 
7132 uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const std::vector<RGBcolor> &color ){
7133 
7134  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
7135 
7136  if( node_count==0 ){
7137  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Node and radius arrays are empty."));
7138  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
7139  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree."));
7140  }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
7141  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree."));
7142  }
7143 
7144  vec3 vec, convec;
7145  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
7146  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
7147  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
7148  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
7149  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
7150  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7151  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
7152  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
7153  }
7154  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
7155 
7156  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7157  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7158  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7159  }
7160 
7161  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
7162 
7163  if(i==0){
7164  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
7165  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
7166  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
7167  }else if(i==node_count-1){
7168  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
7169  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
7170  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
7171  }else{
7172  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
7173  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
7174  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
7175  }
7176 
7177  float norm;
7178  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
7179  norm=convec.magnitude();
7180  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
7181  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
7182  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
7183  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
7184  norm=nvec.magnitude();
7185  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
7186  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
7187  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
7188 
7189 
7190 
7191  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7192  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
7193  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
7194  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
7195 
7196  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
7197  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
7198  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
7199 
7200  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
7201  }
7202 
7203  }
7204 
7205  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
7206  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7207 
7208  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
7209  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7210 
7211  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7212  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7213  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
7214 
7215  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7216  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
7217  //}
7218 
7219  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7220  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
7221  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7222 
7223  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7224  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
7225  //}
7226 
7227  }
7228  }
7229 
7230  auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUID, nodes, radius, color, Ndivs, "", this));
7231 
7232  float T[16], transform[16];
7233  tube_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7234 
7235  for( uint p : UUID){
7236  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7237  }
7238 
7239  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
7240  currentObjectID++;
7241  return currentObjectID-1;
7242 
7243 }
7244 
7245 uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const char* texturefile ){
7246 
7247  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
7248 
7249  if( node_count==0 ){
7250  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Node and radius arrays are empty."));
7251  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
7252  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree."));
7253  }
7254 
7255  vec3 vec, convec;
7256  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
7257  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
7258  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
7259  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
7260  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
7261  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
7262  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
7263  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7264  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
7265  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
7266  uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
7267  }
7268  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
7269 
7270  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7271  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7272  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7273  }
7274 
7275  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
7276 
7277  if(i==0){
7278  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
7279  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
7280  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
7281  }else if(i==node_count-1){
7282  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
7283  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
7284  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
7285  }else{
7286  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
7287  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
7288  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
7289  }
7290 
7291  float norm;
7292  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
7293  norm=convec.magnitude();
7294  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
7295  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
7296  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
7297  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
7298  norm=nvec.magnitude();
7299  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
7300  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
7301  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
7302 
7303  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7304  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
7305  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
7306  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
7307 
7308  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
7309  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
7310  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
7311 
7312  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
7313  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
7314 
7315  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
7316  }
7317 
7318  }
7319 
7320  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
7321  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
7322  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7323 
7324  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
7325  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7326 
7327  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7328  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7329  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
7330 
7331  uv0 = uv[j][i];
7332  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
7333  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
7334 
7335  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7336  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
7337  }
7338 
7339  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7340  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
7341  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7342 
7343  uv0 = uv[j][i];
7344  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
7345  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
7346 
7347  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7348  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
7349  }
7350 
7351  }
7352  }
7353 
7354  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
7355 
7356  auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUID, nodes, radius, colors, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
7357 
7358  float T[16], transform[16];
7359  tube_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7360 
7361  for( uint p : UUID){
7362  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7363  }
7364 
7365  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
7366  currentObjectID++;
7367  return currentObjectID-1;
7368 
7369 }
7370 
7371 uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv ){
7372 
7373  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
7374 
7375  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
7376 }
7377 
7378 uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
7379  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
7380 }
7381 
7382 uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
7383  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
7384 }
7385 
7386 uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color, bool reverse_normals ){
7387 
7388  if( size.x<=0 || size.y<=0 || size.z<=0 ){
7389  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addBoxObject): Size of box must be positive."));
7390  }
7391  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 || subdiv.z<1 ){
7392  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addBoxObject): Number of box subdivisions must be positive."));
7393  }
7394 
7395  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7396 
7397  vec3 subsize;
7398  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
7399  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
7400  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
7401 
7402  vec3 subcenter;
7403  uint objID;
7404  std::vector<uint> U, U_copy;
7405 
7406  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
7407 
7408  // x-z faces (vertical)
7409 
7410  //right
7411  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7412  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
7413  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7414 
7415  //left
7416  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7417  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
7418  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7419 
7420  // y-z faces (vertical)
7421 
7422  //front
7423  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7424  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,1.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
7425  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7426 
7427  //back
7428  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7429  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
7430  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7431 
7432  // x-y faces (horizontal)
7433 
7434  //top
7435  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7436  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
7437  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7438 
7439  //bottom
7440  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7441  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
7442  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7443 
7444  }else{ //normals point outward
7445 
7446  // x-z faces (vertical)
7447 
7448  //right
7449  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7450  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
7451  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7452 
7453  //left
7454  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7455  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
7456  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7457 
7458  // y-z faces (vertical)
7459 
7460  //front
7461  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7462  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
7463  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7464 
7465  //back
7466  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7467  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,1.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
7468  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7469 
7470  // x-y faces (horizontal)
7471 
7472  //top
7473  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7474  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
7475  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7476 
7477  //bottom
7478  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7479  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
7480  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7481 
7482  }
7483 
7484  auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, "", this));
7485 
7486  float T[16], transform[16];
7487  box_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7488 
7489  makeScaleMatrix(size,T);
7490  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7491 
7492  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7493  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7494 
7495  box_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7496 
7497  box_new->setColor( color );
7498 
7499  for( uint p : UUID){
7500  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7501  }
7502 
7503  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
7504  currentObjectID++;
7505  return currentObjectID-1;
7506 
7507 }
7508 
7509 uint Context::addBoxObject(vec3 center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile, bool reverse_normals ){
7510 
7511  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7512 
7513  vec3 subsize;
7514  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
7515  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
7516  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
7517 
7518  vec3 subcenter;
7519  uint objID;
7520  std::vector<uint> U, U_copy;
7521 
7522  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
7523 
7524  // x-z faces (vertical)
7525 
7526  //right
7527  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7528  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7529  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7530 
7531  //left
7532  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7533  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7534  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7535 
7536  // y-z faces (vertical)
7537 
7538  //front
7539  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7540  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7541  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7542 
7543  //back
7544  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7545  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7546  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7547 
7548  // x-y faces (horizontal)
7549 
7550  //top
7551  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7552  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
7553  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7554 
7555  //bottom
7556  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7557  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
7558  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7559 
7560  }else{ //normals point outward
7561 
7562  // x-z faces (vertical)
7563 
7564  //right
7565  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7566  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7567  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7568 
7569  //left
7570  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7571  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7572  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7573 
7574  // y-z faces (vertical)
7575 
7576  //front
7577  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7578  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7579  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7580 
7581  //back
7582  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7583  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7584  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7585 
7586  // x-y faces (horizontal)
7587 
7588  //top
7589  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7590  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
7591  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7592 
7593  //bottom
7594  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7595  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
7596  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7597 
7598  }
7599 
7600  auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, texturefile, this));
7601 
7602  float T[16], transform[16];
7603  box_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7604 
7605  makeScaleMatrix(size,T);
7606  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7607 
7608  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7609  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7610 
7611  box_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7612 
7613  for( uint p : UUID){
7614  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7615  }
7616 
7617  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
7618  currentObjectID++;
7619  return currentObjectID-1;
7620 
7621 
7622 }
7623 
7624 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size ){
7625  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
7626 }
7627 
7628 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation ){
7629  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
7630 }
7631 
7632 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &color ){
7633  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
7634 }
7635 
7636 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBAcolor &color ){
7637 
7638  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7639  UUID.resize(Ndivs);
7640 
7641  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
7642 
7643  float dtheta = 2.f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
7644 
7645  UUID.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), color );
7646  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
7647  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
7648  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->translate( center );
7649 
7650  }
7651 
7652  auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, "", this));
7653 
7654  float T[16], transform[16];
7655  disk_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7656 
7657  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),T);
7658  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7659 
7660  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7661  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7662 
7663  disk_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7664 
7665  disk_new->setColor( color );
7666 
7667  for( uint p : UUID){
7668  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7669  }
7670 
7671  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
7672  currentObjectID++;
7673  return currentObjectID-1;
7674 
7675 }
7676 
7677 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const char* texture_file ){
7678 
7679  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7680  UUID.resize(Ndivs);
7681 
7682  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
7683 
7684  float dtheta = 2.f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
7685 
7686  UUID.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(dtheta*float(i))),0.5f*(1.f+sinf(dtheta*float(i)))), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(dtheta*float(i+1))),0.5f*(1.f+sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)))) );
7687  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
7688  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
7689  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->translate( center );
7690 
7691  }
7692 
7693  auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, texture_file, this));
7694 
7695  float T[16], transform[16];
7696  disk_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7697 
7698  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),T);
7699  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7700 
7701  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7702  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7703 
7704  disk_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7705 
7706  for( uint p : UUID){
7707  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7708  }
7709 
7710  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
7711  currentObjectID++;
7712  return currentObjectID-1;
7713 
7714 }
7715 
7716 uint Context::addPolymeshObject(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ){
7717 
7718  auto* polymesh_new = (new Polymesh(currentObjectID, UUIDs, "", this));
7719 
7720  polymesh_new->setColor( getPrimitivePointer_private( UUIDs.front())->getColor() );
7721 
7722  float T[16], transform[16];
7723  polymesh_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7724 
7725  makeTranslationMatrix( getPrimitivePointer_private( UUIDs.front())->getVertices().front(),T);
7726  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7727 
7728  polymesh_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7729 
7730  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
7731  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7732  }
7733 
7734  objects[currentObjectID] = polymesh_new;
7735  currentObjectID++;
7736  return currentObjectID-1;
7737 
7738 }
7739 
7740 uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1 ){
7741 
7742  RGBcolor color;
7743  color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
7744  return addConeObject(Ndivs, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, color);
7745 }
7746 
7747 uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const RGBcolor &color ){
7748 
7749  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
7750  std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
7751 
7752  vec3 vec, convec;
7753  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
7754  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
7755  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
7756  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
7757  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
7758  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7759  xyz.at(j).resize(2);
7760  normal.at(j).resize(2);
7761  }
7762  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
7763 
7764  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7765  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7766  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7767  }
7768 
7769  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
7770 
7771  if(i==0){
7772  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
7773  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
7774  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
7775  }else if(i==1){
7776  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
7777  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
7778  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
7779  }
7780 
7781  float norm;
7782  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
7783  norm=convec.magnitude();
7784  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
7785  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
7786  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
7787  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
7788  norm=nvec.magnitude();
7789  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
7790  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
7791  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
7792 
7793  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7794  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
7795  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
7796  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
7797 
7798  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
7799  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
7800  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
7801 
7802  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
7803  }
7804 
7805  }
7806 
7807  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
7808  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7809 
7810  for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
7811  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7812 
7813  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7814  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7815  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
7816 
7817  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
7818 
7819  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7820  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
7821  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7822 
7823  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
7824 
7825  }
7826  }
7827 
7828  auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUID, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, Ndivs, "", this));
7829 
7830  float T[16], transform[16];
7831  cone_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7832 
7833  makeTranslationMatrix(nodes.front(),T);
7834  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7835 
7836  cone_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7837 
7838  for( uint p : UUID){
7839  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7840  }
7841 
7842  cone_new->setColor( color );
7843 
7844  objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
7845  currentObjectID++;
7846  return currentObjectID-1;
7847 
7848 }
7849 
7850 uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const char* texturefile ){
7851 
7852  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
7853  std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
7854 
7855  vec3 vec, convec;
7856  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
7857  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
7858  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
7859  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
7860  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
7861  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
7862  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
7863  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7864  xyz.at(j).resize(2);
7865  normal.at(j).resize(2);
7866  uv.at(j).resize(2);
7867  }
7868  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
7869 
7870  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7871  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7872  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7873  }
7874 
7875  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
7876 
7877  if(i==0){
7878  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
7879  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
7880  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
7881  }else if(i==1){
7882  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
7883  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
7884  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
7885  }
7886 
7887  float norm;
7888  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
7889  norm=convec.magnitude();
7890  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
7891  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
7892  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
7893  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
7894  norm=nvec.magnitude();
7895  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
7896  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
7897  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
7898 
7899  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7900  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
7901  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
7902  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
7903 
7904  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
7905  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
7906  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
7907 
7908  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(2-1);
7909  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
7910 
7911  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
7912  }
7913 
7914  }
7915 
7916  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
7917  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
7918  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7919 
7920  for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
7921  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7922 
7923  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7924  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7925  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
7926 
7927  uv0 = uv[j][i];
7928  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
7929  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
7930 
7931  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7932  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
7933  }
7934 
7935  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7936  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
7937  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7938 
7939  uv0 = uv[j][i];
7940  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
7941  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
7942 
7943  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7944  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
7945  }
7946 
7947  }
7948  }
7949 
7950  auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUID, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
7951 
7952  float T[16], transform[16];
7953  cone_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7954 
7955  makeTranslationMatrix(nodes.front(),T);
7956  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7957 
7958  cone_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7959 
7960  for( uint p : UUID){
7961  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7962  }
7963 
7964  objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
7965  currentObjectID++;
7966  return currentObjectID-1;
7967 
7968 }
7969 
7970 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius ){
7971 
7972  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
7973 
7974  return addSphere(Ndivs,center,radius,color);
7975 
7976 }
7977 
7978 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const RGBcolor &color ){
7979 
7980  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7981 
7982  float theta;
7983  float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
7984  float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
7985 
7986  //bottom cap
7987  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7988 
7989  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
7990  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
7991  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
7992 
7993  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
7994 
7995  }
7996 
7997  //top cap
7998  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7999 
8000  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
8001  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8002  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8003 
8004  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
8005 
8006  }
8007 
8008  //middle
8009  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8010  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
8011 
8012  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8013  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8014  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8015  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8016 
8017  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
8018  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
8019 
8020  }
8021  }
8022 
8023  return UUID;
8024 
8025 
8026 }
8027 
8028 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const char* texturefile ){
8029 
8030  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8031 
8032  float theta;
8033  float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
8034  float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
8035 
8036  //bottom cap
8037  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8038 
8039  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
8040  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8041  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8042 
8043  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
8044  n0.normalize();
8045  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
8046  n1.normalize();
8047  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
8048  n2.normalize();
8049 
8050  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sin((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cos((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8051  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8052  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8053 
8054  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
8055  uv2.x = 1;
8056  }
8057 
8058  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
8059 
8060  }
8061 
8062  //top cap
8063  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8064 
8065  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
8066  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8067  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8068 
8069  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
8070  n0.normalize();
8071  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
8072  n1.normalize();
8073  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
8074  n2.normalize();
8075 
8076  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sinf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cosf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8077  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8078  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8079 
8080  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
8081  uv2.x = 1;
8082  }
8083 
8084  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
8085 
8086  }
8087 
8088  //middle
8089  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8090  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
8091 
8092  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8093  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8094  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8095  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8096 
8097  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
8098  n0.normalize();
8099  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
8100  n1.normalize();
8101  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
8102  n2.normalize();
8103  vec3 n3 = v3-center;
8104  n3.normalize();
8105 
8106  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n0.x, -n0.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8107  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8108  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8109  vec2 uv3 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n3.x, -n3.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n3.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8110 
8111  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
8112  uv2.x = 1;
8113  uv3.x = 1;
8114  }
8115 
8116  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
8117  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,texturefile,uv0,uv2,uv3) );
8118 
8119  }
8120  }
8121 
8122  return UUID;
8123 
8124 
8125 }
8126 
8127 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv ){
8128 
8129  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8130 
8131  return addTile(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
8132 }
8133 
8134 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
8135 
8136  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8137 
8138  vec2 subsize;
8139  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
8140  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
8141 
8142  vec3 subcenter;
8143 
8144  UUID.resize( subdiv.x*subdiv.y );
8145 
8146  size_t t = 0;
8147  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
8148  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
8149 
8150  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0);
8151 
8152  UUID[t] = addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color );
8153 
8154  if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
8155  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
8156  }
8157  if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
8158  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
8159  }
8160  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->translate( center );
8161 
8162  t++;
8163 
8164  }
8165  }
8166 
8167  return UUID;
8168 
8169 }
8170 
8171 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
8172 
8173  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8174 
8175  vec2 subsize;
8176  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
8177  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
8178 
8179  vec3 subcenter;
8180 
8181  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
8182  uv.resize(4);
8183  vec2 uv_sub;
8184  uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
8185  uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
8186 
8187  addTexture( texturefile );
8188  std::vector<std::vector<bool> > alpha;
8189  int2 sz;
8190  if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
8191  alpha = *textures.at(texturefile).getTransparencyData();
8192  sz = textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
8193  }
8194 
8195  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
8196  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
8197 
8198  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0);
8199 
8200  uv[0] = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
8201  uv[1] = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
8202  uv[2] = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
8203  uv[3] = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
8204 
8205  float solid_fraction;
8206  if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
8207  int A = 0;
8208  int At = 0;
8209 
8210  int2 uv_min( floor(uv[0].x*float(sz.x-1)), floor(uv[0].y*float(sz.y-1)) );
8211  int2 uv_max( floor(uv[2].x*float(sz.x-1)), floor(uv[2].y*float(sz.y-1)) );
8212 
8213  assert( uv_min.x>=0 && uv_min.y>=0 && uv_max.x<sz.x && uv_max.y<sz.y );
8214 
8215  for( int jj=uv_min.y; jj<uv_max.y; jj++ ){
8216  for( int ii=uv_min.x; ii<uv_max.x; ii++ ){
8217  At += 1;
8218  if( alpha[jj][ii] ){
8219  A += 1;
8220  }
8221  }
8222  }
8223  if( At==0 ){
8224  solid_fraction = 0;
8225  }else{
8226  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
8227  }
8228  }else{
8229  solid_fraction = 1.f;
8230  }
8231 
8232  if( solid_fraction==0.f ){
8233  continue;
8234  }
8235 
8236  auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texturefile, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
8237 
8238  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
8239 
8240  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
8241  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
8242 
8243  patch_new->translate( subcenter );
8244 
8245  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
8246  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
8247  }
8248  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
8249  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
8250  }
8251 
8252  patch_new->translate( center );
8253 
8254  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
8255  markGeometryDirty();
8256  currentUUID++;
8257  UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
8258 
8259 
8260  }
8261  }
8262 
8263  return UUID;
8264 
8265 }
8266 
8267 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius ){
8268 
8269  uint node_count = nodes.size();
8270 
8271  std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
8272  color.resize(node_count);
8273 
8274  for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
8275  color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8276  }
8277 
8278  return addTube(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
8279 
8280 }
8281 
8282 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const std::vector<RGBcolor> &color ){
8283 
8284  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
8285 
8286  if( node_count==0 ){
8287  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty."));
8288  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
8289  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree."));
8290  }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
8291  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree."));
8292  }
8293 
8294  vec3 vec, convec;
8295  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
8296  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
8297  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
8298  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
8299  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
8300  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8301  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
8302  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
8303  }
8304  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
8305 
8306  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8307  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8308  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8309  }
8310 
8311  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
8312 
8313  if(i==0){
8314  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
8315  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
8316  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
8317  }else if(i==node_count-1){
8318  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
8319  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
8320  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
8321  }else{
8322  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
8323  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
8324  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
8325  }
8326 
8327  float norm;
8328  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
8329  norm=convec.magnitude();
8330  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
8331  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
8332  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
8333  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
8334  norm=nvec.magnitude();
8335  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
8336  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
8337  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
8338 
8339 
8340 
8341  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8342  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
8343  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
8344  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
8345 
8346  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
8347  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
8348  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
8349 
8350  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
8351  }
8352 
8353  }
8354 
8355  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
8356  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8357 
8358  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
8359  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8360 
8361  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8362  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8363  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
8364 
8365  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8366  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
8367  //}
8368 
8369  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8370  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
8371  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8372 
8373  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8374  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
8375  //}
8376 
8377  }
8378  }
8379 
8380  return UUID;
8381 
8382 }
8383 
8384 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const char* texturefile ){
8385 
8386  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
8387 
8388  if( node_count==0 ){
8389  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty."));
8390  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
8391  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree."));
8392  }
8393 
8394  vec3 vec, convec;
8395  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
8396  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
8397  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
8398  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
8399  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
8400  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
8401  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
8402  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8403  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
8404  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
8405  uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
8406  }
8407  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
8408 
8409  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8410  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8411  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8412  }
8413 
8414  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
8415 
8416  if(i==0){
8417  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
8418  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
8419  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
8420  }else if(i==node_count-1){
8421  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
8422  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
8423  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
8424  }else{
8425  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
8426  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
8427  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
8428  }
8429 
8430  float norm;
8431  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
8432  norm=convec.magnitude();
8433  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
8434  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
8435  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
8436  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
8437  norm=nvec.magnitude();
8438  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
8439  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
8440  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
8441 
8442  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8443  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
8444  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
8445  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
8446 
8447  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
8448  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
8449  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
8450 
8451  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
8452  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
8453 
8454  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
8455  }
8456 
8457  }
8458 
8459  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
8460  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
8461  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8462 
8463  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
8464  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8465 
8466  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8467  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8468  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
8469 
8470  uv0 = uv[j][i];
8471  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
8472  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
8473 
8474  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8475  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
8476  }
8477 
8478  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8479  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
8480  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8481 
8482  uv0 = uv[j][i];
8483  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
8484  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
8485 
8486  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8487  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
8488  }
8489 
8490  }
8491  }
8492 
8493  return UUID;
8494 
8495 }
8496 
8497 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv ){
8498 
8499  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8500 
8501  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
8502 }
8503 
8504 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
8505  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
8506 }
8507 
8508 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
8509  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
8510 }
8511 
8512 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color, bool reverse_normals ){
8513 
8514  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8515 
8516  vec3 subsize;
8517  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
8518  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
8519  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
8520 
8521  vec3 subcenter;
8522  std::vector<uint> U;
8523 
8524  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
8525 
8526  // x-z faces (vertical)
8527 
8528  //right
8529  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8530  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
8531  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8532 
8533  //left
8534  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8535  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
8536  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8537 
8538  // y-z faces (vertical)
8539 
8540  //front
8541  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8542  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
8543  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8544 
8545  //back
8546  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8547  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
8548  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8549 
8550  // x-y faces (horizontal)
8551 
8552  //top
8553  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8554  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
8555  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8556 
8557  //bottom
8558  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8559  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
8560  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8561 
8562  }else{ //normals point outward
8563 
8564  // x-z faces (vertical)
8565 
8566  //right
8567  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8568  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
8569  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8570 
8571  //left
8572  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8573  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
8574  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8575 
8576  // y-z faces (vertical)
8577 
8578  //front
8579  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8580  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
8581  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8582 
8583  //back
8584  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8585  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
8586  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8587 
8588  // x-y faces (horizontal)
8589 
8590  //top
8591  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8592  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
8593  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8594 
8595  //bottom
8596  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8597  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
8598  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8599 
8600  }
8601 
8602  return UUID;
8603 
8604 }
8605 
8606 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile, bool reverse_normals ){
8607 
8608  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8609 
8610  vec3 subsize;
8611  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
8612  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
8613  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
8614 
8615  vec3 subcenter;
8616  std::vector<uint> U;
8617 
8618  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
8619 
8620  // x-z faces (vertical)
8621 
8622  //right
8623  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8624  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8625  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8626 
8627  //left
8628  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8629  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8630  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8631 
8632  // y-z faces (vertical)
8633 
8634  //front
8635  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8636  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8637  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8638 
8639  //back
8640  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8641  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8642  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8643 
8644  // x-y faces (horizontal)
8645 
8646  //top
8647  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8648  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
8649  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8650 
8651  //bottom
8652  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8653  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
8654  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8655 
8656  }else{ //normals point outward
8657 
8658  // x-z faces (vertical)
8659 
8660  //right
8661  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8662  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8663  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8664 
8665  //left
8666  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8667  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8668  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8669 
8670  // y-z faces (vertical)
8671 
8672  //front
8673  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8674  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8675  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8676 
8677  //back
8678  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8679  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8680  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8681 
8682  // x-y faces (horizontal)
8683 
8684  //top
8685  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8686  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
8687  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8688 
8689  //bottom
8690  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8691  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
8692  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8693 
8694  }
8695 
8696  return UUID;
8697 
8698 }
8699 
8700 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size ){
8701  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
8702 }
8703 
8704 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation ){
8705  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
8706 }
8707 
8708 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &color ){
8709  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
8710 }
8711 
8712 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBAcolor &color ){
8713 
8714  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
8715  UUIDs.resize(Ndivs);
8716 
8717  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
8718 
8719  float dtheta = 2.f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
8720 
8721  UUIDs.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), color );
8722  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
8723  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
8724  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->translate( center );
8725 
8726  }
8727 
8728  return UUIDs;
8729 
8730 }
8731 
8732 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const char* texture_file ){
8733 
8734  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
8735  UUIDs.resize(Ndivs);
8736 
8737  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
8738 
8739  float dtheta = 2.f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
8740 
8741  UUIDs.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(dtheta*float(i))),0.5f*(1.f+sinf(dtheta*float(i)))), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(dtheta*float(i+1))),0.5f*(1.f+sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)))) );
8742  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
8743  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
8744  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->translate( center );
8745 
8746  }
8747 
8748  return UUIDs;
8749 
8750 }
8751 
8752 std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1 ){
8753 
8754  RGBcolor color;
8755  color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8756 
8757  return addCone(Ndivs, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, color);
8758 
8759 }
8760 
8761 std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, RGBcolor &color ){
8762 
8763  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
8764  std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
8765 
8766  vec3 vec, convec;
8767  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
8768  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
8769  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
8770  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
8771  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
8772  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8773  xyz.at(j).resize(2);
8774  normal.at(j).resize(2);
8775  }
8776  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
8777 
8778  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8779  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8780  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8781  }
8782 
8783  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
8784 
8785  if(i==0){
8786  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
8787  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
8788  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
8789  }else if(i==1){
8790  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
8791  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
8792  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
8793  }
8794 
8795  float norm;
8796  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
8797  norm=convec.magnitude();
8798  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
8799  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
8800  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
8801  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
8802  norm=nvec.magnitude();
8803  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
8804  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
8805  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
8806 
8807 
8808 
8809  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8810  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
8811  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
8812  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
8813 
8814  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
8815  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
8816  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
8817 
8818  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
8819  }
8820 
8821  }
8822 
8823  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
8824  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8825 
8826  for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
8827  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8828 
8829  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8830  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8831  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
8832 
8833  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
8834 
8835  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8836  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
8837  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8838 
8839  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
8840 
8841 
8842  }
8843  }
8844 
8845  return UUID;
8846 
8847 }
8848 
8849 std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const char* texturefile ){
8850 
8851  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
8852  std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
8853 
8854  vec3 vec, convec;
8855  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
8856  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
8857  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
8858  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
8859  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
8860  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
8861  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
8862  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8863  xyz.at(j).resize(2);
8864  normal.at(j).resize(2);
8865  uv.at(j).resize(2);
8866  }
8867  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
8868 
8869  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8870  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8871  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8872  }
8873 
8874  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
8875 
8876  if(i==0){
8877  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
8878  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
8879  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
8880  }else if(i==1){
8881  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
8882  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
8883  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
8884  }
8885 
8886  float norm;
8887  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
8888  norm=convec.magnitude();
8889  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
8890  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
8891  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
8892  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
8893  norm=nvec.magnitude();
8894  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
8895  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
8896  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
8897 
8898  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8899  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
8900  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
8901  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
8902 
8903  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
8904  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
8905  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
8906 
8907  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(2-1);
8908  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
8909 
8910  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
8911  }
8912 
8913  }
8914 
8915  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
8916  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
8917  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8918 
8919  for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
8920  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8921 
8922  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8923  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8924  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
8925 
8926  uv0 = uv[j][i];
8927  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
8928  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
8929 
8930  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8931  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
8932  }
8933 
8934  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8935  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
8936  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8937 
8938  uv0 = uv[j][i];
8939  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
8940  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
8941 
8942  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8943  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
8944  }
8945 
8946  }
8947  }
8948 
8949  return UUID;
8950 
8951 }
8952 
8953 void Context::loadPData( pugi::xml_node p, uint UUID ){
8954 
8955  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int")){
8956 
8957  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
8958  std::vector<int> datav;
8959  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
8960  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
8961  int tmp;
8962  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
8963  datav.push_back(tmp);
8964  }
8965  }
8966 
8967  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
8968 
8969  if( datav.size()==1 ){
8970  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
8971  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
8972  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
8973  }
8974 
8975  }
8976 
8977  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_uint")){
8978 
8979  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
8980  std::vector<uint> datav;
8981  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
8982  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
8983  uint tmp;
8984  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
8985  datav.push_back(tmp);
8986  }
8987  }
8988 
8989  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
8990 
8991  if( datav.size()==1 ){
8992  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
8993  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
8994  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_UINT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
8995  }
8996 
8997  }
8998 
8999  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_float"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_float")){
9000 
9001  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9002  std::vector<float> datav;
9003  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9004  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9005  float tmp;
9006  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9007  datav.push_back(tmp);
9008  }
9009  }
9010 
9011  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9012 
9013  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9014  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
9015  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9016  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9017  }
9018 
9019  }
9020 
9021  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_double"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_double")){
9022 
9023  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9024  std::vector<double> datav;
9025  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9026  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9027  double tmp;
9028  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9029  datav.push_back(tmp);
9030  }
9031  }
9032 
9033  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9034 
9035  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9036  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
9037  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9038  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9039  }
9040 
9041  }
9042 
9043  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_vec2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_vec2")){
9044 
9045  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9046  std::vector<vec2> datav;
9047  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9048  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9049  std::vector<float> tmp;
9050  tmp.resize(2);
9051  int c = 0;
9052  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9053  c++;
9054  if( c==2 ){
9055  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
9056  c=0;
9057  }
9058  }
9059  }
9060 
9061  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9062 
9063  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9064  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
9065  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9066  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9067  }
9068 
9069  }
9070 
9071  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_vec3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_vec3")){
9072 
9073  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9074  std::vector<vec3> datav;
9075  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9076  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9077  std::vector<float> tmp;
9078  tmp.resize(3);
9079  int c = 0;
9080  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9081  c++;
9082  if( c==3 ){
9083  datav.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
9084  c=0;
9085  }
9086  }
9087  }
9088 
9089  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9090 
9091  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9092  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
9093  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9094  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9095  }
9096 
9097  }

9103  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){

9108  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9109  c++;
9110  if( c==4 ){
9111  datav.push_back(make_vec4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
9112  c=0;
9113  }
9114  }
9115  }
9116

9118 
9119  if( datav.size()==1 ){

9121  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9122  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9123  }

9137  c++;
9138  if( c==2 ){
9139  datav.push_back(make_int2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
9140  c=0;
9141  }
9142  }
9143  }

9149  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){

9177  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){

9215  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){

9217  std::string tmp;
9218  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9219  datav.push_back(tmp);

9235 void Context::loadOData( pugi::xml_node p, uint ID ){
9236 
9237  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int")){
9238 
9239  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9240  std::vector<int> datav;
9241  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9242  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9243  int tmp;
9244  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9245  datav.push_back(tmp);
9246  }
9247  }
9248 
9249  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9250 
9251  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9252  setObjectData(ID,label,datav.front());
9253  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9254  setObjectData(ID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9255  }

9516 
9517 void Context::loadOsubPData( pugi::xml_node p, uint ID ){
9518 
9519  std::vector<uint> prim_UUIDs = getObjectPointer(ID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
9520 
9521  int u;
9522 
9523  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_int"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_int")){
9524 
9525  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9526 
9527  u=0;
9528  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9529 
9530  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9531  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9532  break;
9533  }
9534 
9535  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9536  std::vector<int> datav;
9537  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9538  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9539  int tmp;
9540  while (data_stream >> tmp) {
9541  datav.push_back(tmp);
9542  }
9543  }
9544 
9545  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9546  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9547  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9548  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9549  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_INT, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9550  }
9551  }
9552  u++;
9553  }
9554  }
9555 
9556  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_uint"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_uint")) {
9557 
9558  const char *label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9559 
9560  u=0;
9561  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9562 
9563  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
