9564  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9565  break;
9566  }
9567 
9568  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9569  std::vector<uint> datav;
9570  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9571  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9572  uint tmp;
9573  while (data_stream >> tmp) {
9574  datav.push_back(tmp);
9575  }
9576  }
9577 
9578  if (doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u))) {
9579  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9580  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9581  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9582  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_UINT, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9583  }
9584  }
9585  u++;
9586  }
9587  }
9588 
9589  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_float"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_float")){
9590 
9591  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9592 
9593  u = 0;
9594  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9595 
9596  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9597  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9598  break;
9599  }
9600 
9601  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9602  std::vector<float> datav;
9603  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9604  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9605  float tmp;
9606  while (data_stream >> tmp) {
9607  datav.push_back(tmp);
9608  }
9609  }
9610 
9611  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9612  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9613  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9614  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9615  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9616  }
9617  }
9618  u++;
9619  }
9620  }
9621 
9622  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_double"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_double")){
9623 
9624  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9625 
9626  u=0;
9627  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9628 
9629  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9630  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9631  break;
9632  }
9633 
9634  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9635  std::vector<double> datav;
9636  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9637  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9638  double tmp;
9639  while (data_stream >> tmp) {
9640  datav.push_back(tmp);
9641  }
9642  }
9643 
9644  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9645  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9646  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9647  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9648  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9649  }
9650  }
9651  u++;
9652  }
9653  }
9654 
9655  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_vec2"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_vec2")){
9656 
9657  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9658 
9659  u=0;
9660  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9661 
9662  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9663  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9664  break;
9665  }
9666 
9667  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9668  std::vector<vec2> datav;
9669  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9670  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9671  std::vector<float> tmp;
9672  tmp.resize(2);
9673  int c = 0;
9674  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9675  c++;
9676  if( c==2 ){
9677  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
9678  c=0;
9679  }
9680  }
9681  }
9682 
9683  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9684  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9685  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9686  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9687  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9688  }
9689  }
9690  u++;
9691  }
9692  }
9693 
9694  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_vec3"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_vec3")){
9695 
9696  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9697 
9698  u=0;
9699  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9700 
9701  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9702  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9703  break;
9704  }
9705 
9706  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9707  std::vector<vec3> datav;
9708  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9709  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9710  std::vector<float> tmp;
9711  tmp.resize(3);
9712  int c = 0;
9713  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9714  c++;
9715  if( c==3 ){
9716  datav.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
9717  c=0;
9718  }
9719  }
9720  }
9721 
9722  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9723  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9724  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9725  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9726  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9727  }
9728  }
9729  u++;
9730  }
9731  }
9732 
9733  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_vec4"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_vec4")){
9734 
9735  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9736 
9737  u=0;
9738  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9739 
9740  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9741  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9742  break;
9743  }
9744 
9745  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9746  std::vector<vec4> datav;
9747  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9748  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9749  std::vector<float> tmp;
9750  tmp.resize(4);
9751  int c = 0;
9752  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9753  c++;
9754  if( c==4 ){
9755  datav.push_back(make_vec4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
9756  c=0;
9757  }
9758  }
9759  }
9760 
9761  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9762  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9763  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9764  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9765  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9766  }
9767  }
9768  u++;
9769  }
9770  }
9771 
9772  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_int2"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_int2")){
9773 
9774  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9775 
9776  u=0;
9777  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9778 
9779  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9780  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9781  break;
9782  }
9783 
9784  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9785  std::vector<int2> datav;
9786  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9787  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9788  std::vector<int> tmp;
9789  tmp.resize(2);
9790  int c = 0;
9791  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9792  c++;
9793  if( c==2 ){
9794  datav.push_back(make_int2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
9795  c=0;
9796  }
9797  }
9798  }
9799 
9800  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9801  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9802  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9803  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9804  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_INT2, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9805  }
9806  }
9807  u++;
9808  }
9809  }
9810 
9811  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_int3"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_int3")){
9812 
9813  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9814 
9815  u=0;
9816  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9817 
9818  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9819  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9820  break;
9821  }
9822 
9823  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9824  std::vector<int3> datav;
9825  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9826  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9827  std::vector<int> tmp;
9828  tmp.resize(3);
9829  int c = 0;
9830  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9831  c++;
9832  if( c==3 ){
9833  datav.push_back(make_int3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
9834  c=0;
9835  }
9836  }
9837  }
9838 
9839  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9840  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9841  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9842  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9843  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_INT3, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9844  }
9845  }
9846  u++;
9847  }
9848  }
9849 
9850  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_int4"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_int4")){
9851 
9852  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9853 
9854  u=0;
9855  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9856 
9857  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9858  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9859  break;
9860  }
9861 
9862  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9863  std::vector<int4> datav;
9864  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9865  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9866  std::vector<int> tmp;
9867  tmp.resize(4);
9868  int c = 0;
9869  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9870  c++;
9871  if( c==4 ){
9872  datav.push_back(make_int4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
9873  c=0;
9874  }
9875  }
9876  }
9877 
9878  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9879  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9880  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9881  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9882  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_INT4, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9883  }
9884  }
9885  u++;
9886  }
9887  }
9888 
9889  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_string"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_string")){
9890 
9891  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9892 
9893  u=0;
9894  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9895 
9896  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9897  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9898  break;
9899  }
9900 
9901  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9902  std::vector<std::string> datav;
9903  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9904  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9905  std::string tmp;
9906  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9907  datav.push_back(tmp);
9908  }
9909  }
9910 
9911  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9912  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9913  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9914  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9915  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_STRING, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9916  }
9917  }
9918  u++;
9919  }
9920  }
9921 
9922 }
9923 
9924 std::vector<uint> Context::loadXML( const char* filename, bool quiet ){
9925 
9926  if( !quiet ) {
9927  std::cout << "Loading XML file: " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
9928  }
9929 
9930  XMLfiles.emplace_back( filename );
9931 
9932  uint ID;
9933  std::vector<uint> UUID;
9934 
9935  // Using "pugixml" parser. See pugixml.org
9936  pugi::xml_document xmldoc;
9937 
9938  //load file
9939  pugi::xml_parse_result result = xmldoc.load_file(filename);
9940 
9941  //error checking
9942  if (!result){
9943  throw( std::runtime_error("failed.\n XML [" + std::string(filename) + "] parsed with errors, attr value: [" + xmldoc.child("node").attribute("attr").value() + "]\nError description: " + result.description() + "\nError offset: " + std::to_string(result.offset) + " (error at [..." + (filename + result.offset) + "]\n"));
9944  }
9945 
9946  pugi::xml_node helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
9947 
9948  if( helios.empty() ){
9949  if( !quiet ) {
9950  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
9951  }
9952  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): XML file must have tag '<helios> ... </helios>' bounding all other tags."));
9953  }
9954 
9955  //if primitives are added that belong to an object, store there UUIDs here so that we can make sure their UUIDs are consistent
9956  std::map<uint,std::vector<uint> > object_prim_UUIDs;
9957 
9958  //-------------- TIME/DATE ---------------//
9959 
9960  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("date"); p; p = p.next_sibling("date")){
9961 
9962  pugi::xml_node year_node = p.child("year");
9963  const char* year_str = year_node.child_value();
9964  int year = std::stoi( year_str );
9965 
9966  pugi::xml_node month_node = p.child("month");
9967  const char* month_str = month_node.child_value();
9968  int month = std::stoi( month_str );
9969 
9970  pugi::xml_node day_node = p.child("day");
9971  const char* day_str = day_node.child_value();
9972  int day = std::stoi( day_str );
9973 
9974  setDate( day, month, year );
9975 
9976  }
9977 
9978  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("time"); p; p = p.next_sibling("time")){
9979 
9980  pugi::xml_node hour_node = p.child("hour");
9981  const char* hour_str = hour_node.child_value();
9982  int hour = std::stoi( hour_str );
9983 
9984  pugi::xml_node minute_node = p.child("minute");
9985  const char* minute_str = minute_node.child_value();
9986  int minute = std::stoi( minute_str );
9987 
9988  pugi::xml_node second_node = p.child("second");
9989  const char* second_str = second_node.child_value();
9990  int second = std::stoi( second_str );
9991 
9992  setTime( second, minute, hour );
9993 
9994  }
9995 
9996  //-------------- PATCHES ---------------//
9997  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("patch"); p; p = p.next_sibling("patch")){
9998 
9999  // * Patch Object ID * //
10000  uint objID = 0;
10001  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10002  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10003  if( !oid.empty() ){
10004  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10005  }
10006 
10007  // * Patch Transformation Matrix * //
10008  float transform[16];
10009  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10010 
10011  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10012  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
10013  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10014  }else{
10015  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10016  float tmp;
10017  int i=0;
10018  while( stream >> tmp ){
10019  transform[i] = tmp;
10020  i++;
10021  }
10022  if( i!=16 ){
10023  if( !quiet ) {
10024  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10025  }
10026  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10027  }
10028  }
10029 
10030  // * Patch Texture * //
10031  std::string texture_file;
10032  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10033  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10034  if( texfile.empty() ){
10035  texture_file = "none";
10036  }else{
10037  texture_file = texfile;
10038  }
10039 
10040  // * Patch Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
10041  std::vector<vec2> uv;
10042  pugi::xml_node uv_node = p.child("textureUV");
10043  const char* texUV = uv_node.child_value();
10044  if( strlen(texUV)>0 ){
10045  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
10046  std::vector<float> tmp;
10047  tmp.resize(2);
10048  int c = 0;
10049  while( uv_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10050  c++;
10051  if( c==2 ){
10052  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
10053  c=0;
10054  }
10055  }
10056  if( c!=0 ){
10057  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10058  uv.resize(0);
10059  }
10060  if( uv.size()!=4 ){
10061  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain four pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10062  uv.resize(0);
10063  }
10064  }
10065 
10066  // * Patch Diffuse Colors * //
10067  RGBAcolor color;
10068  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10069 
10070  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
10071  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
10072  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
10073  }else{
10074  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10075  }
10076 
10077  // * Add the Patch * //
10078  if( strcmp(texture_file.c_str(),"none")==0 ){
10079  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color );
10080  }else{
10081  if( uv.empty() ){
10082  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture_file.c_str() );
10083  }else{
10084  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture_file.c_str(), 0.5*(uv.at(2)+uv.at(0)), uv.at(2)-uv.at(0) );
10085  }
10086  }
10087  getPrimitivePointer_private(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10088 
10089  if( objID>0 ) {
10090  object_prim_UUIDs[objID].push_back(ID);
10091  }
10092 
10093  UUID.push_back(ID);
10094 
10095  // * Primitive Data * //
10096 
10097  loadPData( p, ID );
10098 
10099  }//end patches
10100 
10101  //-------------- TRIANGLES ---------------//
10102 
10103  //looping over any triangles specified in XML file
10104  for (pugi::xml_node tri = helios.child("triangle"); tri; tri = tri.next_sibling("triangle")){
10105 
10106  // * Triangle Object ID * //
10107  uint objID = 0;
10108  pugi::xml_node objID_node = tri.child("objID");
10109  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10110  if( !oid.empty() ){
10111  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10112  }
10113 
10114  // * Triangle Transformation Matrix * //
10115  float transform[16];
10116  pugi::xml_node transform_node = tri.child("transform");
10117 
10118  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10119  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
10120  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10121  }else{
10122  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10123  float tmp;
10124  int i=0;
10125  while( stream >> tmp ){
10126  transform[i] = tmp;
10127  i++;
10128  }
10129  if( i!=16 ){
10130  if( !quiet ) {
10131  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10132  }
10133  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10134  }
10135  }
10136 
10137  // * Triangle Texture * //
10138  std::string texture_file;
10139  pugi::xml_node texture_node = tri.child("texture");
10140  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10141  if( texfile.empty() ){
10142  texture_file = "none";
10143  }else{
10144  texture_file = texfile;
10145  }
10146 
10147  // * Triangle Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
10148  std::vector<vec2> uv;
10149  pugi::xml_node uv_node = tri.child("textureUV");
10150  const char* texUV = uv_node.child_value();
10151  if( strlen(texUV)>0 ){
10152  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
10153  std::vector<float> tmp;
10154  tmp.resize(2);
10155  int c = 0;
10156  while( uv_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10157  c++;
10158  if( c==2 ){
10159  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
10160  c=0;
10161  }
10162  }
10163  if( c!=0 ){
10164  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10165  uv.resize(0);
10166  }
10167  if( uv.size()!=3 ){
10168  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for triangle does not contain three pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10169  uv.resize(0);
10170  }
10171  }
10172 
10173  // * Triangle Diffuse Colors * //
10174  RGBAcolor color;
10175  pugi::xml_node color_node = tri.child("color");
10176 
10177  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
10178  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
10179  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
10180  }else{
10181  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10182  }
10183 
10184  std::vector<vec3> vert_pos;
10185  vert_pos.resize(3);
10186  vert_pos.at(0) = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
10187  vert_pos.at(1) = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
10188  vert_pos.at(2) = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
10189 
10190  // * Add the Triangle * //
10191  if( strcmp(texture_file.c_str(),"none")==0 || uv.empty() ){
10192  ID = addTriangle( vert_pos.at(0), vert_pos.at(1), vert_pos.at(2), color );
10193  }else{
10194  ID = addTriangle( vert_pos.at(0), vert_pos.at(1), vert_pos.at(2), texture_file.c_str(), uv.at(0), uv.at(1), uv.at(2) );
10195  }
10196  getPrimitivePointer_private(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10197 
10198  if( objID>0 ) {
10199  object_prim_UUIDs[objID].push_back(ID);
10200  }
10201 
10202  UUID.push_back(ID);
10203 
10204  // * Primitive Data * //
10205 
10206  loadPData( tri, ID );
10207 
10208  }
10209 
10210  //-------------- VOXELS ---------------//
10211  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("voxel"); p; p = p.next_sibling("voxel")){
10212 
10213  // * Voxel Object ID * //
10214  uint objID = 0;
10215  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10216  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10217  if( !oid.empty() ){
10218  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10219  }
10220 
10221  // * Voxel Transformation Matrix * //
10222  float transform[16];
10223  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10224 
10225  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10226  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
10227  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10228  }else{
10229  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10230  float tmp;
10231  int i=0;
10232  while( stream >> tmp ){
10233  transform[i] = tmp;
10234  i++;
10235  }
10236  if( i!=16 ){
10237  if( !quiet ) {
10238  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10239  }
10240  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10241  }
10242  }
10243 
10244  // * Voxel Diffuse Colors * //
10245  RGBAcolor color;
10246  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10247 
10248  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
10249  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
10250  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
10251  }else{
10252  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10253  }
10254 
10255  // * Add the Voxel * //
10256  ID = addVoxel( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(0,0,0), 0, color );
10257  getPrimitivePointer_private(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10258 
10259  if( objID>0 ) {
10260  object_prim_UUIDs[objID].push_back(ID);
10261  }
10262 
10263  UUID.push_back(ID);
10264 
10265  // * Primitive Data * //
10266 
10267  loadPData( p, ID );
10268 
10269  }
10270 
10271  //-------------- COMPOUND OBJECTS ---------------//
10272 
10273  //-------------- TILES ---------------//
10274  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("tile"); p; p = p.next_sibling("tile")) {
10275 
10276  // * Tile Object ID * //
10277  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10278  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10279  uint objID = std::stoi( oid );
10280 
10281  // * Tile Transformation Matrix * //
10282  float transform[16];
10283  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10284 
10285  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10286  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10287  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10288  } else {
10289  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10290  float tmp;
10291  int i = 0;
10292  while (stream >> tmp) {
10293  transform[i] = tmp;
10294  i++;
10295  }
10296  if (i != 16) {
10297  if( !quiet ) {
10298  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10299  }
10300  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10301  }
10302  }
10303 
10304  // * Tile Texture * //
10305  std::string texture_file;
10306  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10307  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10308  if (texfile.empty()) {
10309  texture_file = "none";
10310  } else {
10311  texture_file = texfile;
10312  }
10313 
10314  // * Tile Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
10315  std::vector<vec2> uv;
10316  pugi::xml_node uv_node = p.child("textureUV");
10317  const char *texUV = uv_node.child_value();
10318  if (strlen(texUV) > 0) {
10319  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
10320  std::vector<float> tmp;
10321  tmp.resize(2);
10322  int c = 0;
10323  while (uv_stream >> tmp.at(c)) {
10324  c++;
10325  if (c == 2) {
10326  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0), tmp.at(1)));
10327  c = 0;
10328  }
10329  }
10330  if (c != 0) {
10331  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for tile does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10332  uv.resize(0);
10333  }
10334  if (uv.size() != 4) {
10335  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for tile does not contain four pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10336  uv.resize(0);
10337  }
10338  }
10339 
10340  // * Tile Diffuse Colors * //
10341  RGBAcolor color;
10342  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10343 
10344  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10345  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10346  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10347  }
10348 
10349  // * Tile Subdivisions * //
10350  int2 subdiv;
10351  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10352  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10353  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10354  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for tile was not provided. Assuming 1x1." << std::endl;
10355  subdiv = make_int2(1,1);
10356  } else {
10357  subdiv = string2int2(subdiv_str);
10358  }
10359 
10360  //Create a dummy patch in order to get the center, size, and rotation based on transformation matrix
10361  Patch patch( make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,0), 0 );
10362  patch.setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10363 
10364  // * Add the Tile * //
10365  if (strcmp(texture_file.c_str(), "none") == 0) {
10366  if( strlen(color_str) == 0 ){
10367  ID = addTileObject(patch.getCenter(), patch.getSize(), cart2sphere(patch.getNormal()), subdiv );
10368  }else {
10369  ID = addTileObject(patch.getCenter(), patch.getSize(), cart2sphere(patch.getNormal()), subdiv, make_RGBcolor(color.r, color.g, color.b));
10370  }
10371  } else {
10372  ID = addTileObject(patch.getCenter(), patch.getSize(), cart2sphere(patch.getNormal()), subdiv, texture_file.c_str());
10373  }
10374 
10375  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID)); // \todo This is fairly inefficient, it would be nice to have a way to do this without having to create and delete a bunch of primitives.
10376  assert(object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end());
10377  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10378 
10379  // * Tile Sub-Patch Data * //
10380 
10381  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10382 
10383  // * Tile Object Data * //
10384 
10385  loadOData(p,ID);
10386 
10387 // UUID.push_back(ID);
10388 
10389  }//end tiles
10390 
10391  //-------------- SPHERES ---------------//
10392  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("sphere"); p; p = p.next_sibling("sphere")) {
10393 
10394  // * Sphere Object ID * //
10395  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10396  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10397  uint objID = std::stoi( oid );
10398 
10399  // * Sphere Transformation Matrix * //
10400  float transform[16];
10401  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10402 
10403  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10404  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10405  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10406  } else {
10407  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10408  float tmp;
10409  int i = 0;
10410  while (stream >> tmp) {
10411  transform[i] = tmp;
10412  i++;
10413  }
10414  if (i != 16) {
10415  if( !quiet ) {
10416  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10417  }
10418  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10419  }
10420  }
10421 
10422  // * Sphere Texture * //
10423  std::string texture_file;
10424  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10425  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10426  if (texfile.empty()) {
10427  texture_file = "none";
10428  } else {
10429  texture_file = texfile;
10430  }
10431 
10432  // * Sphere Diffuse Colors * //
10433  RGBAcolor color;
10434  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10435 
10436  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10437  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10438  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10439  }
10440 
10441  // * Sphere Subdivisions * //
10442  uint subdiv;
10443  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10444  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10445  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10446  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for sphere was not provided. Assuming 5." << std::endl;
10447  subdiv = 5;
10448  } else {
10449  subdiv = std::stoi(subdiv_str);
10450  }
10451 
10452  //Create a dummy sphere in order to get the center and radius based on transformation matrix
10453  std::vector<uint> empty;
10454  Sphere sphere( 0, empty, 3, "", this );
10455  sphere.setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10456 
10457  // * Add the Sphere * //
10458  if (strcmp(texture_file.c_str(), "none") == 0) {
10459  if( strlen(color_str) == 0 ){
10460  ID = addSphereObject( subdiv, sphere.getCenter(), sphere.getRadius() );
10461  }else {
10462  ID = addSphereObject( subdiv, sphere.getCenter(), sphere.getRadius(), make_RGBcolor(color.r, color.g, color.b) );
10463  }
10464  } else {
10465  ID = addSphereObject( subdiv, sphere.getCenter(), sphere.getRadius(), texture_file.c_str());
10466  }
10467 
10468  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10469  assert(object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end());
10470  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10471 
10472  // * Sphere Sub-Triangle Data * //
10473 
10474  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10475 
10476  // * Sphere Object Data * //
10477 
10478  loadOData(p,ID);
10479 
10480  }//end spheres
10481 
10482  //-------------- TUBES ---------------//
10483  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("tube"); p; p = p.next_sibling("tube")) {
10484 
10485  // * Tube Object ID * //
10486  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10487  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10488  uint objID = std::stoi( oid );
10489 
10490  // * Tube Transformation Matrix * //
10491  float transform[16];
10492  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10493 
10494  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10495  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10496  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10497  } else {
10498  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10499  float tmp;
10500  int i = 0;
10501  while (stream >> tmp) {
10502  transform[i] = tmp;
10503  i++;
10504  }
10505  if (i != 16) {
10506  if( !quiet ) {
10507  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10508  }
10509  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10510  }
10511  }
10512 
10513  // * Tube Texture * //
10514  std::string texture_file;
10515  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10516  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10517  if (texfile.empty()) {
10518  texture_file = "none";
10519  } else {
10520  texture_file = texfile;
10521  }
10522 
10523  // * Tube Subdivisions * //
10524  uint subdiv;
10525  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10526  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10527  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10528  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for tube was not provided. Assuming 5." << std::endl;
10529  subdiv = 5;
10530  } else {
10531  subdiv = std::stoi(subdiv_str);
10532  }
10533 
10534  // * Tube Nodes * //
10535 
10536  pugi::xml_node nodes_node = p.child("nodes");
10537  const char* nodes_str = nodes_node.child_value();
10538 
10539  std::vector<vec3> nodes;
10540  if (strlen(nodes_str) > 0) {
10541  std::istringstream data_stream(nodes_str);
10542  std::vector<float> tmp;
10543  tmp.resize(3);
10544  int c = 0;
10545  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10546  c++;
10547  if( c==3 ){
10548  nodes.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
10549  c=0;
10550  }
10551  }
10552  }
10553 
10554  // * Tube Radius * //
10555 
10556  pugi::xml_node radii_node = p.child("radius");
10557  const char* radii_str = radii_node.child_value();
10558 
10559  std::vector<float> radii;
10560  if (strlen(radii_str) > 0) {
10561  std::istringstream data_stream(radii_str);
10562  float tmp;
10563  int c = 0;
10564  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
10565  radii.push_back(tmp);
10566  }
10567  }
10568 
10569  // * Tube Color * //
10570 
10571  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10572  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
10573 
10574  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
10575  if (strlen(color_str) > 0) {
10576  std::istringstream data_stream(color_str);
10577  std::vector<float> tmp;
10578  tmp.resize(3);
10579  int c = 0;
10580  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10581  c++;
10582  if( c==3 ){
10583  colors.push_back(make_RGBcolor(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
10584  c=0;
10585  }
10586  }
10587  }
10588 
10589  // * Add the Tube * //
10590  if( texture_file == "none" ) {
10591  ID = addTubeObject(subdiv, nodes, radii, colors);
10592  }else{
10593  ID = addTubeObject(subdiv, nodes, radii, texture_file.c_str());
10594  }
10595 
10596  getObjectPointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10597 
10598  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10599  assert(object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end());
10600  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10601 
10602  // * Tube Sub-Triangle Data * //
10603 
10604  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10605 
10606  // * tube Object Data * //
10607 
10608  loadOData(p,ID);
10609 
10610  }//end tubes
10611 
10612  //-------------- BOXES ---------------//
10613  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("box"); p; p = p.next_sibling("box")) {
10614 
10615  // * Box Object ID * //
10616  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10617  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10618  uint objID = std::stoi( oid );
10619 
10620  // * Box Transformation Matrix * //
10621  float transform[16];
10622  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10623 
10624  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10625  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10626  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10627  } else {
10628  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10629  float tmp;
10630  int i = 0;
10631  while (stream >> tmp) {
10632  transform[i] = tmp;
10633  i++;
10634  }
10635  if (i != 16) {
10636  if( !quiet ) {
10637  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10638  }
10639  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10640  }
10641  }
10642 
10643  // * Box Texture * //
10644  std::string texture_file;
10645  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10646  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10647  if (texfile.empty()) {
10648  texture_file = "none";
10649  } else {
10650  texture_file = texfile;
10651  }
10652 
10653  // * Box Diffuse Colors * //
10654  RGBAcolor color;
10655  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10656 
10657  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10658  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10659  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10660  }
10661 
10662  // * Box Subdivisions * //
10663  int3 subdiv;
10664  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10665  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10666  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10667  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for box was not provided. Assuming 1." << std::endl;
10668  subdiv = make_int3(1,1,1);
10669  } else {
10670  subdiv = string2int3(subdiv_str);
10671  }
10672 
10673  //Create a dummy box in order to get the center and size based on transformation matrix
10674  std::vector<uint> empty;
10675  Box box( 0, empty, make_int3(1,1,1), "", this );
10676  box.setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10677 
10678  // * Add the box * //
10679  if (strcmp(texture_file.c_str(), "none") == 0) {
10680  if( strlen(color_str) == 0 ){
10681  ID = addBoxObject( box.getCenter(), box.getSize(), subdiv );
10682  }else {
10683  ID = addBoxObject( box.getCenter(), box.getSize(), subdiv, make_RGBcolor(color.r, color.g, color.b) );
10684  }
10685  } else {
10686  ID = addBoxObject( box.getCenter(), box.getSize(), subdiv, texture_file.c_str());
10687  }
10688 
10689  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10690  assert(object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID)!=object_prim_UUIDs.end());
10691  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10692 
10693  // * Box Sub-Patch Data * //
10694 
10695  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10696 
10697  // * Box Object Data * //
10698 
10699  loadOData(p,ID);
10700 
10701  }//end boxes
10702 
10703  //-------------- DISKS ---------------//
10704  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("disk"); p; p = p.next_sibling("disk")) {
10705 
10706  // * Disk Object ID * //
10707  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10708  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10709  uint objID = std::stoi( oid );
10710 
10711  // * Disk Transformation Matrix * //
10712  float transform[16];
10713  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10714 
10715  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10716  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10717  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10718  } else {
10719  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10720  float tmp;
10721  int i = 0;
10722  while (stream >> tmp) {
10723  transform[i] = tmp;
10724  i++;
10725  }
10726  if (i != 16) {
10727  if( !quiet ) {
10728  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10729  }
10730  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10731  }
10732  }
10733 
10734  // * Disk Texture * //
10735  std::string texture_file;
10736  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10737  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10738  if (texfile.empty()) {
10739  texture_file = "none";
10740  } else {
10741  texture_file = texfile;
10742  }
10743 
10744  // * Disk Diffuse Colors * //
10745  RGBAcolor color;
10746  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10747 
10748  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10749  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10750  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10751  }
10752 
10753  // * Disk Subdivisions * //
10754  uint subdiv;
10755  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10756  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10757  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10758  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for disk was not provided. Assuming 5." << std::endl;
10759  subdiv = 5;
10760  } else {
10761  subdiv = std::stoi(subdiv_str);
10762  }
10763 
10764  //Create a dummy disk in order to get the center and size based on transformation matrix
10765  std::vector<uint> empty;
10766  Disk disk( 0, empty, 1, "", this );
10767  disk.setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10768 
10769  // * Add the disk * //
10770  if (strcmp(texture_file.c_str(), "none") == 0) {
10771  if( strlen(color_str) == 0 ){
10772  ID = addDiskObject( subdiv, disk.getCenter(), disk.getSize() );
10773  }else {
10774  ID = addDiskObject( subdiv, disk.getCenter(), disk.getSize(), nullrotation, make_RGBcolor(color.r, color.g, color.b) );
10775  }
10776  } else {
10777  ID = addDiskObject( subdiv, disk.getCenter(), disk.getSize(), nullrotation, texture_file.c_str());
10778  }
10779 
10780  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10781  assert(object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID)!=object_prim_UUIDs.end());
10782  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10783 
10784  // * Disk Sub-Triangle Data * //
10785 
10786  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10787 
10788  // * Disk Object Data * //
10789 
10790  loadOData(p,ID);
10791 
10792  }//end disks
10793 
10794  //-------------- CONES ---------------//
10795  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("cone"); p; p = p.next_sibling("cone")) {
10796 
10797  // * Cone Object ID * //
10798  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10799  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10800  uint objID = std::stoi( oid );
10801 
10802  // * Cone Transformation Matrix * //
10803  float transform[16];
10804  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10805 
10806  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10807  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10808  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10809  } else {
10810  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10811  float tmp;
10812  int i = 0;
10813  while (stream >> tmp) {
10814  transform[i] = tmp;
10815  i++;
10816  }
10817  if (i != 16) {
10818  if( !quiet ) {
10819  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10820  }
10821  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10822  }
10823  }
10824 
10825  // * Cone Texture * //
10826  std::string texture_file;
10827  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10828  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10829  if (texfile.empty()) {
10830  texture_file = "none";
10831  } else {
10832  texture_file = texfile;
10833  }
10834 
10835  // * Cone Diffuse Colors * //
10836  RGBAcolor color;
10837  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10838 
10839  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10840  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10841  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10842  }
10843 
10844  // * Cone Subdivisions * //
10845  uint subdiv;
10846  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10847  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10848  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10849  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for cone was not provided. Assuming 5." << std::endl;
10850  subdiv = 5;
10851  } else {
10852  subdiv = std::stoi(subdiv_str);
10853  }
10854 
10855  // * Cone Nodes * //
10856 
10857  pugi::xml_node nodes_node = p.child("nodes");
10858  const char* nodes_str = nodes_node.child_value();
10859 
10860  std::vector<vec3> nodes;
10861  if (strlen(nodes_str) > 0) {
10862  std::istringstream data_stream(nodes_str);
10863  std::vector<float> tmp;
10864  tmp.resize(3);
10865  int c = 0;
10866  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10867  c++;
10868  if( c==3 ){
10869  nodes.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
10870  break;
10871  }
10872  }
10873  if( c!=3 ){
10874  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Loading of cone failed. Cone end nodes must be specified as pairs of 3 x,y,z coordinates."));
10875  }
10876  c = 0;
10877  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10878  c++;
10879  if( c==3 ){
10880  nodes.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
10881  break;
10882  }
10883  }
10884  if( c!=3 ){
10885  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Loading of cone failed. Cone end nodes must be specified as pairs of 3 x,y,z coordinates."));
10886  }
10887  }
10888 
10889  // * Cone Radius * //
10890 
10891  pugi::xml_node radii_node = p.child("radius");
10892  const char* radii_str = radii_node.child_value();
10893 
10894  std::vector<float> radii(2);
10895  if (strlen(radii_str) > 0) {
10896  std::istringstream data_stream(radii_str);
10897  data_stream >> radii.at(0);
10898  data_stream >> radii.at(1);
10899  }
10900 
10901  // * Add the Cone * //
10902  if( texture_file == "none" ){
10903  ID = addConeObject( subdiv, nodes.at(0), nodes.at(1), radii.at(0), radii.at(1), make_RGBcolor(color.r,color.g,color.b));
10904  }else {
10905  ID = addConeObject(subdiv, nodes.at(0), nodes.at(1), radii.at(0), radii.at(1), texture_file.c_str());
10906  }
10907 
10908  getObjectPointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10909 
10910  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10911  assert(object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID)!=object_prim_UUIDs.end());
10912  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10913 
10914  // * Tube Sub-Triangle Data * //
10915 
10916  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10917 
10918  // * tube Object Data * //
10919 
10920  loadOData(p,ID);
10921 
10922  }//end cones
10923 
10924  //-------------- GLOBAL DATA ---------------//
10925 
10926  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int")){
10927 
10928  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
10929  std::vector<int> datav;
10930  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
10931  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
10932  int tmp;
10933  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
10934  datav.push_back(tmp);
10935  }
10936  }
10937 
10938  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
10939 
10940  if( datav.size()==1 ){
10941  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
10942  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
10943  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
10944  }
10945 
10946  }
10947 
10948  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_uint")){
10949 
10950  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
10951  std::vector<uint> datav;
10952  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
10953  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
10954  uint tmp;
10955  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
10956  datav.push_back(tmp);
10957  }
10958  }
10959 
10960  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
10961 
10962  if( datav.size()==1 ){
10963  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
10964  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
10965  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_UINT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
10966  }
10967 
10968  }
10969 
10970  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_float"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_float")){
10971 
10972  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
10973  std::vector<float> datav;
10974  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
10975  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
10976  float tmp;
10977  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
10978  datav.push_back(tmp);
10979  }
10980  }
10981 
10982  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
10983 
10984  if( datav.size()==1 ){
10985  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
10986  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
10987  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
10988  }
10989 
10990  }
10991 
10992  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_double"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_double")){
10993 
10994  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
10995  std::vector<double> datav;
10996  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
10997  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
10998  double tmp;
10999  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
11000  datav.push_back(tmp);
11001  }
11002  }
11003 
11004  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11005 
11006  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11007  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11008  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11009  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11010  }
11011 
11012  }
11013 
11014  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec2")){
11015 
11016  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11017  std::vector<vec2> datav;
11018  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11019  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11020  std::vector<float> tmp;
11021  tmp.resize(2);
11022  int c = 0;
11023  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11024  c++;
11025  if( c==2 ){
11026  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
11027  c=0;
11028  }
11029  }
11030  }
11031 
11032  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11033 
11034  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11035  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11036  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11037  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11038  }
11039 
11040  }
11041 
11042  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec3")){
11043 
11044  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11045  std::vector<vec3> datav;
11046  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11047  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11048  std::vector<float> tmp;
11049  tmp.resize(3);
11050  int c = 0;
11051  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11052  c++;
11053  if( c==3 ){
11054  datav.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
11055  c=0;
11056  }
11057  }
11058  }
11059 
11060  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11061 
11062  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11063  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11064  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11065  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11066  }
11067 
11068  }
11069 
11070  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec4")){
11071 
11072  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11073  std::vector<vec4> datav;
11074  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11075  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11076  std::vector<float> tmp;
11077  tmp.resize(4);
11078  int c = 0;
11079  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11080  c++;
11081  if( c==4 ){
11082  datav.push_back(make_vec4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
11083  c=0;
11084  }
11085  }
11086  }
11087 
11088  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11089 
11090  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11091  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11092  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11093  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11094  }
11095 
11096  }
11097 
11098  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int2")){
11099 
11100  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11101  std::vector<int2> datav;
11102  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11103  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11104  std::vector<int> tmp;
11105  tmp.resize(2);
11106  int c = 0;
11107  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11108  c++;
11109  if( c==2 ){
11110  datav.push_back(make_int2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
11111  c=0;
11112  }
11113  }
11114  }
11115 
11116  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11117 
11118  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11119  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11120  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11121  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11122  }
11123 
11124  }
11125 
11126  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int3")){
11127 
11128  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11129  std::vector<int3> datav;
11130  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11131  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11132  std::vector<int> tmp;
11133  tmp.resize(3);
11134  int c = 0;
11135  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11136  c++;
11137  if( c==3 ){
11138  datav.push_back(make_int3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
11139  c=0;
11140  }
11141  }
11142  }
11143 
11144  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11145 
11146  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11147  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11148  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11149  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11150  }
11151 
11152  }
11153 
11154  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int4")){
11155 
11156  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11157  std::vector<int4> datav;
11158  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11159  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11160  std::vector<int> tmp;
11161  tmp.resize(4);
11162  int c = 0;
11163  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11164  c++;
11165  if( c==4 ){
11166  datav.push_back(make_int4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
11167  c=0;
11168  }
11169  }
11170  }
11171 
11172  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11173 
11174  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11175  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11176  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11177  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11178  }
11179 
11180  }
11181 
11182  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_string"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_string")){
11183 
11184  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11185  std::vector<std::string> datav;
11186  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11187  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11188  std::string tmp;
11189  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
11190  datav.push_back(tmp);
11191  }
11192  }
11193 
11194  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11195 
11196  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11197  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11198  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11199  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_STRING,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11200  }
11201 
11202  }
11203 
11204  //-------------- TIMESERIES DATA ---------------//
11205  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("timeseries"); p; p = p.next_sibling("timeseries")){
11206 
11207  const char* label = p.attribute("label").value();
11208 
11209  for (pugi::xml_node d = p.child("datapoint"); d; d = d.next_sibling("datapoint")){
11210 
11211  Time time;
11212  pugi::xml_node time_node = d.child("time");
11213  const char* time_str = time_node.child_value();
11214  if( strlen(time_str)>0 ){
11215  int3 time_ = string2int3(time_str);
11216  if( time_.x<0 || time_.x>23 ){
11217  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid hour of " + std::to_string(time_.x) + " given in timeseries. Hour must be positive and not greater than 23."));
11218  }else if( time_.y<0 || time_.y>59 ){
11219  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid minute of " + std::to_string(time_.y) + " given in timeseries. Minute must be positive and not greater than 59."));
11220  }else if( time_.z<0 || time_.z>59 ){
11221  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid second of " + std::to_string(time_.z) + " given in timeseries. Second must be positive and not greater than 59."));
11222  }
11223  time = make_Time(time_.x, time_.y,time_.z);
11224  }else{
11225  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): No time was specified for timeseries datapoint."));
11226  }
11227 
11228  Date date;
11229  bool date_flag=false;
11230 
11231  pugi::xml_node date_node = d.child("date");
11232  const char* date_str = date_node.child_value();
11233  if( strlen(date_str)>0 ){
11234  int3 date_ = string2int3(date_str);
11235  if( date_.x<1 || date_.x>31 ){
11236  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid day of month " + std::to_string(date_.x) + " given in timeseries. Day must be greater than zero and not greater than 31."));
11237  }else if( date_.y<1 || date_.y>12 ){
11238  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid month of " + std::to_string(date_.y) + " given in timeseries. Month must be greater than zero and not greater than 12."));
11239  }else if( date_.z<1000 || date_.z>10000 ){
11240  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid year of " + std::to_string(date_.z) + " given in timeseries. Year should be in YYYY format."));
11241  }
11242  date = make_Date(date_.x, date_.y, date_.z );
11243  date_flag=true;
11244  }
11245 
11246  pugi::xml_node Jdate_node = d.child("dateJulian");
11247  const char* Jdate_str = Jdate_node.child_value();
11248  if( strlen(Jdate_str)>0 ){
11249  int2 date_ = string2int2(Jdate_str);
11250  if( date_.x<1 || date_.x>366 ){
11251  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid Julian day of year " + std::to_string(date_.x) + " given in timeseries. Julian day must be greater than zero and not greater than 366."));
11252  }else if( date_.y<1000 || date_.y>10000 ){
11253  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid year of " + std::to_string(date_.y) + " given in timeseries. Year should be in YYYY format."));
11254  }
11255  date = Julian2Calendar( date_.x, date_.y );
11256  date_flag=true;
11257  }
11258 
11259  if( !date_flag ){
11260  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): No date was specified for timeseries datapoint."));
11261  }
11262 
11263  float value;
11264  pugi::xml_node value_node = d.child("value");
11265  const char* value_str = value_node.child_value();
11266  if( strlen(value_str)>0 ){
11267  value = std::stof(value_str);
11268  }else{
11269  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): No value was specified for timeseries datapoint."));
11270  }
11271 
11272  addTimeseriesData(label,value,date,time);
11273 
11274  }
11275 
11276  }
11277 
11278  if( !quiet ) {
11279  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
11280  }
11281 
11282  return UUID;
11283 
11284 }
11285 
11286 std::vector<std::string> Context::getLoadedXMLFiles() {
11287  return XMLfiles;
11288 }
11289 
11290 void Context::writeDataToXMLstream( const char* data_group, const std::vector<std::string> &data_labels, void* ptr, std::ofstream &outfile ) const{
11291 
11292  for(const auto& label : data_labels ) {
11293 
11294  size_t dsize;
11295  HeliosDataType dtype;
11296 
11297  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11298  dsize = ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveDataSize(label.c_str());
11299  dtype = ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveDataType(label.c_str());
11300  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11301  dsize = ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectDataSize(label.c_str());
11302  dtype = ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectDataType(label.c_str());
11303  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "global") == 0) {
11304  dsize = getGlobalDataSize(label.c_str());
11305  dtype = getGlobalDataType(label.c_str());
11306  } else {
11307  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (writeDataToXMLstream): unknown data group argument of " + std::string(data_group) + ". Must be one of primitive, object, or global."));
11308  }
11309 
11310  if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_UINT) {
11311  outfile << "\t<data_uint label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11312  std::vector<uint> data;
11313  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11314  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11315  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11316  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11317  } else {
11318  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11319  }
11320  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11321  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11322  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11323  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11324  }
11325  }
11326  outfile << "</data_uint>" << std::endl;
11327  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_INT) {
11328  outfile << "\t<data_int label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11329  std::vector<int> data;
11330  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11331  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11332  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11333  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11334  } else {
11335  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11336  }
11337  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11338  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11339  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11340  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11341  }
11342  }
11343  outfile << "</data_int>" << std::endl;
11344  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT) {
11345  outfile << "\t<data_float label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11346  std::vector<float> data;
11347  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11348  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11349  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11350  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11351  } else {
11352  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11353  }
11354  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11355  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11356  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11357  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11358  }
11359  }
11360  outfile << "</data_float>" << std::endl;
11361  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE) {
11362  outfile << "\t<data_double label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11363  std::vector<double> data;
11364  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11365  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11366  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11367  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11368  } else {
11369  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11370  }
11371  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11372  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11373  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11374  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11375  }
11376  }
11377  outfile << "</data_double>" << std::endl;
11378  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2) {
11379  outfile << "\t<data_vec2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11380  std::vector<vec2> data;
11381  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11382  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11383  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11384  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11385  } else {
11386  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11387  }
11388  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11389  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << std::flush;
11390  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11391  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11392  }
11393  }
11394  outfile << "</data_vec2>" << std::endl;
11395  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3) {
11396  outfile << "\t<data_vec3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11397  std::vector<vec3> data;
11398  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11399  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11400  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11401  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11402  } else {
11403  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11404  }
11405  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11406  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << std::flush;
11407  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11408  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11409  }
11410  }
11411  outfile << "</data_vec3>" << std::endl;
11412  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4) {
11413  outfile << "\t<data_vec4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11414  std::vector<vec4> data;
11415  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11416  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11417  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11418  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11419  } else {
11420  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11421  }
11422  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11423  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << " " << data.at(j).w
11424  << std::flush;
11425  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11426  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11427  }
11428  }
11429  outfile << "</data_vec4>" << std::endl;
11430  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_INT2) {
11431  outfile << "\t<data_int2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11432  std::vector<int2> data;
11433  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11434  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11435  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11436  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11437  } else {
11438  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11439  }
11440  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11441  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << std::flush;
11442  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11443  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11444  }
11445  }
11446  outfile << "</data_int2>" << std::endl;
11447  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_INT3) {
11448  outfile << "\t<data_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11449  std::vector<int3> data;
11450  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11451  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11452  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11453  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11454  } else {
11455  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11456  }
11457  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11458  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << std::flush;
11459  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11460  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11461  }
11462  }
11463  outfile << "</data_int3>" << std::endl;
11464  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_INT4) {
11465  outfile << "\t<data_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11466  std::vector<int4> data;
11467  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11468  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11469  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11470  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11471  } else {
11472  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11473  }
11474  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11475  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << " " << data.at(j).w
11476  << std::flush;
11477  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11478  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11479  }
11480  }
11481  outfile << "</data_int4>" << std::endl;
11482  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_STRING) {
11483  outfile << "\t<data_string label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11484  std::vector<std::string> data;
11485  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11486  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11487  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11488  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11489  } else {
11490  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11491  }
11492  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11493  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11494  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11495  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11496  }
11497  }
11498  outfile << "</data_string>" << std::endl;
11499  }
11500 
11501  }
11502 
11503 }
11504 
11505 void Context::writeXML( const char* filename, bool quiet ) const{
11506 
11507  if( !quiet ) {
11508  std::cout << "Writing XML file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
11509  }
11510 
11511  std::ofstream outfile;
11512  outfile.open(filename);
11513 
11514  outfile << "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>\n\n";
11515 
11516  outfile << "<helios>\n\n";
11517 
11518  // -- time/date -- //
11519 
11520  Date date = getDate();
11521 
11522  outfile << " <date>" << std::endl;
11523 
11524  outfile << "\t<day>" << date.day << "</day>" << std::endl;
11525  outfile << "\t<month>" << date.month << "</month>" << std::endl;
11526  outfile << "\t<year>" << date.year << "</year>" << std::endl;
11527 
11528  outfile << " </date>" << std::endl;
11529 
11530  Time time = getTime();
11531 
11532  outfile << " <time>" << std::endl;
11533 
11534  outfile << "\t<hour>" << time.hour << "</hour>" << std::endl;
11535  outfile << "\t<minute>" << time.minute << "</minute>" << std::endl;
11536  outfile << "\t<second>" << time.second << "</second>" << std::endl;
11537 
11538  outfile << " </time>" << std::endl;
11539 
11540  // -- primitives -- //
11541 
11542  for(auto primitive : primitives){
11543 
11544  uint p = primitive.first;
11545 
11546  Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer_private(p);
11547 
11548  uint parent_objID = prim->getParentObjectID();
11549 
11550  RGBAcolor color = prim->getColorRGBA();
11551 
11552  std::string texture_file = prim->getTextureFile();
11553 
11554  std::vector<std::string> pdata = prim->listPrimitiveData();
11555 
11556  if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
11557  outfile << " <patch>" << std::endl;
11558  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
11559  outfile << " <triangle>" << std::endl;
11560  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
11561  outfile << " <voxel>" << std::endl;
11562  }
11563 
11564  outfile << "\t<UUID>" << p << "</UUID>" << std::endl;
11565 
11566  if( parent_objID>0 ){
11567  outfile << "\t<objID>" << parent_objID << "</objID>" << std::endl;
11568  }
11569 
11570  outfile << "\t<color>" << color.r << " " << color.g << " " << color.b << " " << color.a << "</color>" << std::endl;
11571  if( prim->hasTexture() ){
11572  outfile << "\t<texture>" << texture_file << "</texture>" << std::endl;
11573  }
11574 
11575  if( !pdata.empty() ){
11576  writeDataToXMLstream( "primitive", pdata, prim, outfile );
11577  }
11578 
11579  //Patches
11580  if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
11581 
11582  Patch* patch = getPatchPointer_private(p);
11583  float transform[16];
11584  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11585 
11586  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11587  for(float i : transform){
11588  outfile << i << " ";
11589  }
11590  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11591  std::vector<vec2> uv = patch->getTextureUV();
11592  if( !uv.empty() ){
11593  outfile << "\t<textureUV>" << std::flush;
11594  for( int i=0; i<uv.size(); i++ ){
11595  outfile << uv.at(i).x << " " << uv.at(i).y << std::flush;
11596  if( i!=uv.size()-1 ){
11597  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11598  }
11599  }
11600  outfile << "</textureUV>" << std::endl;
11601  }
11602  outfile << " </patch>" << std::endl;
11603 
11604  //Triangles
11605  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
11606 
11607  float transform[16];
11608  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11609 
11610  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11611  for(float i : transform){
11612  outfile << i << " ";
11613  }
11614  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11615 
11616  std::vector<vec2> uv = getTrianglePointer_private(p)->getTextureUV();
11617  if( !uv.empty() ){
11618  outfile << "\t<textureUV>" << std::flush;
11619  for( int i=0; i<uv.size(); i++ ){
11620  outfile << uv.at(i).x << " " << uv.at(i).y << std::flush;
11621  if( i!=uv.size()-1 ){
11622  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11623  }
11624  }
11625  outfile << "</textureUV>" << std::endl;
11626  }
11627  outfile << " </triangle>" << std::endl;
11628 
11629  //Voxels
11630  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
11631 
11632  float transform[16];
11633  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11634 
11635  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11636  for(float i : transform){
11637  outfile << i << " ";
11638  }
11639  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11640 
11641  outfile << " </voxel>" << std::endl;
11642 
11643  }
11644 
11645  }
11646 
11647  // -- objects -- //
11648 
11649  for( const auto &object : objects ){
11650 
11651  uint o = object.first;
11652 
11653  CompoundObject* obj = object.second;
11654 
11655  RGBAcolor color = obj->getColorRGBA();
11656 
11657  std::string texture_file = obj->getTextureFile();
11658 
11659  std::vector<std::string> odata = obj->listObjectData();
11660 
11661 // std::vector<uint> prim_UUIDs = obj->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
11662 
11663  if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
11664  outfile << " <tile>" << std::endl;
11665  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_BOX ){
11666  outfile << " <box>" << std::endl;
11667  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_CONE ){
11668  outfile << " <cone>" << std::endl;
11669  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_DISK ){
11670  outfile << " <disk>" << std::endl;
11671  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
11672  outfile << " <sphere>" << std::endl;
11673  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ){
11674  outfile << " <tube>" << std::endl;
11675  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH ){
11676  outfile << " <polymesh>" << std::endl;
11677  }
11678 
11679  outfile << "\t<objID>" << o << "</objID>" << std::endl;
11680  if( !(obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE) ){
11681  outfile << "\t<color>" << color.r << " " << color.g << " " << color.b << " " << color.a << "</color>" << std::endl;
11682  }
11683  if( obj->hasTexture() ){
11684  outfile << "\t<texture>" << texture_file << "</texture>" << std::endl;
11685  }
11686 
11687 // outfile << "\t<UUIDs>" << std::endl;
11688 // for( uint UUID : prim_UUIDs ){
11689 // outfile << "\t\t" << UUID << std::endl;
11690 // }
11691 // outfile << "\t</UUIDs>" << std::endl;
11692 
11693  if( !odata.empty() ){
11694  writeDataToXMLstream( "object", odata, obj, outfile );
11695  }
11696 
11697  std::vector<std::string> pdata_labels;
11698  std::vector<HeliosDataType> pdata_types;
11699  std::vector<uint> primitiveUUIDs = obj->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
11700  for( uint UUID : primitiveUUIDs ){
11701  std::vector<std::string> labels = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->listPrimitiveData();
11702  for( int i=0; i<labels.size(); i++ ){
11703  if( find(pdata_labels.begin(),pdata_labels.end(),labels.at(i)) == pdata_labels.end() ){
11704  pdata_labels.push_back(labels.at(i));
11705  pdata_types.push_back(getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,labels.at(i).c_str()));
11706  }
11707  }
11708  }
11709  for( size_t l=0; l<pdata_labels.size(); l++ ) {
11710  if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ) {
11711  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_float " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11712  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11713  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11714  std::vector<float> data;
11715  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11716  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11717  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11718  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11719  }
11720  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11721  }
11722  }
11723  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_float>" << std::endl;
11724  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ) {
11725  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_double " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11726  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11727  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11728  std::vector<double> data;
11729  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11730  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11731  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11732  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11733  }
11734  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11735  }
11736  }
11737  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_double>" << std::endl;
11738  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ) {
11739  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_uint " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11740  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11741  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11742  std::vector<uint> data;
11743  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11744  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11745  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11746  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11747  }
11748  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11749  }
11750  }
11751  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_uint>" << std::endl;
11752  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ) {
11753  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_int " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11754  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11755  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11756  std::vector<int> data;
11757  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11758  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11759  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11760  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11761  }
11762  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11763  }
11764  }
11765  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_int>" << std::endl;
11766  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ) {
11767  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_int2 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11768  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11769  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11770  std::vector<int2> data;
11771  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11772  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11773  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11774  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << std::flush;
11775  }
11776  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11777  }
11778  }
11779  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_int2>" << std::endl;
11780  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ) {
11781  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_int3 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11782  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11783  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11784  std::vector<int3> data;
11785  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11786  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11787  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11788  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << " " << data.at(i).z << std::flush;
11789  }
11790  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11791  }
11792  }
11793  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_int3>" << std::endl;
11794  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ) {
11795  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_int4 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11796  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11797  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11798  std::vector<int4> data;
11799  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11800  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11801  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11802  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << " " << data.at(i).z << " " << data.at(i).w << std::flush;
11803  }
11804  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11805  }
11806  }
11807  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_int4>" << std::endl;
11808  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ) {
