11809  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_vec2 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11810  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11811  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11812  std::vector<vec2> data;
11813  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11814  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11815  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11816  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << std::flush;
11817  }
11818  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11819  }
11820  }
11821  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_vec2>" << std::endl;
11822  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ) {
11823  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_vec3 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11824  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11825  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11826  std::vector<vec3> data;
11827  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11828  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11829  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11830  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << " " << data.at(i).z << std::flush;
11831  }
11832  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11833  }
11834  }
11835  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_vec3>" << std::endl;
11836  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ) {
11837  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_vec4 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11838  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11839  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11840  std::vector<vec4> data;
11841  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11842  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11843  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11844  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << " " << data.at(i).z << " " << data.at(i).w << std::flush;
11845  }
11846  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11847  }
11848  }
11849  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_vec4>" << std::endl;
11850  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ) {
11851  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_string " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11852  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11853  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11854  std::vector<std::string> data;
11855  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11856  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11857  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11858  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11859  }
11860  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11861  }
11862  }
11863  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_string>" << std::endl;
11864  }
11865 
11866 
11867  }
11868 
11869  //Tiles
11870  if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
11871 
11872  Tile* tile = getTileObjectPointer(o);
11873 
11874  float transform[16];
11875  tile->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11876 
11877  int2 subdiv = tile->getSubdivisionCount();
11878  outfile << "\t<subdivisions>" << subdiv.x << " " << subdiv.y << "</subdivisions>" << std::endl;
11879 
11880  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11881  for(float i : transform){
11882  outfile << i << " ";
11883  }
11884  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11885 
11886  outfile << " </tile>" << std::endl;
11887 
11888  //Spheres
11889  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
11890 
11891  Sphere* sphere = getSphereObjectPointer(o);
11892 
11893  float transform[16];
11894  sphere->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11895 
11896  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11897  for(float i : transform){
11898  outfile << i << " ";
11899  }
11900  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11901 
11902  uint subdiv = sphere->getSubdivisionCount();
11903  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
11904 
11905  outfile << " </sphere>" << std::endl;
11906 
11907  //Tubes
11908  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ) {
11909 
11910  Tube *tube = getTubeObjectPointer(o);
11911 
11912  float transform[16];
11913  tube->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11914 
11915  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11916  for (float i: transform) {
11917  outfile << i << " ";
11918  }
11919  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11920 
11921  uint subdiv = tube->getSubdivisionCount();
11922  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
11923 
11924  std::vector<vec3> nodes = tube->getNodes();
11925  std::vector<float> radius = tube->getNodeRadii();
11926 
11927  assert(nodes.size() == radius.size());
11928  outfile << "\t<nodes> " << std::endl;
11929  for (int i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
11930  outfile << "\t\t" << nodes.at(i).x << " " << nodes.at(i).y << " " << nodes.at(i).z << std::endl;
11931  }
11932  outfile << "\t</nodes> " << std::endl;
11933  outfile << "\t<radius> " << std::endl;
11934  for (int i = 0; i < radius.size(); i++) {
11935  outfile << "\t\t" << radius.at(i) << std::endl;
11936  }
11937  outfile << "\t</radius> " << std::endl;
11938 
11939  if( texture_file.empty() ) {
11940  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors = tube->getNodeColors();
11941 
11942  outfile << "\t<color> " << std::endl;
11943  for (int i = 0; i < colors.size(); i++) {
11944  outfile << "\t\t" << colors.at(i).r << " " << colors.at(i).g << " " << colors.at(i).b << std::endl;
11945  }
11946  outfile << "\t</color> " << std::endl;
11947 
11948  }
11949 
11950  outfile << " </tube>" << std::endl;
11951 
11952  //Boxes
11953  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_BOX ) {
11954 
11955  Box *box = getBoxObjectPointer(o);
11956 
11957  float transform[16];
11958  box->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11959 
11960  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11961  for (float i: transform) {
11962  outfile << i << " ";
11963  }
11964  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11965 
11966  int3 subdiv = box->getSubdivisionCount();
11967  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv.x << " " << subdiv.y << " " << subdiv.z << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
11968 
11969  outfile << " </box>" << std::endl;
11970 
11971  //Disks
11972  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_DISK ) {
11973 
11974  Disk *disk = getDiskObjectPointer(o);
11975 
11976  float transform[16];
11977  disk->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11978 
11979  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11980  for (float i: transform) {
11981  outfile << i << " ";
11982  }
11983  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11984 
11985  uint subdiv = disk->getSubdivisionCount();
11986  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
11987 
11988  outfile << " </disk>" << std::endl;
11989 
11990  //Cones
11991  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_CONE ) {
11992 
11993  Cone *cone = getConeObjectPointer(o);
11994 
11995  float transform[16];
11996  cone->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11997 
11998  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11999  for (float i: transform) {
12000  outfile << i << " ";
12001  }
12002  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
12003 
12004  uint subdiv = cone->getSubdivisionCount();
12005  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
12006 
12007  std::vector<vec3> nodes = cone->getNodes();
12008  std::vector<float> radius = cone->getNodeRadii();
12009 
12010  assert(nodes.size() == radius.size());
12011  outfile << "\t<nodes> " << std::endl;
12012  for (int i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
12013  outfile << "\t\t" << nodes.at(i).x << " " << nodes.at(i).y << " " << nodes.at(i).z << std::endl;
12014  }
12015  outfile << "\t</nodes> " << std::endl;
12016  outfile << "\t<radius> " << std::endl;
12017  for (int i = 0; i < radius.size(); i++) {
12018  outfile << "\t\t" << radius.at(i) << std::endl;
12019  }
12020  outfile << "\t</radius> " << std::endl;
12021 
12022  outfile << " </cone>" << std::endl;
12023 
12024  }
12025 
12026  }
12027 
12028 
12029  // -- global data -- //
12030 
12031  for(const auto & iter : globaldata){
12032  std::string label = iter.first;
12033  GlobalData data = iter.second;
12034  HeliosDataType type = data.type;
12035  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
12036  outfile << " <globaldata_uint label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12037  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12038  outfile << data.global_data_uint.at(i) << std::flush;
12039  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12040  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12041  }
12042  }
12043  outfile << "</globaldata_uint>" << std::endl;
12044  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
12045  outfile << " <globaldata_int label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12046  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12047  outfile << data.global_data_int.at(i) << std::flush;
12048  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12049  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12050  }
12051  }
12052  outfile << "</globaldata_int>" << std::endl;
12053  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
12054  outfile << " <globaldata_float label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12055  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12056  outfile << data.global_data_float.at(i) << std::flush;
12057  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12058  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12059  }
12060  }
12061  outfile << "</globaldata_float>" << std::endl;
12062  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
12063  outfile << " <globaldata_double label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12064  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12065  outfile << data.global_data_double.at(i) << std::flush;
12066  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12067  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12068  }
12069  }
12070  outfile << "</globaldata_double>" << std::endl;
12071  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
12072  outfile << " <globaldata_vec2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12073  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12074  outfile << data.global_data_vec2.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec2.at(i).y << std::flush;
12075  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12076  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12077  }
12078  }
12079  outfile << "</globaldata_vec2>" << std::endl;
12080  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
12081  outfile << " <globaldata_vec3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12082  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12083  outfile << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).y << " " << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).z << std::flush;
12084  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12085  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12086  }
12087  }
12088  outfile << "</globaldata_vec3>" << std::endl;
12089  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
12090  outfile << " <globaldata_vec4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12091  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12092  outfile << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).y << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).z << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).w << std::flush;
12093  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12094  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12095  }
12096  }
12097  outfile << "</globaldata_vec4>" << std::endl;
12098  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
12099  outfile << " <globaldata_int2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12100  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12101  outfile << data.global_data_int2.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int2.at(i).y << std::flush;
12102  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12103  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12104  }
12105  }
12106  outfile << "</globaldata_int2>" << std::endl;
12107  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
12108  outfile << " <globaldata_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12109  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12110  outfile << data.global_data_int3.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int3.at(i).y << data.global_data_int3.at(i).z << std::flush;
12111  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12112  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12113  }
12114  }
12115  outfile << "</globaldata_int3>" << std::endl;
12116  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
12117  outfile << " <globaldata_int4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12118  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12119  outfile << data.global_data_int4.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int4.at(i).y << data.global_data_int4.at(i).z << data.global_data_int4.at(i).w << std::flush;
12120  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12121  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12122  }
12123  }
12124  outfile << "</globaldata_int4>" << std::endl;
12125  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
12126  outfile << " <globaldata_string label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12127  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12128  outfile << data.global_data_string.at(i) << std::flush;
12129  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12130  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12131  }
12132  }
12133  outfile << "</globaldata_string>" << std::endl;
12134  }
12135 
12136  }
12137 
12138  // -- timeseries -- //
12139 
12140  for(const auto & iter : timeseries_data){
12141 
12142  std::string label = iter.first;
12143 
12144  std::vector<float> data = iter.second;
12145  std::vector<double> dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label);
12146 
12147  assert( data.size()==dateval.size() );
12148 
12149  outfile << " <timeseries label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::endl;
12150 
12151  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size(); i++ ){
12152 
12153  Date a_date = queryTimeseriesDate( label.c_str(), i );
12154  Time a_time = queryTimeseriesTime( label.c_str(), i );
12155 
12156  outfile << "\t<datapoint>" << std::endl;
12157 
12158  outfile << "\t <date>" << a_date.day << " " << a_date.month << " " << a_date.year << "</date>" << std::endl;
12159 
12160  outfile << "\t <time>" << a_time.hour << " " << a_time.minute << " " << a_time.second << "</time>" << std::endl;
12161 
12162  outfile << "\t <value>" << data.at(i) << "</value>" << std::endl;
12163 
12164  outfile << "\t</datapoint>" << std::endl;
12165  }
12166 
12167  outfile << " </timeseries>" << std::endl;
12168 
12169  }
12170 
12171  // ----------------- //
12172 
12173  outfile << "\n</helios>\n";
12174 
12175  outfile.close();
12176 
12177  if( !quiet ) {
12178  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
12179  }
12180 }
12181 
12182 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height ){
12183  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_RGBcolor(0,0,1) );
12184 }
12185 
12186 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const SphericalCoord &rotation ){
12187  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, rotation, make_RGBcolor(0,0,1) );
12188 }
12189 
12190 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const RGBcolor &default_color ){
12191  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), default_color );
12192 }
12193 
12194 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &default_color ){
12195 
12196  std::cout << "Reading PLY file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
12197 
12198  std::string line, prop;
12199 
12200  uint vertexCount=0, faceCount=0;
12201 
12202  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
12203  std::vector<std::vector<int> > faces;
12204  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
12205  std::vector<std::string> properties;
12206 
12207  bool ifColor=false;
12208 
12209  std::ifstream inputPly;
12210  inputPly.open(filename);
12211 
12212  if (!inputPly.is_open()) {
12213  throw( std::runtime_error("Couldn't open " + std::string(filename) ));
12214  }
12215 
12216  //--- read header info -----//
12217 
12218  //first line should always be 'ply'
12219  inputPly>>line;
12220  if( strcmp("ply",line.c_str())!=0 ){
12221  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadPLY): " + std::string(filename) + " is not a PLY file."));
12222  }
12223 
12224  //read format
12225  inputPly>>line;
12226  if( strcmp("format",line.c_str())!=0 ){
12227  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadPLY): could not determine data format of " + std::string(filename) ));
12228  }
12229 
12230  inputPly>>line;
12231  if( strcmp("ascii",line.c_str())!=0 ){
12232  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadPLY): Only ASCII data types are supported."));
12233  }
12234 
12235  while(strcmp("end_header",line.c_str())!=0){
12236 
12237  inputPly>>line;
12238 
12239  if( strcmp("comment",line.c_str())==0 ){
12240  getline(inputPly, line);
12241  }
12242  else if( strcmp("element",line.c_str())==0 ){
12243 
12244  inputPly>>line;
12245 
12246  if( strcmp("vertex",line.c_str())==0 ){
12247  inputPly>>vertexCount;
12248  }else if( strcmp("face",line.c_str())==0 ){
12249  inputPly>>faceCount;
12250  }
12251 
12252 
12253  }else if( strcmp("property",line.c_str())==0 ){
12254 
12255  inputPly>>line; //type
12256 
12257  if( strcmp("list",line.c_str())!=0 ){
12258 
12259  inputPly>>prop; //value
12260  properties.push_back(prop);
12261 
12262  }
12263 
12264  }
12265 
12266 
12267  }
12268 
12269  for(auto & propertie : properties){
12270  if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"red")==0 ){
12271  ifColor = true;
12272  }
12273  }
12274  std::cout<< "forming " << faceCount << " triangles..." << std::flush;
12275 
12276  vertices.resize(vertexCount);
12277  colors.resize(vertexCount);
12278  faces.resize(faceCount);
12279 
12280 
12281  //--- read vertices ----//
12282 
12283  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
12284 
12285  for(auto & propertie : properties){
12286  if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"x")==0 ){ //Note: permuting x,y,z to match our coordinate system (z-vertical instead of y-vertical)
12287  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).y;
12288  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"y")==0 ){
12289  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).z;
12290  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"z")==0 ){
12291  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).x;
12292  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"red")==0 ){
12293  inputPly >> colors.at(row).r;
12294  colors.at(row).r /= 255.f;
12295  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"green")==0 ){
12296  inputPly >> colors.at(row).g;
12297  colors.at(row).g /= 255.f;
12298  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"blue")==0 ){
12299  inputPly >> colors.at(row).b;
12300  colors.at(row).b /= 255.f;
12301  // }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"alpha")==0 ){
12302  // inputPly >> colors.at(row).a;
12303  }else{
12304  inputPly >> line;
12305  }
12306  }
12307 
12308  }
12309 
12310  //determine bounding box
12311 
12312  vec3 boxmin = make_vec3(10000,10000,10000);
12313  vec3 boxmax = make_vec3(-10000,-10000,-10000);
12314 
12315  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
12316 
12317  if(vertices.at(row).x < boxmin.x ){
12318  boxmin.x = vertices.at(row).x;
12319  }
12320  if(vertices.at(row).y < boxmin.y ){
12321  boxmin.y = vertices.at(row).y;
12322  }
12323  if(vertices.at(row).z < boxmin.z ){
12324  boxmin.z = vertices.at(row).z;
12325  }
12326 
12327  if(vertices.at(row).x > boxmax.x ){
12328  boxmax.x = vertices.at(row).x;
12329  }
12330  if(vertices.at(row).y > boxmax.y ){
12331  boxmax.y = vertices.at(row).y;
12332  }
12333  if(vertices.at(row).z > boxmax.z ){
12334  boxmax.z = vertices.at(row).z;
12335  }
12336 
12337  }
12338 
12339  //center PLY object at `origin' and scale to have height `height'
12340  float scl = height/(boxmax.z-boxmin.z);
12341  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
12342  vertices.at(row).z -= boxmin.z;
12343 
12344  vertices.at(row).x *= scl;
12345  vertices.at(row).y *= scl;
12346  vertices.at(row).z *= scl;
12347 
12348  vertices.at(row) = rotatePoint(vertices.at(row),rotation) + origin;
12349  }
12350 
12351  //--- read faces ----//
12352 
12353  uint v, ID;
12354  std::vector<uint> UUID;
12355  for( uint row=0; row<faceCount; row++ ){
12356 
12357  inputPly >> v;
12358 
12359  faces.at(row).resize(v);
12360 
12361  for( uint i=0; i<v; i++ ){
12362  inputPly >> faces.at(row).at(i);
12363  }
12364 
12365  //Add triangles to context
12366 
12367  for( uint t=2; t<v; t++ ){
12368 
12369  RGBcolor color;
12370  if( ifColor ){
12371  color = colors.at(faces.at(row).front());
12372  }else{
12373  color = default_color;
12374  }
12375 
12376  vec3 v0 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).front());
12377  vec3 v1 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).at(t-1));
12378  vec3 v2 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).at(t));
12379 
12380  if( (v0-v1).magnitude()==0 || (v0-v2).magnitude()==0 || (v1-v2).magnitude()==0 ){
12381  continue;
12382  }
12383 
12384  ID = addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color );
12385 
12386  UUID.push_back(ID);
12387 
12388  }
12389 
12390  }
12391 
12392  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
12393 
12394  return UUID;
12395 
12396 }
12397 
12398 void Context::writePLY( const char* filename ) const{
12399 
12400  std::ofstream PLYfile;
12401  PLYfile.open(filename);
12402 
12403  PLYfile << "ply" << std::endl << "format ascii 1.0" << std::endl << "comment HELIOS generated" << std::endl;
12404 
12405  std::vector<int3> faces;
12406  std::vector<vec3> verts;
12407  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
12408 
12409  size_t vertex_count = 0;
12410 
12411  for(auto primitive : primitives){
12412 
12413  uint p = primitive.first;
12414 
12415  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
12416  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getType();
12417  RGBcolor C = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getColor();
12418  C.scale(255.f);
12419 
12420  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
12421 
12422  faces.push_back( make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count+1, (int)vertex_count+2 ) );
12423  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
12424  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
12425  colors.push_back( C );
12426  vertex_count ++;
12427  }
12428 
12429  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
12430 
12431  faces.push_back( make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count+1, (int)vertex_count+2 ) );
12432  faces.push_back( make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count+2, (int)vertex_count+3 ) );
12433  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
12434  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
12435  colors.push_back( C );
12436  vertex_count ++;
12437  }
12438 
12439  }
12440 
12441  }
12442 
12443  PLYfile << "element vertex " << verts.size() << std::endl;
12444  PLYfile << "property float x" << std::endl << "property float y" << std::endl << "property float z" << std::endl;
12445  PLYfile << "property uchar red" << std::endl << "property uchar green" << std::endl << "property uchar blue" << std::endl;
12446  PLYfile << "element face " << faces.size() << std::endl;
12447  PLYfile << "property list uchar int vertex_indices" << std::endl << "end_header" << std::endl;
12448 
12449  for( size_t v=0; v<verts.size(); v++ ){
12450  PLYfile << verts.at(v).x << " " << verts.at(v).y << " " << verts.at(v).z << " " << round(colors.at(v).r) << " " << round(colors.at(v).g) << " " << round(colors.at(v).b) << std::endl;
12451  }
12452 
12453  for(auto & face : faces){
12454  PLYfile << "3 " << face.x << " " << face.y << " " << face.z << std::endl;
12455  }
12456 
12457  PLYfile.close();
12458 
12459 
12460 }
12461 
12462 std::vector<uint> Context::loadOBJ(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &default_color ){
12463  return loadOBJ(filename,origin,height,rotation,default_color,"ZUP");
12464 }
12465 
12466 std::vector<uint> Context::loadOBJ(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &default_color, const char* upaxis ){
12467 
12468  std::cout << "Reading OBJ file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
12469 
12470  if( strcmp(upaxis,"XUP") != 0 && strcmp(upaxis,"YUP") != 0 && strcmp(upaxis,"ZUP") != 0 ){
12471  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadOBJ): Up axis of " + std::string(upaxis) + " is not valid. Should be one of 'XUP', 'YUP', or 'ZUP'."));
12472  }
12473 
12474  std::string line, prop;
12475 
12476  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
12477  std::vector<vec2> texture_uv;
12478  std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::vector<int> > > face_inds, texture_inds;
12479 
12480  std::map<std::string,std::string> material_textures;
12481 
12482  std::vector<uint> UUID;
12483 
12484  std::ifstream inputOBJ, inputMTL;
12485  inputOBJ.open(filename);
12486 
12487  if (!inputOBJ.is_open()) {
12488  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadOBJ): Couldn't open " + std::string(filename) ));
12489  }
12490 
12491  //determine the base file path for 'filename'
12492  std::string fstring = filename;
12493  std::string filebase;
12494  for( size_t i=fstring.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ){
12495  if( strncmp(&fstring[i],"/",1)==0 ){
12496  for( int ii=0; ii<=i; ii++ ){
12497  filebase.push_back(fstring.at(ii));
12498  }
12499  break;
12500  }
12501  }
12502 
12503  //determine bounding box
12504  float boxmin = 100000;
12505  float boxmax = -100000;
12506 
12507  std::string current_material = "none";
12508 
12509  while( inputOBJ.good() ){
12510 
12511  inputOBJ>>line;
12512 
12513  // ------- COMMENTS --------- //
12514  if( strcmp("#",line.c_str())==0 ){
12515  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12516 
12517  // ------- MATERIAL LIBRARY ------- //
12518  }else if( strcmp("mtllib",line.c_str())==0 ){
12519  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12520  std::string material_file = deblank(line.c_str());
12521  material_textures = loadMTL( filebase, material_file );
12522 
12523  // ------- VERTICES --------- //
12524  }else if( strcmp("v",line.c_str())==0 ){
12525  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12526  //parse vertices into points
12527  vec3 verts(string2vec3(line.c_str()));
12528  vertices.emplace_back(verts);
12529 
12530  if(verts.z < boxmin ){
12531  boxmin = verts.z;
12532  }
12533  if(verts.z > boxmax ){
12534  boxmax = verts.z;
12535  }
12536 
12537  // ------- TEXTURE COORDINATES --------- //
12538  }else if( strcmp("vt",line.c_str())==0 ){
12539  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12540  //parse coordinates into uv
12541  vec2 uv(string2vec2(line.c_str()));
12542  texture_uv.emplace_back(uv);
12543 
12544  // ------- MATERIALS --------- //
12545  }else if( strcmp("usemtl",line.c_str())==0 ){
12546  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12547  current_material = line;
12548 
12549  // ------- FACES --------- //
12550  }else if( strcmp("f",line.c_str())==0 ){
12551  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12552  //parse face vertices
12553  std::istringstream stream(line);
12554  std::string tmp, digitf, digitu;
12555  std::vector<int> f, u;
12556  while( stream.good() ){
12557 
12558  stream >> tmp;
12559 
12560  digitf="";
12561  int ic = 0;
12562  for(char i : tmp){
12563  if( isdigit(i) ){
12564  digitf.push_back( i );
12565  ic++;
12566  }else{
12567  break;
12568  }
12569  }
12570 
12571  digitu="";
12572  for( int i=ic+1; i<tmp.size(); i++ ){
12573  if( isdigit(tmp[i]) ){
12574  digitu.push_back( tmp[i] );
12575  }else{
12576  break;
12577  }
12578  }
12579 
12580  if( !digitf.empty() && !digitu.empty() ){
12581  f.push_back( std::stoi(digitf) );
12582  u.push_back( std::stoi(digitu) );
12583  }
12584 
12585  }
12586  face_inds[current_material].push_back(f);
12587  texture_inds[current_material].push_back(u);
12588 
12589  // ------ OTHER STUFF --------- //
12590  }else{
12591  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12592  }
12593  }
12594 
12595  float scl = height/(boxmax-boxmin);
12596 
12597  for(std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::vector<int> > >::const_iterator iter = face_inds.begin(); iter != face_inds.end(); ++iter){
12598 
12599  std::string material = iter->first;
12600  std::string texture;
12601  if( material_textures.find(material)!=material_textures.end() ){
12602  texture = material_textures.at(material);
12603  }
12604 
12605  for( size_t i=0; i<face_inds.at(material).size(); i++ ){
12606 
12607  for( uint t=2; t<face_inds.at(material).at(i).size(); t++ ){
12608 
12609  RGBcolor color = default_color;
12610 
12611  vec3 v0 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(material).at(i).at(0)-1);
12612  vec3 v1 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(material).at(i).at(t-1)-1);
12613  vec3 v2 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(material).at(i).at(t)-1);
12614 
12615  if( (v0-v1).magnitude()==0 || (v0-v2).magnitude()==0 || (v1-v2).magnitude()==0 ){
12616  continue;
12617  }
12618 
12619  if( strcmp(upaxis,"YUP")==0 ){
12620  v0 = rotatePointAboutLine(v0,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
12621  v1 = rotatePointAboutLine(v1,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
12622  v2 = rotatePointAboutLine(v2,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
12623  }
12624 
12625  v0 = rotatePoint(v0,rotation);
12626  v1 = rotatePoint(v1,rotation);
12627  v2 = rotatePoint(v2,rotation);
12628 
12629  uint ID;
12630  if( !texture.empty() && !texture_inds.at(material).at(i).empty() ){//has texture
12631 
12632  if( t<texture_inds.at(material).at(i).size() ){
12633  int iuv0 = texture_inds.at(material).at(i).at(0)-1;
12634  int iuv1 = texture_inds.at(material).at(i).at(t-1)-1;
12635  int iuv2 = texture_inds.at(material).at(i).at(t)-1;
12636 
12637  ID = addTriangle( origin+v0*scl, origin+v1*scl, origin+v2*scl, texture.c_str(), texture_uv.at(iuv0), texture_uv.at(iuv1), texture_uv.at(iuv2) );
12638 
12639  vec3 normal = getPrimitivePointer_private(ID)->getNormal();
12640 
12641  }
12642  }else{
12643  ID = addTriangle( origin+v0*scl, origin+v1*scl, origin+v2*scl, color );
12644  }
12645 
12646  UUID.push_back(ID);
12647 
12648  }
12649  }
12650  }
12651 
12652  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
12653 
12654  return UUID;
12655 
12656 }
12657 
12658 std::map<std::string, std::string> Context::loadMTL(const std::string &filebase, const std::string &material_file ){
12659 
12660  std::ifstream inputMTL;
12661 
12662  std::string file = material_file;
12663 
12664  //first look for mtl file using path given in obj file
12665  inputMTL.open(file.c_str());
12666  if( !inputMTL.is_open() ){
12667  //if that doesn't work, try looking in the same directry where obj file is located
12668  file = filebase+file;
12669  file.erase( remove( file.begin(), file.end(), ' ' ), file.end() );
12670  for( size_t i=file.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ){
12671  if( strcmp(&file.at(i),"l")==0 ){
12672  break;
12673  }else{
12674  file.erase(file.begin()+(int)i);
12675  }
12676  }
12677  if( file.empty() ){
12678  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadMTL): Material file does not have correct file extension (.mtl)."));
12679  }
12680  inputMTL.open( file.c_str() );
12681  if( !inputMTL.is_open() ){
12682  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadMTL): Material file " + std::string(file) + " given in .obj file cannot be found."));
12683  }
12684  }
12685 
12686  std::map<std::string, std::string> material_textures;
12687 
12688  std::string line;
12689 
12690  inputMTL>>line;
12691 
12692  while( inputMTL.good() ){
12693 
12694  if( strcmp("#",line.c_str())==0 ){ //comments
12695  getline(inputMTL, line);
12696  inputMTL>>line;
12697  }else if( strcmp("newmtl",line.c_str())==0 ){ //material library
12698  getline(inputMTL, line);
12699  std::string material_name = line;
12700  material_textures[material_name] = "";
12701 
12702  //std::cout << "Found a material library: " << material_name << std::endl;
12703 
12704  while( strcmp("newmtl",line.c_str())!=0 && inputMTL.good() ){
12705 
12706  if( strcmp("map_a",line.c_str())==0 ){
12707  getline(inputMTL, line);
12708  }else if( strcmp("map_Ka",line.c_str())==0 ){
12709  getline(inputMTL, line);
12710  }else if( strcmp("map_Kd",line.c_str())==0 ){
12711  getline(inputMTL, line);
12712 
12713  std::istringstream stream(line);
12714  std::string tmp;
12715  while( stream.good() ){
12716  stream >> tmp;
12717  int e = (int)tmp.size();
12718  if( (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"n",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"p",1)==0 ) || (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"p",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"j",1)==0 ) || (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"e",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"p",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-4],"j",1)==0 ) ){
12719 
12720  std::string texturefile = tmp;
12721  std::ifstream tfile;
12722 
12723  //first look for texture file using path given in mtl file
12724  tfile.open(texturefile.c_str());
12725  if( !tfile.is_open() ){
12726  //if that doesn't work, try looking in the same directry where obj file is located
12727  tfile.close();
12728  texturefile = filebase+texturefile;
12729  tfile.open( texturefile.c_str() );
12730  if( !tfile.is_open() ){
12731  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadOBJ): Texture file " << texturefile << " given in .mtl file cannot be found." << std::endl;
12732  }
12733  }
12734  tfile.close();
12735 
12736  material_textures[material_name] = texturefile;
12737  }
12738  }
12739 
12740  }else if( strcmp("map_Ks",line.c_str())==0 ){
12741  getline(inputMTL, line);
12742  }else{
12743  getline(inputMTL, line);
12744  }
12745 
12746  inputMTL>>line;
12747  }
12748 
12749  }else{
12750  getline(inputMTL, line);
12751  inputMTL>>line;
12752  }
12753  }
12754 
12755  return material_textures;
12756 
12757 }
12758 
12759 void Context::writeOBJ( const char* filename ) const{
12760 
12761  //To-Do list for OBJ writer
12762  // - image files need to be copied to the location where the .obj file is being written otherwise they won't be found.
12763  // - should parse "filename" to check that extension is .obj, and remove .obj extension when appending .mtl for material file.
12764  // - it would make more sense to write patches as quads rather than two triangles
12765 
12766  std::cout << "Writing OBJ file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
12767  std::ofstream file;
12768 
12769  char objfilename[50];
12770  sprintf(objfilename, "%s.obj", filename);
12771  file.open(objfilename);
12772 
12773  file << "# Helios generated OBJ File" << std::endl;
12774  file << "# baileylab.ucdavis.edu/software/helios" << std::endl;
12775  file << "mtllib " << filename << ".mtl" << std::endl;
12776  std::vector < int3 > faces;
12777  std::vector < vec3 > verts;
12778  std::vector < vec2 > uv;
12779  std::vector < int3 > uv_inds;
12780  std::vector < std::string > texture_list;
12781  std::vector < RGBcolor > colors;
12782  size_t vertex_count = 1; //OBJ files start indices at 1
12783  size_t uv_count = 1;
12784 
12785  for (auto primitive : primitives) {
12786 
12787  uint p = primitive.first;
12788 
12789  std::vector < vec3 > vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
12790  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getType();
12791  RGBcolor C = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getColor();
12792 
12793  if (type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE) {
12794 
12795  faces.push_back(make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count + 1, (int)vertex_count + 2));
12796  colors.push_back(C);
12797  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
12798  verts.push_back(vertices.at(i));
12799  vertex_count++;
12800  }
12801 
12802  std::vector < vec2 > uv_v = getTrianglePointer_private(p)->getTextureUV();
12803  if (getTrianglePointer_private(p)->hasTexture()) {
12804  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3( (int)uv_count, (int)uv_count + 1, (int)uv_count + 2));
12805  texture_list.push_back(getTrianglePointer_private(p)->getTextureFile());
12806  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
12807  uv.push_back( uv_v.at(i) );
12808  uv_count++;
12809  }
12810  } else {
12811  texture_list.emplace_back("");
12812  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3(-1, -1, -1));
12813  }
12814 
12815  } else if (type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH) {
12816  faces.push_back(make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count + 1, (int)vertex_count + 2));
12817  faces.push_back(make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count + 2, (int)vertex_count + 3));
12818  colors.push_back(C);
12819  colors.push_back(C);
12820  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
12821  verts.push_back(vertices.at(i));
12822  vertex_count++;
12823  }
12824  std::vector < vec2 > uv_v;
12825  std::string texturefile;
12826  uv_v = getPatchPointer_private(p)->getTextureUV();
12827  texturefile = getPatchPointer_private(p)->getTextureFile();
12828 
12829  if (getPatchPointer_private(p)->hasTexture()) {
12830  texture_list.push_back(texturefile);
12831  texture_list.push_back(texturefile);
12832  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3( (int)uv_count, (int)uv_count + 1, (int)uv_count + 2));
12833  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3( (int)uv_count, (int)uv_count + 2, (int)uv_count + 3));
12834  if (uv_v.empty()) { //default (u,v)
12835  uv.push_back( make_vec2(0, 1) );
12836  uv.push_back( make_vec2(1, 1) );
12837  uv.push_back( make_vec2(1, 0) );
12838  uv.push_back( make_vec2(0, 0) );
12839  uv_count += 4;
12840  } else { //custom (u,v)
12841  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
12842  uv.push_back( uv_v.at(i) );
12843  uv_count++;
12844  }
12845  }
12846  } else {
12847  texture_list.emplace_back("");
12848  texture_list.emplace_back("");
12849  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3(-1, -1, -1));
12850  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3(-1, -1, -1));
12851  }
12852  }
12853  }
12854 
12855  assert(uv_inds.size() == faces.size());
12856  assert(texture_list.size() == faces.size());
12857  assert(colors.size() == faces.size());
12858 
12859  for (auto & vert : verts) {
12860  file << "v " << vert.x << " " << vert.y << " " << vert.z << std::endl;
12861  }
12862 
12863  for (auto & v : uv) {
12864  file << "vt " << v.x << " " << v.y << std::endl;
12865  }
12866 
12867  std::string current_texture;
12868  int material_count = 1;
12869  std::vector < size_t > exsit_mtl_list;
12870 
12871  current_texture = texture_list.at(0);
12872  file << "usemtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
12873  material_count++;
12874  exsit_mtl_list.push_back(0);
12875 
12876  if (uv_inds.at(0).x < 0) {
12877  file << "f " << faces.at(0).x << " " << faces.at(0).y << " "
12878  << faces.at(0).z << std::endl;
12879  } else {
12880  //assert( uv_inds.at(f).x <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).y <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).z <= uv.size() );
12881  file << "f " << faces.at(0).x << "/" << uv_inds.at(0).x << " "
12882  << faces.at(0).y << "/" << uv_inds.at(0).y << " " << faces.at(0).z
12883  << "/" << uv_inds.at(0).z << std::endl;
12884  }
12885 
12886  for (size_t f = 1; f < faces.size(); f++) {
12887 
12888  if (current_texture != texture_list.at(f)) {
12889  bool mtl_exist_flag = false;
12890  size_t mtl_index = 0;
12891  size_t mtl_index_f = 0;
12892  for (size_t index = 0; index < exsit_mtl_list.size(); index++) {
12893  if (texture_list.at(f) == texture_list.at(exsit_mtl_list[index])) {
12894  mtl_exist_flag = true;
12895  mtl_index = index;
12896  mtl_index_f = exsit_mtl_list[index];
12897  break;
12898  }
12899  }
12900 
12901  if (mtl_exist_flag) {
12902  current_texture = texture_list.at(mtl_index_f);
12903  file << "usemtl material" << (mtl_index + 1) << std::endl; //we plus 1 here as we index mtl from 1 instead of 0 in the file.
12904  } else {
12905  current_texture = texture_list.at(f);
12906  file << "usemtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
12907  material_count++;
12908  exsit_mtl_list.push_back(f);
12909  }
12910  }
12911 
12912  if (uv_inds.at(f).x < 0) {
12913  file << "f " << faces.at(f).x << " " << faces.at(f).y << " "
12914  << faces.at(f).z << std::endl;
12915  } else {
12916  //assert( uv_inds.at(f).x <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).y <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).z <= uv.size() );
12917  file << "f " << faces.at(f).x << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).x << " "
12918  << faces.at(f).y << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).y << " " << faces.at(f).z
12919  << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).z << std::endl;
12920  }
12921  }
12922  file.close();
12923 
12924  char mtlfilename[50];
12925  sprintf(mtlfilename, "%s.mtl", filename);
12926  file.open(mtlfilename);
12927 
12928  current_texture = "";
12929  material_count = 1;
12930  RGBcolor current_color = make_RGBcolor(0.010203, 0.349302, 0.8372910);
12931  std::vector < size_t > exsit_mtl_list2;
12932 
12933  if (texture_list.at(0).empty()) { //has no texture
12934  if (current_color.r != colors.at(0).r && current_color.g != colors.at(0).g
12935  && current_color.b != colors.at(0).b) { //new color
12936  current_texture = texture_list.at(0);
12937  current_color = colors.at(0);
12938  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
12939  file << "Ka " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " "
12940  << current_color.b << std::endl;
12941  file << "Kd " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " "
12942  << current_color.b << std::endl;
12943  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
12944  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
12945  }
12946  }
12947 
12948  else {
12949  current_texture = texture_list.at(0);
12950  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
12951  file << "Ka 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
12952  file << "Kd 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
12953  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
12954  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
12955  file << "map_Ka " << current_texture << std::endl;
12956  file << "map_Kd " << current_texture << std::endl;
12957  file << "map_d " << current_texture << std::endl;
12958  }
12959 
12960  material_count++;
12961  exsit_mtl_list2.push_back(0);
12962 
12963  for (size_t f = 1; f < faces.size(); f++) {
12964  bool mtl_exist_flag = false;
12965  size_t mtl_index = 0;
12966  size_t mtl_index_f = 0;
12967  for (size_t index = 0; index < exsit_mtl_list2.size(); index++) {
12968  if ( !(texture_list.at(f) != texture_list.at(exsit_mtl_list2.at(index)))) {
12969  mtl_exist_flag = true;
12970  mtl_index = index;
12971  mtl_index_f = exsit_mtl_list2[index];
12972  break;
12973  }
12974  }
12975  if ( !mtl_exist_flag) {
12976 
12977  if (texture_list.at(f).empty()) {
12978  if (current_color.r != colors.at(f).r
12979  && current_color.g != colors.at(f).g
12980  && current_color.b != colors.at(f).b) { //new color
12981 
12982  current_texture = texture_list.at(f);
12983  current_color = colors.at(f);
12984  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
12985  file << "Ka " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " "
12986  << current_color.b << std::endl;
12987  file << "Kd " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " "
12988  << current_color.b << std::endl;
12989  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
12990  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
12991  material_count++;
12992  }
12993  } else {
12994  current_texture = texture_list.at(f);
12995  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
12996  file << "Ka 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
12997  file << "Kd 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
12998  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
12999  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
13000  file << "map_Ka " << current_texture << std::endl;
13001  file << "map_Kd " << current_texture << std::endl;
13002  file << "map_d " << current_texture << std::endl;
13003  material_count++;
13004  exsit_mtl_list2.push_back(f);
13005  }
13006 
13007  }
13008  }
13009  file.close();
13010  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
13011 }
13012 
13013 void Context::writePrimitiveData( std::string filename, const std::vector<std::string> &column_format, bool print_header ) const{
13014  writePrimitiveData(filename,column_format,getAllUUIDs(),print_header);
13015 }
13016 
13017 void Context::writePrimitiveData( std::string filename, const std::vector<std::string> &column_format, const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, bool print_header ) const{
13018 
13019  std::ofstream file(filename);
13020 
13021  if( print_header ){
13022  for( const auto &label : column_format ) {
13023  file << label << " ";
13024  }
13025  file.seekp(-1, std::ios_base::end);
13026  file << "\n";
13027  }
13028 
13029  bool uuidexistswarning = false;
13030  bool dataexistswarning = false;
13031  bool datatypewarning = false;
13032 
13033  for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
13034  if( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
13035  uuidexistswarning=true;
13036  continue;
13037  }
13038  for( const auto &label : column_format ) {
13039  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) ){
13040  dataexistswarning=true;
13041  file << 0 << " ";
13042  continue;
13043  }
13044  HeliosDataType type = getPrimitiveDataType( UUID, label.c_str() );
13045  if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13046  int data;
13047  getPrimitiveData( UUID, label.c_str(), data );
13048  file << data << " ";
13049  }else if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ) {
13050  uint data;
13051  getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), data);
13052  file << data << " ";
13053  }else if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ) {
13054  float data;
13055  getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), data);
13056  file << data << " ";
13057  }else if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ) {
13058  double data;
13059  getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), data);
13060  file << data << " ";
13061  }else if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ) {
13062  std::string data;
13063  getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), data);
13064  file << data << " ";
13065  }else{
13066  datatypewarning=true;
13067  file << 0 << " ";
13068  }
13069  }
13070  file.seekp(-1, std::ios_base::end);
13071  file << "\n";
13072  }
13073 
13074  if( uuidexistswarning ){
13075  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::writePrimitiveData): Vector of UUIDs passed to writePrimitiveData() function contained UUIDs that do not exist, which were skipped." << std::endl;
13076  }
13077  if( dataexistswarning ){
13078  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::writePrimitiveData): Primitive data requested did not exist for one or more primitives. A default value of 0 was written in these cases." << std::endl;
13079  }
13080  if( datatypewarning ){
13081  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::writePrimitiveData): Only scalar primitive data types (uint, int, float, and double) are supported for this function. A column of 0's was written in these cases." << std::endl;
13082  }
13083 
13084  file.close();
13085 
13086 }
13087 
13088 
13089 
13090 Context::~Context(){
13091 
13092  for(auto & primitive : primitives){
13093  Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer_private(primitive.first);
13094  delete prim;
13095  }
13096 
13097  for(auto & object : objects){
13098  CompoundObject* obj = getObjectPointer(object.first);
13099  delete obj;
13100  }
13101 
13102 }
13103 
13104 PrimitiveType Context::getPrimitiveType(uint UUID) const {
13105  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getType();
13106 }
13107 
13108 void Context::setPrimitiveParentObjectID(uint UUID, uint objID){
13109  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(objID);
13110 }
13111 
13112 void Context::setPrimitiveParentObjectID(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, uint objID) {
13113  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
13114  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(objID);
13115  }
13116 }
13117

13119  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getParentObjectID();
13120 }
13121 
13122 float Context::getPrimitiveArea(uint UUID) const {
13123  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getArea();
13124 }
13125 
13126 void Context::getPrimitiveBoundingBox( uint UUID, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
13127  std::vector<uint> UUIDs{UUID};
13128  getPrimitiveBoundingBox( UUIDs, min_corner, max_corner );
13129 }
13130 
13131 void Context::getPrimitiveBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
13132 
13133  uint p=0;
13134  for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
13135 
13136  if ( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
13137  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveBoundingBox): Primitive with UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
13138  }
13139 
13140  const std::vector<vec3> &vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
13141 
13142  if( p==0 ){
13143  min_corner = vertices.front();
13144  max_corner = min_corner;
13145  p++;
13146  continue;
13147  }
13148 
13149  for ( const vec3 &vert : vertices ){
13150  if ( vert.x<min_corner.x ){
13151  min_corner.x = vert.x;
13152  }
13153  if ( vert.y<min_corner.y ){
13154  min_corner.y = vert.y;
13155  }
13156  if ( vert.z<min_corner.z ){
13157  min_corner.z = vert.z;
13158  }
13159  if ( vert.x>max_corner.x ){
13160  max_corner.x = vert.x;
13161  }
13162  if ( vert.y>max_corner.y ){
13163  max_corner.y = vert.y;
13164  }
13165  if ( vert.z>max_corner.z ){
13166  max_corner.z = vert.z;
13167  }
13168  }
13169 
13170  p++;
13171  }
13172 }
13173 
13174 helios::vec3 Context::getPrimitiveNormal(uint UUID) const {
13175  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getNormal();
13176 }
13177

13184 }

13186 void Context::setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, float (&T)[16] ) {
13187  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){

13189  }
13190 }

13229 std::string Context::getPrimitiveTextureFile( uint UUID ) const{
13230  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
13231 }
13232 
13233 helios::int2 Context::getPrimitiveTextureSize( uint UUID ) const{
13234  std::string texturefile = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
13235  if( !texturefile.empty() && textures.find(texturefile)!=textures.end() ){
13236  return textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
13237  }
13238  return make_int2(0,0);
13239 }
13240 
13241 std::vector<helios::vec2> Context::getPrimitiveTextureUV( uint UUID ) const{
13242  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureUV();
13243 }
13244 
13245 bool Context::primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel( uint UUID ) const{
13246  std::string texturefile = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
13247  if( !texturefile.empty() && textures.find(texturefile)!=textures.end() ){
13248  return textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel();
13249  }
13250  return false;
13251 }
13252 
13253 const std::vector<std::vector<bool>> * Context::getPrimitiveTextureTransparencyData(uint UUID ) const{
13254  if(primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel(UUID) ){
13255  const std::vector<std::vector<bool> > *data = textures.at(getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile()).getTransparencyData();
13256  return data;
13257  }else{
13258  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveTransparencyData): Texture transparency data does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + ".") );
13259  }
13260 }
13261

13263  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->overrideTextureColor();
13264 };
13265 
13266 void Context::usePrimitiveTextureColor( uint UUID ){
13267  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->useTextureColor();
13268 };

13272 }

13275  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getSolidFraction();
13276 }
13277 
13278 void Context::printPrimitiveInfo(uint UUID) const{
13279 
13280  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13281  std::cout << "Info for UUID " << UUID << std::endl;
13282  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13283 
13284  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitiveType(UUID);
13285  std::string stype;
13286  if( type == 0){
13287  stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
13288  }else if(type == 1){
13289  stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
13290  }else if(type == 2){
13291  stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL";
13292  }
13293 
13294  std::cout << "Type: " << stype << std::endl;
13295  std::cout << "Parent ObjID: " << getPrimitiveParentObjectID(UUID) << std::endl;
13296  std::cout << "Surface Area: " << getPrimitiveArea(UUID) << std::endl;
13297  std::cout << "Normal Vector: " << getPrimitiveNormal(UUID) << std::endl;
13298 
13299  if(type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH)
13300  {
13301  std::cout << "Patch Center: " << getPatchCenter(UUID) << std::endl;
13302  std::cout << "Patch Size: " << getPatchSize(UUID) << std::endl;
13303 
13304  }else if(type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL){
13305 
13306  std::cout << "Voxel Center: " << getVoxelCenter(UUID) << std::endl;
13307  std::cout << "Voxel Size: " << getVoxelSize(UUID) << std::endl;
13308  }
13309 
13310  std::vector<vec3> primitive_vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
13311  std::cout << "Vertices: " << std::endl;
13312  for(uint i=0; i<primitive_vertices.size();i++)
13313  {
13314  std::cout << " " << primitive_vertices.at(i) << std::endl;
13315  }
13316 
13317  float T[16];
13318  getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T);
13319  std::cout << "Transform: " << std::endl;
13320  std::cout << " " << T[0] << " " << T[1] << " " << T[2] << " " << T[3] << std::endl;
13321  std::cout << " " << T[4] << " " << T[5] << " " << T[6] << " " << T[7] << std::endl;
13322  std::cout << " " << T[8] << " " << T[9] << " " << T[10] << " " << T[11] << std::endl;
13323  std::cout << " " << T[12] << " " << T[13] << " " << T[14] << " " << T[15] << std::endl;
13324 
13325  std::cout << "Color: " << getPrimitiveColor(UUID) << std::endl;
13326  std::cout << "Texture File: " << getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUID) << std::endl;
13327  std::cout << "Texture Size: " << getPrimitiveTextureSize(UUID) << std::endl;
13328  std::cout << "Texture UV: " << std::endl;
13329  std::vector<vec2> uv = getPrimitiveTextureUV(UUID);
13330  for(uint i=0; i<uv.size();i++)
13331  {
13332  std::cout << " " << uv.at(i) << std::endl;
13333  }
13334 
13335  std::cout << "Texture Transparency: " << primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel(UUID) << std::endl;
13336  std::cout << "Color Overridden: " << isPrimitiveTextureColorOverridden(UUID) << std::endl;
13337  std::cout << "Solid Fraction: " << getPrimitiveSolidFraction(UUID) << std::endl;
13338 
13339 
13340  std::cout << "Primitive Data: " << std::endl;
13341  // Primitive* pointer = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID);
13342  std::vector<std::string> pd = listPrimitiveData(UUID);
13343  for(uint i=0; i<pd.size();i++)
13344  {
13345  uint dsize = getPrimitiveDataSize(UUID, pd.at(i).c_str());
13346  HeliosDataType dtype = getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, pd.at(i).c_str());
13347  std::string dstype;
13348 
13349  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13350  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT";
13351  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
13352  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_UINT";
13353  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
13354  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT";
13355  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
13356  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE";
13357  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
13358  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2";
13359  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
13360  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3";
13361  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
13362  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4";
13363  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
13364  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT2";
13365  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
13366  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT3";
13367  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
13368  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT4";
13369  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
13370  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_STRING";
13371  }else{
13372  assert(false);
13373  }
13374 
13375 
13376  std::cout << " " << "[name: " << pd.at(i) << ", type: " << dstype << ", size: " << dsize << "]:" << std::endl;
13377 
13378 
13379  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13380  std::vector<int> pdata;
13381  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13382  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13383  {
13384  if(j < 10){
13385  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13386  }else{
13387  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13388  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13389  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13390  break;
13391  }
13392 
13393  }
13394  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
13395  std::vector<uint> pdata;
13396  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13397  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13398  {
13399  if(j < 10){
13400  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13401  }else{
13402  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13403  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13404  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13405  break;
13406  }
13407 
13408  }
13409  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
13410  std::vector<float> pdata;
13411  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13412  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13413  {
13414  if(j < 10){
13415  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13416  }else{
13417  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13418  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13419  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13420  break;
13421  }
13422 
13423  }
13424  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
13425  std::vector<double> pdata;
13426  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13427  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13428  {
13429  if(j < 10){
13430  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13431  }else{
13432  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13433  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13434  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13435  break;
13436  }
13437 
13438  }
13439  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
13440  std::vector<vec2> pdata;
13441  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13442  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13443  {
13444  if(j < 10){
13445  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13446  }else{
13447  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13448  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13449  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13450  break;
13451  }
13452 
13453  }
13454  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
13455  std::vector<vec3> pdata;
13456  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13457  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13458  {
13459  if(j < 10){
13460  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13461  }else{
13462  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13463  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13464  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13465  break;
13466  }
13467 
13468  }
13469  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
13470  std::vector<vec4> pdata;
13471  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13472  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13473  {
13474  if(j < 10){
13475  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13476  }else{
13477  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13478  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13479  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13480  break;
13481  }
13482 
13483  }
13484  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
13485  std::vector<int2> pdata;
13486  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13487  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13488  {
13489  if(j < 10){
13490  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13491  }else{
13492  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13493  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13494  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13495  break;
13496  }
13497 
13498  }
13499  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
13500  std::vector<int3> pdata;
13501  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13502  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13503  {
13504  if(j < 10){
13505  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13506  }else{
13507  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13508  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13509  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13510  break;
13511  }
13512 
13513  }
13514  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
13515  std::vector<int4> pdata;
13516  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13517  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13518  {
13519  if(j < 10){
13520  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13521  }else{
13522  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13523  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13524  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13525  break;
13526  }
13527 
13528  }
13529  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
13530  std::vector<std::string> pdata;
13531  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13532  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13533  {
13534  if(j < 10){
13535  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13536  }else{
13537  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13538  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13539  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13540  break;
13541  }
13542 
13543  }
13544  }else{
13545  assert(false);
13546  }
13547 
13548  }
13549  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13550 }
13551 
13552 void Context::printObjectInfo(uint ObjID) const{
13553 
13554  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13555  std::cout << "Info for ObjID " << ObjID << std::endl;
13556  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13557 
13558  ObjectType otype = getObjectType(ObjID);
13559  std::string ostype;
13560  if( otype == 0){
13561  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_TILE";
13562  }else if(otype == 1){
13563  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE";
13564  }else if(otype == 2){
13565  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE";
13566  }else if(otype == 3){
13567  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_BOX";
13568  }else if(otype == 4){
13569  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_DISK";
13570  }else if(otype == 5){
13571  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH";
13572  }else if(otype == 6){
13573  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_CONE";
13574  }
13575 
13576  std::cout << "Type: " << ostype << std::endl;
13577  std::cout << "Object Bounding Box Center: " << getObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13578  std::cout << "One-sided Surface Area: " << getObjectArea(ObjID) << std::endl;
13579 
13580  std::cout << "Primitive Count: " << getObjectPrimitiveCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13581 
13582  if(areObjectPrimitivesComplete(ObjID))
13583  {
13584  std::cout << "Object Primitives Complete" << std::endl;
13585  }else{
13586  std::cout << "Object Primitives Incomplete" << std::endl;
13587  }
13588 
13589  std::cout << "Primitive UUIDs: " << std::endl;
13590  std::vector<uint> primitive_UUIDs = getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ObjID);
13591  for(uint i=0; i<primitive_UUIDs.size();i++)
13592  {
13593  if(i < 5){
13594  PrimitiveType ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(i));
13595  std::string pstype;
13596  if( ptype == 0){
13597  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
13598  }else if(ptype == 1){
13599  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
13600  }
13601  std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(i) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
13602  }else{
13603  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13604  PrimitiveType ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-2));
13605  std::string pstype;
13606  if( ptype == 0){
13607  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
13608  }else if(ptype == 1){
13609  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
13610  }
13611  std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-2) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
13612  ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-1));
13613  if( ptype == 0){
13614  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
13615  }else if(ptype == 1){
13616  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
13617  }
13618  std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-1) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
13619  break;
13620  }
13621  }
13622 
13623  if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_TILE)
13624  {
13625  std::cout << "Tile Center: " << getTileObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13626  std::cout << "Tile Size: " << getTileObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
13627  std::cout << "Tile Subdivision Count: " << getTileObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13628  std::cout << "Tile Normal: " << getTileObjectNormal(ObjID) << std::endl;
13629 
13630  std::cout << "Tile Texture UV: " << std::endl;
13631  std::vector<vec2> uv = getTileObjectTextureUV(ObjID);
13632  for(uint i=0; i<uv.size();i++)
13633  {
13634  std::cout << " " << uv.at(i) << std::endl;
13635  }
13636 
13637  std::cout << "Tile Vertices: " << std::endl;
13638  std::vector<vec3> primitive_vertices = getTileObjectVertices(ObjID);
13639  for(uint i=0; i<primitive_vertices.size();i++)
13640  {
13641  std::cout << " " << primitive_vertices.at(i) << std::endl;
13642  }
13643 
13644 
13645  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE){
13646 
13647  std::cout << "Sphere Center: " << getSphereObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13648  std::cout << "Sphere Radius: " << getSphereObjectRadius(ObjID) << std::endl;
13649  std::cout << "Sphere Subdivision Count: " << getSphereObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13650 
13651  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE){
13652 
13653  std::cout << "Tube Subdivision Count: " << getTubeObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13654  std::cout << "Tube Nodes: " << std::endl;
13655  std::vector<vec3> nodes = getTubeObjectNodes(ObjID);
13656  for(uint i=0; i<nodes.size();i++)
13657  {
13658  if(i < 10){
13659  std::cout << " " << nodes.at(i) << std::endl;
13660  }else{
13661  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13662  std::cout << " " << nodes.at(nodes.size()-2) << std::endl;
13663  std::cout << " " << nodes.at(nodes.size()-1) << std::endl;
13664  break;
13665  }
13666  }
13667  std::cout << "Tube Node Radii: " << std::endl;
13668  std::vector<float> noderadii = getTubeObjectNodeRadii(ObjID);
13669  for(uint i=0; i<noderadii.size();i++)
13670  {
13671  if(i < 10){
13672  std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(i) << std::endl;
13673  }else{
13674  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13675  std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(noderadii.size()-2) << std::endl;
13676  std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(noderadii.size()-1) << std::endl;
13677  break;
13678  }
13679  }
13680  std::cout << "Tube Node Colors: " << std::endl;
13681  std::vector<helios::RGBcolor> nodecolors = getTubeObjectNodeColors(ObjID);
13682  for(uint i=0; i<nodecolors.size();i++)
13683  {
13684  if(i < 10){
13685  std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(i) << std::endl;
13686  }else{
13687  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13688  std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(nodecolors.size()-2) << std::endl;
13689  std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(nodecolors.size()-1) << std::endl;
13690  break;
13691  }
13692  }
13693 
13694  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_BOX){
13695 
13696  std::cout << "Box Center: " << getBoxObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13697  std::cout << "Box Size: " << getBoxObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
13698  std::cout << "Box Subdivision Count: " << getBoxObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13699 
13700  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_DISK){
13701 
13702  std::cout << "Disk Center: " << getDiskObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13703  std::cout << "Disk Size: " << getDiskObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
13704  std::cout << "Disk Subdivision Count: " << getDiskObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13705 
13706  // }else if(type == OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH){
13707  // nothing for now
13708 
13709  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_CONE){
13710 
13711  std::cout << "Cone Length: " << getConeObjectLength(ObjID) << std::endl;
13712  std::cout << "Cone Axis Unit Vector: " << getConeObjectAxisUnitVector(ObjID) << std::endl;
13713  std::cout << "Cone Subdivision Count: " << getConeObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13714  std::cout << "Cone Nodes: " << std::endl;
13715  std::vector<vec3> nodes = getConeObjectNodes(ObjID);
13716  for(uint i=0; i<nodes.size();i++)
13717  {
13718  std::cout << " " << nodes.at(i) << std::endl;
13719  }
13720  std::cout << "Cone Node Radii: " << std::endl;
13721  std::vector<float> noderadii = getConeObjectNodeRadii(ObjID);
13722  for(uint i=0; i<noderadii.size();i++)
13723  {
13724  std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(i) << std::endl;
13725  }
13726  }
13727 
13728 
13729  float T[16];
13730  getObjectTransformationMatrix(ObjID, T);
13731  std::cout << "Transform: " << std::endl;
13732  std::cout << " " << T[0] << " " << T[1] << " " << T[2] << " " << T[3] << std::endl;
13733  std::cout << " " << T[4] << " " << T[5] << " " << T[6] << " " << T[7] << std::endl;
13734  std::cout << " " << T[8] << " " << T[9] << " " << T[10] << " " << T[11] << std::endl;
13735  std::cout << " " << T[12] << " " << T[13] << " " << T[14] << " " << T[15] << std::endl;
13736 
13737  std::cout << "RGB Color: " << getObjectColorRGB(ObjID) << std::endl;
13738  std::cout << "RGBA Color: " << getObjectColorRGBA(ObjID) << std::endl;
13739  std::cout << "Texture File: " << getObjectTextureFile(ObjID) << std::endl;
13740 
13741  std::cout << "Object Data: " << std::endl;
13742  // Primitive* pointer = getPrimitivePointer_private(ObjID);
13743  std::vector<std::string> pd = listObjectData(ObjID);
13744  for(uint i=0; i<pd.size();i++)
13745  {
13746  uint dsize = getObjectDataSize(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str());
13747  HeliosDataType dtype = getObjectDataType(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str());
13748  std::string dstype;
13749 
13750  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13751  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT";
13752  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
13753  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_UINT";
13754  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
13755  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT";
13756  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
13757  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE";
13758  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
13759  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2";
13760  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
13761  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3";
13762  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
13763  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4";
13764  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
13765  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT2";
13766  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
13767  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT3";
13768  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
13769  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT4";
13770  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
13771  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_STRING";
13772  }else{
13773  assert(false);
13774  }
13775 
13776 
13777  std::cout << " " << "[name: " << pd.at(i) << ", type: " << dstype << ", size: " << dsize << "]:" << std::endl;
13778 
13779 
13780  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13781  std::vector<int> pdata;
13782  getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13783  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13784  {
13785  if(j < 10){
13786  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13787  }else{
13788  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13789  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13790  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13791  break;
13792  }
13793 
13794  }
13795  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
13796  std::vector<uint> pdata;
13797  getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13798  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13799  {
13800  if(j < 10){
13801  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13802  }else{
13803  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13804  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13805  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13806  break;
13807  }
13808 
13809  }
13810  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
13811  std::vector<float> pdata;
13812  getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13813  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13814  {
13815  if(j < 10){
13816  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13817  }else{
13818  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13819  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13820  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13821  break;
13822  }
13823 
13824  }
13825  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
13826  std::vector<double> pdata;
13827  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13828  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13829  {
13830  if(j < 10){
13831  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13832  }else{
13833  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13834  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13835  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13836  break;
13837  }
13838 
13839  }
13840  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
13841  std::vector<vec2> pdata;
13842  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13843  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13844  {
13845  if(j < 10){
13846  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13847  }else{
13848  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13849  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13850  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13851  break;
13852  }
13853 
13854  }
13855  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
13856  std::vector<vec3> pdata;
13857  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13858  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13859  {
13860  if(j < 10){
13861  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13862  }else{
13863  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13864  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13865  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13866  break;
13867  }
13868 
13869  }
13870  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
13871  std::vector<vec4> pdata;
13872  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13873  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13874  {
13875  if(j < 10){
13876  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13877  }else{
13878  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13879  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13880  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13881  break;
13882  }
13883 
13884  }
13885  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
13886  std::vector<int2> pdata;
13887  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13888  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13889  {
13890  if(j < 10){
13891  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13892  }else{
13893  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13894  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13895  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13896  break;
13897  }
13898 
13899  }
13900  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
13901  std::vector<int3> pdata;
13902  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13903  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13904  {
13905  if(j < 10){
13906  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13907  }else{
13908  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13909  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13910  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13911  break;
13912  }
13913 
13914  }
13915  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
13916  std::vector<int4> pdata;
13917  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13918  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13919  {
13920  if(j < 10){
13921  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13922  }else{
13923  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13924  break;
13925  }
13926 
13927  }
13928  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
13929  std::vector<std::string> pdata;
13930  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13931  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13932  {
13933  if(j < 10){
13934  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13935  }else{
13936  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13937  break;
13938  }
13939 
13940  }
13941  }else{
13942  assert(false);
13943  }
13944 
13945  }
13946  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13947 }
13948 
13949 CompoundObject* Context::getObjectPointer_private( uint ObjID ) const{
13950  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
13951  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
13952  }
13953  return objects.at(ObjID);
13954 }
13955 
13956 
13957 float Context::getObjectArea(uint ObjID) const {
13958  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getArea();
13959 }
13960 
13961 uint Context::getObjectPrimitiveCount(uint ObjID) const {
13962  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getPrimitiveCount();
13963 }
13964 
13965 helios::vec3 Context::getObjectCenter(uint ObjID) const {
13966  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getObjectCenter();
13967 }
13968 
13969 RGBcolor Context::getObjectColorRGB(uint ObjID) const {
13970  RGBAcolor color = getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getColorRGBA();
13971  return make_RGBcolor( color.r, color.g, color.b );
13972 }
13973 
13974 RGBAcolor Context::getObjectColorRGBA(uint ObjID) const {
13975  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getColorRGBA();
13976 }
13977 
13978 std::string Context::getObjectTextureFile(uint ObjID) const{
13979  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getTextureFile();
13980 }
13981 
13982 void Context::getObjectTransformationMatrix(uint ObjID, float (&T)[16] ) const {
13983  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getTransformationMatrix( T );
13984 }
13985 
13986 void Context::setObjectTransformationMatrix(uint ObjID, float (&T)[16] ) {
13987  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->setTransformationMatrix(T);
13988 }
13989 
13990 void Context::setObjectTransformationMatrix(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs, float (&T)[16] ) {
13991  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
13992  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->setTransformationMatrix(T);
13993  }
13994 }
13995 
13996 bool Context::objectHasTexture( uint ObjID ) const{
13997  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->hasTexture();
13998 }
13999 
14000 void Context::setObjectColor(uint ObjID, const RGBcolor &color) {
14001  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->setColor( color );
14002 }
14003 
14004 void Context::setObjectColor(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs, const RGBcolor &color) {
14005  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
14006  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->setColor(color);
14007  }
14008 }
14009 
14010 void Context::setObjectColor(uint ObjID, const RGBAcolor &color) {
14011  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->setColor( color );
14012 }
14013 
14014 void Context::setObjectColor(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs, const RGBAcolor &color) {
14015  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
14016  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->setColor(color);
14017  }
14018 }

14020 bool Context::doesObjectContainPrimitive(uint ObjID, uint UUID ){
14021  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->doesObjectContainPrimitive( UUID );
14022 }

14024 void Context::overrideObjectTextureColor(uint ObjID) {
14025  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->overrideTextureColor();
14026 }
14027 
14028 void Context::useObjectTextureColor(uint ObjID) {
14029  getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->useTextureColor();
14030 }
14031 
14032 void Context::getObjectBoundingBox( uint ObjID, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const {
14033  std::vector<uint> ObjIDs{ObjID};
14034  getObjectBoundingBox(ObjIDs,min_corner,max_corner);
14035 }
14036 
14037 void Context::getObjectBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
14038 
14039  uint o=0;
14040  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs ) {
14041 
14042  if ( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end()){
14043  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectBoundingBox): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
14044  }
14045 
14046  const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs = objects.at(ObjID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
14047 
14048  uint p=0;
14049  for (uint UUID: UUIDs) {
14050 
14051  const std::vector<vec3> &vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
14052 
14053  if( p==0 && o==0 ){
14054  min_corner = vertices.front();
14055  max_corner = min_corner;
14056  p++;
14057  continue;
14058  }
14059 
14060  for (const vec3 &vert: vertices) {
14061  if (vert.x < min_corner.x) {
14062  min_corner.x = vert.x;
14063  }
14064  if (vert.y < min_corner.y) {
14065  min_corner.y = vert.y;
14066  }
14067  if (vert.z < min_corner.z) {
14068  min_corner.z = vert.z;
14069  }
14070  if (vert.x > max_corner.x) {
14071  max_corner.x = vert.x;
14072  }
14073  if (vert.y > max_corner.y) {
14074  max_corner.y = vert.y;
14075  }
14076  if (vert.z > max_corner.z) {
14077  max_corner.z = vert.z;
14078  }
14079  }
14080  }
14081 
14082  o++;
14083  }
14084 
14085 }
14086 
14087 std::vector<std::string> Context::listObjectData(uint ObjID) const{
14088  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->listObjectData();
14089 }
14090 
14091 std::vector<std::string> Context::listPrimitiveData(uint UUID) const{
14092  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->listPrimitiveData();
14093 }
14094 
14095 Tile* Context::getTileObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
14096  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
14097  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
14098  }else if( objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType()!=OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
14099  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Tile Object.") );
14100  }
14101  return dynamic_cast<Tile*>(objects.at(ObjID));
14102 }
14103 
14104 Sphere* Context::getSphereObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
14105  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
14106  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getSphereObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
14107  }else if( objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType()!=OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
14108  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getSphereObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Sphere Object.") );
14109  }
14110  return dynamic_cast<Sphere*>(objects.at(ObjID));
14111 }
14112 
14113 Tube* Context::getTubeObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
14114  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
14115  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTubeObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
14116  }else if( objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType()!=OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ){
14117  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTubeObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Tube Object.") );
14118  }
14119  return dynamic_cast<Tube*>(objects.at(ObjID));
14120 }
